story:
I'm a retired alternative model, I've been in the industry for approximately 10 years and during this time i have learned to market myself as a brand which i hope puts me in good stead to market my new brand VE Cosmetics.
Ive always struggled to find cosmetics that were all natural and ethical. I also recently fell pregnant so I started making my own cosmetics so I knew exactly what the ingredients were & that the ingredients were safe for me to use.
I've had a lot of interest in my products & would love to launch my own brand.
I've sold off a lot of my possessions to fund a website & buy my url www.ve-cosmetics.com, I've also managed to buy some ingredients & plain cosmetic pots. This first range has been sent out to bloggers & makeup artists to try and get the brand name some attention.
I now need to find more ingredients & promotional material/packaging/cosmetics pots/lipstick tubes. I've worked out that £750 should set me up and pay for enough ingredients to launch a first basic range.
Your funding would enable me to create a line of cosmetics that are made from sustainable produce, that is 100% natural, handmade, cruelty free & vegan friendly - basically guilt free cosmetics!
I appreciate that not everyone can contribute but if you could share my campaign or spread the word of VE cosmetics I would be very greatful!

story:
W orldwide travelers

A drenaline junkies 

L ife embracers 

L overs of the night 

U nique individuals 

M inimalists 

They all wanted the same thing: a credit card holder that is functional, resistant and modern - all at once.

So Wallum started with the idea of building a lighter, simpler and more practical wallet.

Front Pocket Wallet vs. Traditional Wallet

Wallum, meaning “wal” for wallet and “lum” for aluminum, quickly became more than an idea. We used our deep knowledge in working with metals as well as our passion for entrepreneurship and launched our first product on Kickstarter in 2013.

PAST SUCCESS AND FUTURE PLANS

After the first campaign, Wallum was officially founded. Our high quality products, produced in Austria, were met with incredibly positive customer reviews. This motivated us to keep expanding and improving Wallum.

Now we are back on Kickstarter since we developed a new unique production-material-design wallet that will be lighter, easier to handle and more resistant than any other wallet before. Not to forget the design: it will look modern and cool.

All our card holders are produced in Goetzis (Austria) to offer the best quality possible. 

We directly supervise the factory production process to make sure each Wallum matches our prototype specifications. Each Wallum gets manually checked for quality at each production step.

We use highly efficient high-tech-CNC machines to produce our Wallums which let us offer our products for a reasonable price. 

Once the Wallums have reached their final form, they get sand blasted and anodized in Germany for their matte and cozy surface. Finally, we assemble, pack and ship them directly to your door.

While competitors focus on product diversity instead of quality, we have a set product line to optimize product quality and protect the environment.

Aircraft grade aluminum is not only extremely light, but also as strong as steel. Compared to other materials such as nickel and carbon, aluminum doesn't compromise looks and strength for environmental friendliness.

Why are we so sure?

As the son of a metal, plastics and ceramics craftsman, Max - the founder of Wallum – has many years of experience and expertise making high quality products. His experience makes production, quality control, and design paramount.

Minimalism is our style – for this and for the advantage of becoming the ultimate light-weight card holder, we kept our design stylish and simple.

Our Wallum U1 consists of two parts only - the aluminum body and the clip. We don't use any screws or extra parts that might get loose or break.

With the size of a „U“, the Wallum impresses with its smooth curves and radius on the edges as well as its universally matte surface.

Our Wallum has notches in both corners to safely store your cards by clicking it into place. The “click” marks that your cards are locked in and will not fall out under any circumstance.

It doesn't matter how many cards you have in your Wallum - they will be locked in and secured.

For its completion we’ve placed an elastic fiberglass money clip in the middle of the „U“.

In order to fit into any pocket, the U1 is only a little bigger than your cards…

We have carefully calculated costs to make Wallum a success. In order for you to understand what we will do with your money during and after the campaign, have a look at our pie chart:

story:
Hello friends!

 My name is Amber Welch. Over the past few years I've dedicated my business and my passion to making custom corsets. Being involved in the corset community has allowed me to connect and work with many wonderful people. 

Me, in a Lovely Rat's Corset

I'm constantly working to create the highest quality product I can for my clients. The costs and time involved however, have put my pieces out of reach of many people who love the Lovely Rats aesthetic but can't afford it. This is one reason I host annual giveaways and sample sales. Corsets have the ability to help and heal people, whether through medical support or a confidence boost. When I can I try to make my product available to those who could not otherwise afford it.   

Now I have an opportunity to produce an off the rack line with a high quality ethical manufacturer, and make my brand accessible to those who dream of owning a Lovely Rat's corset. 

Model Zessina, Velvet Luxe Photography

The Lovely Rat's aesthetic is all about femininity and fun. We're known for bold color combinations, handsewn embellishments, and creative themes. People can recognize a Lovely Rat corset at a glance, and it will be no different for the OTR line. 

My goal with the OTR line is to replicate the construction, look, and materials of my custom work as much as possible. Each corset will feature Thai silk fashion fabric in a delicate pastel color pallette, a floral cotton lining, and external channels. 

Factory prototype of the new OTR line. 

The pattern will feature the gently curved back popular in my custom work, replicating a more natural posture while still offering comfortable support. 

My new line will have a 'build your own' feature and offer semicustom embellishment options unlike anything else in the market. The interactive corset designer will allow customers to choose from three base colors, three bow placement options in three colors, and three lace placement options in three colors. From there you can select additional covered garters, rhinestones, or flossing.  These elements will give you the ability to make your corset totally unique. I'll also be adding the embellishments myself, giving them that handcrafted touch of custom work. 

Selling ready to wear corsets will also support the custom side of my business and allow me to put more attention and time into individual orders, pursue new exciting projects, as well as allow me to become a vendor at events and conventions. 

The Lovely Rat's studio.

 My goal is to begin production in early 2017 and hopefully launch the line for sale that summer. If the campaign exceeds its goal I will be able to offer more color options and maybe even be able to personally oversee production.The patterns and details are still in product development, but I expect a 12"-14" hipspring, and intend to keep the corsets in the $150-$250 range. 

Here's a preview of the sillhouette in action:

https://www.instagram.com/p/BEwUA-mOPsn/?taken-by=lovelyratscorsetry

  Thanks so much for your ongoing support, it means everything to me!

THE PERKS!

$5 USD: A personal thank you note from me for your contribution.

$25 USD: A glossy postcard and thank you note featuring one of our corsets.

$50 USD: A corset storage bag in a cotton print of your choice!

$100 USD: The corset bag and postcard, along with a personalized digital corset illustration.

$200 USD: $50 off of your next custom order plus the corset bag, postcard, and illustration.

$300 USD: Preorder for a Lovely Rat's OTR underbust. You'll be among the first to receive one of the ready to wear corsets once production is finished! In available size and color of your choice of course.

$500 USD: You'll receive the OTR preorder, along with the postcard, corset bag, $50 discount, and illustration.

$600 USD: A custom handmade waspie corset in fabric of your choice.

$800 USD: A custom handmade cincher corset with embellishment of your choice.

$1000 USD: The postcard, corset bag, illustration, OTR preorder, and a beautiful framed lace applique with hand sewn beading.

$1500 USD: Custom underbust corset in a personalized design with embellishment of your choice.

$5000: All of the previous perks! Postcard, Corset bag, illustration, OTR preorder, $50 discount, waspie, cincher, custom underbust, and framed lace applique!

story:
(HELP - Ik snap het niet goed) 

Hi, I’m Steven.

Because of an accident I am now a quadriplegic: I’m paralysed from the chest down and can barely use my hands. Can you imagine what a struggle it is for me to get dressed? Have you seen that wheelchair users wear sweatpants all the time? Or have you ever googled the weird looking trousers that are called ‘special pants for wheelchair users’?

Well, I’m about to change all that! 

The perfect pair of pants

Normal trousers cause all kinds of problems for people in a wheelchair. The pair of trousers start sagging while the trouser legs start pulling up, so both your back and your ankles become visible. The crotch area starts to tighten and the seams start to hurt from sitting on them. These are just a few of the problems you face when you are wearing normal trousers when living in a wheelchair and I want to eliminate all of them!

A unique design to solve problems

I’m young, and I deserve to look good - even in my wheelchair! So I developed a unique pair of trousers that look awesome. But that wasn’t enough for me. I wanted to address all problems, not only appearance and comfort. So I looked for ways to solve more challenging issues like health problems and lack of independence. I made sure the trousers were designed to decrease the chance of getting pressure sores and other kinds of skin damage and Increased the independence of the wearer. In short, my pair of trousers focuses on comfort far beyond anything else you can find on the market today!

Unique features

My trousers have a higher back and extended trouser legs.

  • Classic, increases comfort and improves your look.

The only pair of trousers in the world without seams on the sitting surface and repositioned seams.

  • To prevent pressure differences.
  • To decrease the chance of pressure sores.
  • To Increase comfort.

The only pair of trousers with pullers and an easy magnetic button.

  • Increases independence of people with diminished fine motor skills.
  • Decreases workload of caregivers.
  • Designed to be Invisible when seated.

We use a unique combination of a lower front waist with geometric elastic sides.

  • Prevents the trousers of slipping down.
  • Provides a more comfortable fit.
  • Allows weight fluctuations without loss of comfort.

An idea worth sharing

Do you know how many people there are in the world who need to use a wheelchair like me? Literally millions! So why would I keep my exclusive design all to myself when I could be helping others who are facing the same daily struggle? A struggle to get dressed, a struggle to stay healthy, and a struggle to feel good enough about ourselves to go out in to the world? No reason! So here’s my campaign, and here’s where you come in!

What We Need & What You Get

As you can see in the video above and the pictures below, my trouser design has already gone through lots of changes and is now almost fully developed.

But there are two things I need your help with: input and fabric.

  1. Input: I need to know what you think! If you are in a wheelchair (or are a caretaker with experience), let me know what you would like to add to my design to make it even more perfect. But that’s not all! If you have any other tips for me to make my trousers a success on the market and stay ahead of the competition, let me know! I want to form a community of people who care, because it’s by listening to friends’ friends that I found the perfect fabric for my pants. And that takes me to number two…

  1. Fabric: I found the perfect fabric for my pants! It’s unique, stretchy cloth from Japan that has two layers of cotton with spandex in between. This means that it is stretchy, but the spandex has no direct contact with your skin. The cloth also breathes so the temperature and the moisture build-up is low. Unfortunately, I can only buy 1,000 meters of fabric (costing $10/meter) for a first production run. I can’t do that on my own! So I need your help.

 

How YOU can help

  1. The first thing you can do, is join my community.
  2. The second thing you can do, is get the word about my amazing pants out there with the hashtags #MetersforMakt #Makt #Sitwear & #Maktdatjegoedzit . 
  3. The third thing you can do, is fund me to get that amazing fabric for my trousers.

How? By choosing a "Perk" on the right side of this page and click on "Get this Perk". Then just follow the instructions. For every amount you donate you will be rewarded accordingly, like this :

Donate 1 $ or more: Sympathy vote

  • I will personally put YOUR NAME ON MY ThankyouBackers-page!

Donate 10 $ or more: 1 metre

  • I'll send you a PERSONAL THANK YOU NOTE and I'll put your name on my ThankyouBackers-page.
  • To prove your money was well spent, I'll send you a copy of the invoice that shows how I used your money. :-)

Donate 20 $ or more: 2 metres

  • I'm giving you ACCESS TO THE COMMUNITY GROUP to help develop, test and improve these great pants!
  • I'll send you a PERSONAL THANK YOU NOTE and I'll put your name on my ThankyouBackers-page.
  • To prove your money was well spent, I'll send you a copy of the invoice that shows how I used your money. :-)

Donate 50 $ or more: 5 meters = Great Fabric Donation

  • You will get a BOW TIE OR HEADBAND made from the very fabric you helped me get!
  • I'm giving you ACCESS TO THE COMMUNITY GROUP to help develop, test and improve these great pants!
  • I'll send you a PERSONAL THANK YOU NOTE and I'll put your name on my ThankyouBackers-page.
  • To prove your money was well spent, I'll send you a copy of the invoice that shows how I used your money. :-)

Donate 99 $ or more: Very Early Bird Special

  • You'll get ONE OF THE FIRST MAKT TROUSERS WITH A 45% DISCOUNT. You can even choose the color (Dark Blue / Dark Grey) and size (M, L, XL)!
  • I'll give you ACCESS TO THE MAKT COMMUNITY VIP GROUP and you'll receive updates and everything else ahead of the crowd!

  • You'll get TWO OF THE FIRST MAKT TROUSERS WITH A 31% DISCOUNT. You can even choose the color (Dark Blue / Dark Grey) and size (M, L, XL)!

DONATE 500 $ or more: Royalty (50 metres)

  • You'll get AN EXCLUSIVELY DESIGNED PAIR OF TROUSERS TAILORED TO YOUR MEASUREMENTS ONLY! 
  •  You can expect a SKYPE CALL FROM ME, Steven Claeys (the Founder)! 

 *AND*

  • You'll also get an EXCLUSIVE NOTEBOOK with the Founder's personal story, exclusive pictures and some of my favourite motivational quotes!
  • You will get a BOW TIE OR HEADBAND made from the very fabric you helped me get!
  • I'll give you ACCESS TO THE MAKT COMMUNITY VIP GROUP and you'll receive updates and everything else ahead of the crowd!
  • I'll send you a PERSONAL THANK YOU NOTE and I'll put your name on my ThankyouBackers-page.

DONATE 10,000 $ or more: Insanity (1,000 metres) 

  • You are my new BEST FRIEND. ;-)
  • You will get a VOUCHER FOR 60 OF THESE MAKT TROUSERS.
  • In addition, I'm giving you AN EXCLUSIVELY DESIGNED PAIR OF TROUSERS TAILORED TO YOUR MEASUREMENTS ONLY! 
  • And that's not enough, to show you my undying love I'm also giving you a 25% DISCOUNT FOR LIFE on every additional pair of these MAKT trousers you buy for personal use! 

*AND*

  • In case you have big plans, I'm even giving you a 10% DISCOUNT FOR LIFE on every additional pair of these MAKT trousers you buy for commercial use.
  • And I will personally give you a call to see how else I (the Founder) can MAKE YOU HAPPY!

 

NEW : Stretch Goals

 

Stretch goal #1 : If we reach 12.000$ - We will be able to add a NEW Color choice for the trousers. The color will be chosen by you, our backers!

Stretch goal #2 : If we reach 18.000$ - The sizes S and XXL will become available to chose from. 

 

Every donation is valuable, that's why we'll always get you something in return as a token of our gratitude, no matter if you're in a wheelchair or not. That's why we often offer two choices. If your donation gives you a choice in perks, you can register your personal choice in a survey we will send you after the campaign has finished.

 

What if?

What if I don’t make it to my goal of 1 kilometer of fabric? Well, I’ll still be very happy I tried! And it won’t be over for me, because I’ll have all kinds of valuable feedback from the community (yes, your personal input!) and I can use it to evaluate my product and my value proposition to achieve my goals in another way. And those of you who funded the trousers and still want a pair, you will get it! But maybe in a different kind of fabric, one that I can actually afford.

 

The Impact

There are literally millions of people who need to spend their days in a wheelchair. And yet the adjusted clothing industry is only now starting to see the potential of fashionable designs.

By backing this project, you show that it is possible to raise the bar a lot higher by bringing fashion, healthcare and the 21st century to this industry. And don’t forget: you or your loved ones might end up in a wheelchair one day too – wouldn’t you want clothes that make you look good and feel good about yourself?

 

Risks & Challenges

When I started to create this product, I used my own experience as a quadriplegic. This means that this specific pair of pants is meant for people who sit all day and need help getting dressed, not those who can occasionally get up and walk around. I chose to stick with designing for this specific target group, well aware that this leaves some people out of the scope of the project. I’m hoping to expand the clothing line in the future. 

I also know that making the sales platform (MAKT) successful means facing inventory and stock challenges (a financial hazard), facing the difficulties of reaching a hard to reach crowd (efficiency hurdles), finding additional funds to invest in marketing (financial challenges), and overcoming logistical challenges. I am confident that despite those challenges we'll be able to deliver our finished product to your doorstep in less then six months :

 

How I will face these risk and challenges

With everything I’ve got! I’ve gotten this far, I’m optimistic I can make it to the end with your support! And of course I’m as close to the problems we’re solving as you can get. Before my accident I was part of 3 student bodies as Head of Technique, Head of Management and as Student Body President. After my accident I started a local blog for people with disabilities and their caretakers, working with more than 10 volunteers and receiving more than 30,000 views in the first year alone. I managed to get a unique pair of business coaches and to secure the support of the Caring Entrepreneurship Fund after thorough vetting, as well as the support of Start-it at KBC.

                   

Other Ways You Can Help

Crowdfunding is a cool way to get funding, but only if you you can reach enough interested people. That's why I would LOVE you if you could SHARE this campaign with as many people as possible! Use the social media share-buttons, email this webpage to everyone or just talk about this initiative to your family, friends, neighbors and co-workers. THANK YOU!

story_txt:
(HELP - Ik snap het niet goed) Hi, I’m Steven.Because of an accident I am now a quadriplegic: I’m paralysed from the chest down and can barely use my hands. Can you imagine what a struggle it is for me to get dressed? Have you seen that wheelchair users wear sweatpants all the time? Or have you ever googled the weird looking trousers that are called ‘special pants for wheelchair users’?Well, I’m about to change all that! The perfect pair of pantsNormal trousers cause all kinds of problems for people in a wheelchair. The pair of trousers start sagging while the trouser legs start pulling up, so both your back and your ankles become visible. The crotch area starts to tighten and the seams start to hurt from sitting on them. These are just a few of the problems you face when you are wearing normal trousers when living in a wheelchair and I want to eliminate all of them!A unique design to solve problemsI’m young, and I deserve to look good - even in my wheelchair! So I developed a unique pair of trousers that look awesome. But that wasn’t enough for me. I wanted to address all problems, not only appearance and comfort. So I looked for ways to solve more challenging issues like health problems and lack of independence. I made sure the trousers were designed to decrease the chance of getting pressure sores and other kinds of skin damage and Increased the independence of the wearer. In short, my pair of trousers focuses on comfort far beyond anything else you can find on the market today!Unique featuresMy trousers have a higher back and extended trouser legs.Classic, increases comfort and improves your look.The only pair of trousers in the world without seams on the sitting surface and repositioned seams.
To prevent pressure differences.
To decrease the chance of pressure sores.
To Increase comfort.

The only pair of trousers with pullers and an easy magnetic button.
Increases independence of people with diminished fine motor skills.
Decreases workload of caregivers.
Designed to be Invisible when seated.

We use a unique combination of a lower front waist with geometric elastic sides.
Prevents the trousers of slipping down.
Provides a more comfortable fit.
Allows weight fluctuations without loss of comfort.

An idea worth sharingDo you know how many people there are in the world who need to use a wheelchair like me? Literally millions! So why would I keep my exclusive design all to myself when I could be helping others who are facing the same daily struggle? A struggle to get dressed, a struggle to stay healthy, and a struggle to feel good enough about ourselves to go out in to the world? No reason! So here’s my campaign, and here’s where you come in!What We Need & What You GetAs you can see in the video above and the pictures below, my trouser design has already gone through lots of changes and is now almost fully developed.But there are two things I need your help with: input and fabric.
Input: I need to know what you think! If you are in a wheelchair (or are a caretaker with experience), let me know what you would like to add to my design to make it even more perfect. But that’s not all! If you have any other tips for me to make my trousers a success on the market and stay ahead of the competition, let me know! I want to form a community of people who care, because it’s by listening to friends’ friends that I found the perfect fabric for my pants. And that takes me to number two…
Fabric: I found the perfect fabric for my pants! It’s unique, stretchy cloth from Japan that has two layers of cotton with spandex in between. This means that it is stretchy, but the spandex has no direct contact with your skin. The cloth also breathes so the temperature and the moisture build-up is low. Unfortunately, I can only buy 1,000 meters of fabric (costing $10/meter) for a first production run. I can’t do that on my own! So I need your help. How YOU can help
The first thing you can do, is join my community.

The second thing you can do, is get the word about my amazing pants out there with the hashtags #MetersforMakt #Makt #Sitwear & #Maktdatjegoedzit . 
The third thing you can do, is fund me to get that amazing fabric for my trousers.
How? By choosing a "Perk" on the right side of this page and click on "Get this Perk". Then just follow the instructions. For every amount you donate you will be rewarded accordingly, like this :Donate 1 $ or more: Sympathy voteI will personally put YOUR NAME ON MY ThankyouBackers-page!
Donate 10 $ or more: 1 metre
I'll send you a PERSONAL THANK YOU NOTE and I'll put your name on my ThankyouBackers-page.
To prove your money was well spent, I'll send you a copy of the invoice that shows how I used your money. :-)
Donate 20 $ or more: 2 metres
I'm giving you ACCESS TO THE COMMUNITY GROUP to help develop, test and improve these great pants!

story:
VISIT US: www.charlestonwatches.com

CHARLESTON

We are Boo and Jie, the founders of Charleston watches. We’d like to introduce on how Charleston watches started and what makes our watches so successful. 

We started Charleston watches simply because of Jie’s passion in design. She wanted to design something that both men and women could wear and something that could also last forever in life. She kept thinking on what was that thing could be and eventually, she found the answer - watches.

 

 

 

The Charleston Collection

All Black - 40mm

Rose Gold / Black - 40mm

Rose Gold / Tan - 40mm

White / Tan - 40mm

 

Design Features

  • Japanese Miyota Quartz  
  • Stainless Steel Case
  • Premium Hardened Mineral Crystal Glass to handle various conditions
  • 40mm Diameter (fit both men and women)
  • Water Resistant 5 ATM
  • Genuine Calf Leather Strap
  • Quick - Replace Straps

Charleston watches come with the range of 4 designs

  1. All black
  2. Black case, Tan strap
  3. Rose Gold case, Black strap
  4. Rose Gold case, Tan strap

 

 

THANK YOU

We’d like to extend our sincere gratitude to everyone who has helped us along the way to make our project happened. Our Japanese suppliers, passerby who guided us to the manufacturer when we were lost in Japan, friends and family who have given us utmost supports and encouragements during the process. Your supports have really guided us to be where we are today.

 

We're Boo and Jie and we created Charleston in 2016.

If you would like to reach us, please email us at info@charlestonwatches.com

story:
If you're an outdoor enthusiast, you spend a lot of time in the heat of the sun. But in the high heat of summer you need to be careful. Excessive heat can cause an array of heat-related illness including cramps, rashes, heat exhaustion, and heatstroke which could be life-threatening.

Ordinary sun hats help but they absorb the sun's radiant heat. 

There is a better solution.

Alchemi Sun Hats utilize PATENT PENDING Radiant Barrier Technology to REFLECT UP TO 80% OF THE SUN'S HEAT WAVES away from your body instead of absorbing it like conventional hats.

The radiant barrier also BLOCKS 99.8% OF SKIN DAMAGING UV RAYS WITH A TESTED UPF OF WELL OVER 800!

Using state-of-the-art production techniques we laminate our radiant barrier material to a soft, thin polyester fabric that provides comfort as well as function.



Radiant barriers have been in use for years most notably in the space industry. Space suits as well as space craft have utilized radiant barriers to protect astronauts from extreme temperatures in space.

In order to maximize heat reflective performance, radiant barrier material must be directly exposed to the sun's heat waves. That is exactly what we do with Alchemi Sun Hats. At the same time, we still protect the radiant barrier from damage or tearing by covering it with a wide nylon mesh.


Our efforts to keep you cool don't stop there. Inside of Alchemi Sun Hats we designed moisture wicking sweatbands which we combine with some well thought out ventilation techniques all geared at creating a sun hat that actually helps keep you more protected, cooler and more comfortable.


                                           

                                              2016 T0P INDUSTRY INNOVATOR
                                                        Apparel Magazine                    
   

   F0X 10 Phoenix

                                             

KPHO Phoenix





Alchemi T-Shirt

  • 6.1 oz 100% pre-shrunk cotton

  • Machine washable

  • Sturdy-heavyweight

  • Double needle-stitched for durability

  • YXS to 4XL generous fit



Alchemi River Hat


  • Radiant barrier reflects heat waves

  • UPF tested 800+, blocks 99.8% of UV rays

  • Asymmetrical, shapeable brim

  • Aggressive ventilation to aid cooling

  • Moisture-wicking sweatband

  • Adjustable sizing

  • Chin strap to secure hat

  • Lightweight materials

  • Patent Pending



Alchemi Desert Hat



  • Radiant barrier reflects heat waves

  • UPF tested 800+, blocks 99.8% of UV rays

  • Aggressive ventilation to aid cooling

  • Moisture-wicking sweatband

  • Protective neck shroud

  • Adjustable sizing

  • Lightweight materials

  • Patent Pending




                      Andy Birutis, CEO, Co-Founder

                     Sean Daw, Chief Design Officer, Co-Founder

                     Sam Landers, Chief Brand Officer, Co-Founder

                    Simon "Buddy" Blattner, Operations

                   Jesse Garner, Operations

                  Zhang Yi Bin, Sourcing/Development

                   Alex Birutis, Technology Advisor

The founders of Alchemi Labs have been working on the development and marketing of great consumer products across many industries for over two decades. As CEO and one of the co-founders, I have personally been responsible for patented, market defining products for three different companies.

We started Alchemi Labs because we have a passion for the outdoors, love to create innovative products and wow consumers like you

Andy Birutis, Co-Founder

story:
Short Summary

Hello my name is Gabriella Gordillo I am an American Fashion Designer from San Francisco, California. Ever since I was a young girl I always had the mind of a successful business woman.  From the time I was a little girl I was taught how to behave as a professional in all aspects of my life. Attending a private  grade school and a public high school, I kept my focus on academics and my future career goals. Graduating high school a year earlier than my peers, I continued on with my career aspirations.

Originally following a passion as a health and personal fitness trainer a whirlwind of events, in 2013, inspired me to design my first line of street wear fashion in Los Angeles. I rounded up a street team to promote my brand and soon enjoyed success through my street wear designs.

In 2015, I moved back to San Francisco where I launched my men's and women's luxury collection, Proper Attire US. The collection is a stylish luxury line fit for the busy lifestyle of the modern-day professional. Influenced by designers such as Ralph Lauren, Balenciaga, and Balmain designer, Olivier Rousteing, I feature ready to wear looks that are both youthful and contemporary. The line features a diverse and classic/futuristic style.  My sleek, minimalist lines, bold colors, and high quality fabrics ensure that each design flatters and moves with the lines and curves of the individual.

I continue to enhance my line to include styles that easily transition between sophisticated evening wear to modern and edgy streetwear. My collection continues to grow through the global inspiration of American, European, and Japanese fashions. The only limitation I have are the funds to expand my line and put it into store front across America.

In order for me to create just the samples for the collection, have a proper photo shoot, finish the website and create my catalogs I had to sell everything I own excluding my car because that is how I get to my other job that helps me pay down my credit card statement that I had maxed out as well as depleted my whole savings so now Im literally at the point of just hoping with all this hard work I put in that my clothing will be put into store fronts. I wish it was that easy... 

You see, even though I have accomplished so many things so far despite the adversities I have faced I am still facing some. I am a new emerging luxury fashion designer which I have never been before, my name is not known in the fashion community and even though I create beautiful designs and use the finest fabric and metal hardware for my garments this is not enough as of right now to make my mark in the fashion industry. I didn't expect that to happen right away anyway, but it is proving more and more true as I am now finished with the development stage of my line and now I must try to get my clothing into store fronts. The only way to pretty much do this that I have found through actually trying is for me to be able to offer my clothing to stores on consignment so that way they don't have to pay for the garments and production upfront which typically I would not want to do but if it is the only way to get my clothing in stores then I must not give up.

 I do not have the funds currently to make this happen and I am almost worried because if this line doesn't have a chance to even be in one store now then I will have made not made any money from this line to be able to even fund another collection to keep my company going. All I need is one shot I would never give up hope on myself I went from just an idea to actually giving up everything I have and sacrificing my possessions as well as the apartment I used to live in just to solely make sure that I am giving this my 100 percent full dedication. I would never ask someone to help me if I havn't already given it my complete all. Words couldn't even express the magnitude to what I would feel if someone out there even just one person could understand my situation and be willing to help me. I would be forever thankful to you for this. 


What We Need & What You Get

In greater detail what I would be doing with the funds are producing my designs in higher volume so I can cut costs in the process and be able to offer my garments at a little cheaper of a price as well as offer the buyers consignment because that is the only way the stores with my target price point are excepting new designers. I am in a highly competitive business but just the fact that against all odds I was even able to do any of  this and do it so well that I get nothing but positive feed back from people in the fashion industry gives me hope. 

Most of you may be asking why $10,000. I can explain that I have narrowed down my buyers list to 10 top boutiques that I would want to have my clothing in. I am working in a high end market and my clothing wholesales for anywhere from $90.00 dollars all the way up to 540.00 so you can imagine that asking stores who don't even know who I am to buy my garments for 540.00 each would be kind of rough. Which it is. The upside is me being able to manufacture that 540.00 garment on my own at the cost price and offer the garments on consignment to be able to get my clothing into store easier. This will also give me publicity and build my brands name. It will also be easier on myself once I make my next collection since I will have already built a report with certain stores if my clothes have already been carried there, it will be easier for me to get my clothing in them the second time around on my own. And hopefully not on consignment because if I was given this chance to be able to be in these stores right now I know I have the skill and know how to be able to only go up from there. Also with the money I would invest in some p.r to make sure if I did have my clothing available in these store fronts on consignment that the world would know about it. It would make your donations all the more secure, because they would be going to benefit the brand no matter what. My clothing would be able to get a lot of good press being at the best of the best boutiques. If all else fails I have a second and third plan if there is any remaining money after this I will use it to try to make a smaller spring summer collection to show my consistency in this fashion business. 

The Impact

My dreams are so big that people might think I'm crazy, but my goal is to be the next globally known household name in fashion from America. A lot of well known designers are from Europe and such and it is my dream and calling to able to be right up there next to them with endless possibilities for my brand Proper Attire US. I have thought about this very hard for the past few years of my life I had a very successful street wear brand in Los Angeles which helped me fund the whole entire luxury line that I have just recently created called Proper Attire US. I am a new designer in a standpoint of being in a high end market now, but I am not new in the sense of business and being in fashion so you would be able to rest assure that your donations would be going to thought out planned actions that would do nothing but give my company a chance to meet its potential. I want this brand to be an iconic name in representing American fashion and American Culture. 

One day I even want to start causes and my own campaigns for young children and even adults that have visions and dreams that are hard for them to reach. I want to be able to be in a position one day to help them and guide them and give them an outlet to learn. To be able to succeed in life because it is hard when you are on your own. I don't want anyone to feel alone like I have these past few years. Following my dreams really has been a blessing, because I have learned so much about myself and about my purpose in life, but it has also brought me to my lowest points in order to learn these things. A lot of times people give up during these processes and I never did or will. Most people wouldn't give up everything they have or even all there money they wouldn't want to loose there security. For me, this is so much bigger than a saving account or materials its about changing the world through my fashion. 

Risks & Challenges

I face obstacles daily a lot of times they happen multiple times a day, but I have found it is all about the mind set you have and being able to problem solve. A lot of these obstacles are not really obstacles unless I label them that. I have a short story that just recently happened to me to explain this. 

I had just got all my samples made from my sample factory and when I received them there were two that had flaws on them but my photo shoot was the next day so there was nothing I could do about it. I had to make sure that I created the illusion in the photographs that everything was perfect on them. Everything turned out good during the shoot so after I had time to send the garments back to the factory to fix them. They finished the garments and they looked great so the factory sent them back to me but the package got lost in the mail. So initially people might think I would of freaked out or panicked or even got mad at the factory or shipping service, but I didn't. This is not how I live my life I believe in trusting in my journey and seeing the good, seeing the lessons life is presenting to me and learning from them. What I did was stay calm and continue working I would never want to waist valuable time I could be spending working on my brand, worrying, because that is what gets in the way of success. I called the shipping company however for a few days and no one knew where the package was. The garments in the packages cost me a few grand each so I wouldn't of had the money to even be able to remake them.  I actually just  came back from the shipping location earlier today, they found my package. 

Events like this and how I am able to handle them so well I am convinced I can handle anything life presents to me because of my mindset. I put out into the world positivity and the world gives it back to me. This is something no one can take away from me I could never give this up. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Honestly, anything will help me at this point even If I don't get the funds to go into stores this year I at least would hope people donated to me so I can be able to afford proper p.r so my online sales can do well and help me produce my next collection properly. Through all I have been through I have trained my mind to see the good in all things, I hope whoever is reading this has saw the good in me.
story_txt:
Short Summary 
Hello my name is Gabriella Gordillo I am an American Fashion Designer from San Francisco, California. Ever since I was a young girl I always had the mind 
of a successful business woman.  From the time I was a little girl I was taught how to behave as a professional in all aspects of my life.
 Attending a private  grade school and a public high school, I kept my focus on academics and my future career goals. Graduating high 
school a year earlier than my peers, I continued on with my career 
aspirations.
Originally following a passion as a health and personal fitness trainer a whirlwind of events, in 2013, inspired me to design my first line of street wear fashion in Los Angeles. I rounded up a 
street team to promote my brand and soon enjoyed success through my street wear designs.
In 2015, I moved back to San Francisco where I launched my men's and women's luxury collection, Proper Attire US. The collection is a stylish luxury
 line fit for the busy lifestyle of the modern-day professional. 
Influenced by designers such as Ralph Lauren, Balenciaga, and Balmain 
designer, Olivier Rousteing, I feature ready to wear looks that
 are both youthful and contemporary. The line features a diverse and 
classic/futuristic style.  My sleek, minimalist lines, bold colors, and
 high quality fabrics ensure that each design flatters and moves with 
the lines and curves of the individual.
I continue to enhance my line to include 
styles that easily transition between sophisticated evening wear to 
modern and edgy streetwear. My collection continues to grow through the
 global inspiration of American, European, and Japanese fashions. The 
only limitation I have are the funds to expand my line and put it into store front across America.
In order for me to create just the samples for the collection, have a proper photo shoot, finish the website and create my catalogs I had to sell everything I own excluding my car because that is how I get to my other job that helps me pay down my credit card statement that I had maxed out as well as depleted my whole savings so now Im literally at the point of just hoping with all this hard work I put in that my clothing will be put into store fronts. I wish it was that easy... 
You see, even though I have accomplished so many things so far despite the adversities I have faced I am still facing some. I am a new emerging luxury fashion designer which I have never been before, my name is not known in the fashion community and even though I create beautiful designs and use the finest fabric and metal hardware for my garments this is not enough as of right now to make my mark in the fashion industry. All I need is one shot I would never give up hope on myself I went from just an idea to actually giving up everything I have and sacrificing my possessions as well as the apartment I used to live in just to solely make sure that I am giving this my 100 percent full dedication. I would never ask someone to help me if I havn't already given it my complete all. Words couldn't even express the magnitude to what I would feel if someone out there even just one person could understand my situation and be willing to help me. I would be forever thankful to you for this.     What We Need & What You Get In greater detail what I would be doing with the funds are producing my designs in higher volume so I can cut costs in the process and be able to offer my garments at a little cheaper of a price as well as offer the buyers consignment because that is the only way the stores with my target price point are excepting new designers. I am in a highly competitive business but just the fact that against all odds I was even able to do any of  this and do it so well that I get nothing but positive feed back from people in the fashion industry gives me hope. 
Most of you may be asking why $10,000. I can explain that I have narrowed down my buyers list to 10 top boutiques that I would want to have my clothing in. I am working in a high end market and my clothing wholesales for anywhere from $90.00 dollars all the way up to 540.00 so you can imagine that asking stores who don't even know who I am to buy my garments for 540.00 each would be kind of rough. Which it is. The upside is me being able to manufacture that 540.00 garment on my own at the cost price and offer the garments on consignment to be able to get my clothing into store easier. This will also give me publicity and build my brands name. It will also be easier on myself once I make my next collection since I will have already built a report with certain stores if my clothes have already been carried there, it will be easier for me to get my clothing in them the second time around on my own. And hopefully not on consignment because if I was given this chance to be able to be in these stores right now I know I have the skill and know how to be able to only go up from there. Also with the money I would invest in some p.r to make sure if I did have my clothing available in these store fronts on consignment that the world would know about it. It would make your donations all the more secure, because they would be going to benefit the brand no matter what. My clothing would be able to get a lot of good press being at the best of the best boutiques. If all else fails I have a second and third plan if there is any remaining money after this I will use it to try to make a smaller spring summer collection to show my consistency in this fashion business.    The Impact My dreams are so big that people might think I'm crazy, but my goal is to be the next globally known household name in fashion from America. I have thought about this very hard for the past few years of my life I had a very successful street wear brand in Los Angeles which helped me fund the whole entire luxury line that I have just recently created called Proper Attire US. I am a new designer in a standpoint of being in a high end market now, but I am not new in the sense of business and being in fashion so you would be able to rest assure that your donations would be going to thought out planned actions that would do nothing but give my company a chance to meet its potential. One day I even want to start causes and my own campaigns for young children and even adults that have visions and dreams that are hard for them to reach. I want to be able to be in a position one day to help them and guide them and give them an outlet to learn. To be able to succeed in life because it is hard when you are on your own. I don't want anyone to feel alone like I have these past few years. A lot of times people give up during these processes and I never did or will. Most people wouldn't give up everything they have or even all there money they wouldn't want to loose there security. What I did was stay calm and continue working I would never want to waist valuable time I could be spending working on my brand, worrying, because that is what gets in the way of success. story:
Minimalist wallets have seen a huge spike in popularity over the past few years. Slimmer. Smarter. Better.

One would think there is only so much you could do with a wallet, but we have got for you some great stuff. We are all for the shift into the slim wallet era.

Therefore, if you have decided it is about time you invest into a streamlined, minimalist wallet for yourself – we have something really exciting for you!

If you are looking for something minimal, with lots of functions – we have got you covered.

We took as an example the most stylish and handy of all the existing formats of wallets, with exquisite operating characteristics and a practical design.

We took as an example the most stylish and handy of all the existing formats of wallets, with exquisite operating characteristics and a practical design.

AVIADOR is not just a practical and beautiful accessory, but also a multifunctional device with a set of absolutely unique features. It’s an absolutely new kind of accessory that you have never seen before. 



               AVIADOR is proud to present new rage -                                       AVIADOR Tracker Card Holder

AVIADOR Tracker Card Holder  - is a fashionable, handmade, comes in a black and blue color. You can comfortly fit up to 7 cards in it. On the back side you can find a small pocket for your cash. Made out of high quality leather, equipped with, NFC chip, electronic key and tracker. Powered by the battery.

AVIADOR ECO is a fashionable, handmade tracker wallet comes in a animal friendly material. Equipped with 8 GB USB flash memory, NFC chip and electronic key, Panic Button 

AVIADOR Black - is a fashionable, handmade tracker wallet comes in a black enameled body. Made out of high quality leather, equipped with 8 GB USB flash memory, NFC chip and electronic key, Panic Button 

AVIADOR Silver - is a fashionable, handmade tracker wallet comes in a silvered body. Made out of high quality leather, equipped with 8 GB USB flash memory, NFC chip and electronic key, Panic Button 

AVIADOR Gold - is a fashionable, handmade tracker wallet comes in a gold plated body. Made out of high quality leather, equipped with 8 GB USB flash memory, NFC chip and electronic key, Panic Button 

AVIADOR Limited - is a fashionable, handmade tracker wallet, comes in a body of your choice. Made out of high quality snake leather, equipped with 32 GB USB flash memory, NFC chip and electronic key, Panic Button 

The Tracking option will prevent you from losing sight of your wallet and losing your money and valuable information. Once you enable this option, you will receive alerts on increasing distance between the wallet and the Smartphone, so you can quickly return to the place where you have left your wallet. This application will help you finding your phone by displaying the distance left until the wallet. 

The connection works both ways: not only you can find your wallet using your mobile phone, but you can also find your mobile phone using your wallet. You can easily find your phone by pressing the button on your wallet, which will activate tracking regime on your phone and it will ring, helping you find it quickly! 

AVIADOR can inform you when your wallet is being opened, so you will always know when your wallet was opened and keep track of your valuable belongings.Just activate an alarm regime and your wallet will inform you about each time when your wallet is being opened.In case you are in the coverage zone – you will receive notification in the moment of opening, and if you are out of coverage, you will receive the notifications of all the attempts of using your money, once the wallet will be in the coverage zone.

That is not all. One of the wallet’s features is a built in NFC chip, which means that you can pay for your purchases, provide personal information from your business card and so on (check out the NFC options). AVIADOR is also equipped to be used as an electronic key.

You don’t need to worry about your wallet and your mobile phone – you’d better take care of yourself. In case of a dangerous event, you can calmly give the mugger your wallet after you break one of its corners. This Panic Button will activate the SOS regime

Immediately showing the location of the mugger. This data could be used to help the police, to notify your relatives or for your personal use.

When designing the wallet, we paid particular attention to the quality. The wallet is handmade. We use Herbert Kade leather, which is perhaps the best Austrian leather in the world.

We apply rigorous quality standards to the metal part of the wallet that contains the digital information of the device and the memory card. This will make your wallet truly unique.

Built-in BLT4 module with accelerometer, allows  the implementation of amazing features. Even last year this was just a dream and now its about to come true. Whilst working on our prototype, we have paid special attention to the features that are still not available to the users of the BLT trackers. We had to work hard to make the SOS and PANIC functions very reliable, as they will help you save your property and possibly life. To be able to use all the features of AVIADOR tracker wallet, all you need to do is to install a special application to your smartphone and synchronize it with AVIADOR tracker wallet. The application will allow you to make configuration to the SOS notification settings, provide telephone number to send notifications to in case of emergency. The message will contain customized text and GPS coordinates of the location, as well as information about the subsequent movement of the phone at specified intervals. Once the SOS function will be active,the phone will be switched into simulation of discharged phone and the muggers wont know that the phone is still working. The content of the text SMS, may also be configured. Alert function will be available only when using AVIADOR tracker wallet application. Meanwhile, the tracker feature will be available whilst using other applications.

Important Disclaimer: By submitting your contribution you agree that all questions and communication related to this project, contribution and transactions is to be directed to and handled by the project team ONLY (aviador.company@gmail.com). You further agree that no other party is liable for the contributions or any communication. By sending your contribution it is legally binding that you have read and consent to this disclaimer.

story:
My name is Ceres and I own a fashion label called Diaja. With the help, encouragement, and support from my parents, ( whom are both entrepreneurs), they helped make my dream a reality by co-founding DIAJA, ( pronounced Dee-Asia), a line featuring quality handbags, jewelry, and fine apparel.

My company is on the rise with the goal of becoming a brand name that will impact fashion history and the lives of those around her by using the fashion platform to give back.

This year I will be showing for the first time during Fashion Week in NYC in September, which is a HUGE deal, and with your donation you have the chance to get great merchandise and help make this event happen.

Where's the money going:

- Then Lion share goes to the venue $700

- The rest will offset the cost of decorations, refreshments, and entertainment

My hope is to surpass my goal of $800 because this production is much more than that, but if I can get 40 people to donate $20 that would be AWESOME!!!! :-)

You can check out my website below:

​Diaja.com

story:
* If you pre-order sunglasses we will be in contact with you to find out which color you would like :)


Short Summary

Both Aaron and Alexis have a passion for sunglasses and we wanted to create a high quality pair of sunglasses without the HUGE brand inflation. We did a lot of research into the sunglass market and noticed that a lot of the brands are either high quality and very expensive or low quality and still have a mid ranged price. What we wanted to do was create a brand that offered the high quality features of your Rayban or Oakley sunglasses but at a price that is affordable. We did a lot of research into different types of plastics and metals until we found something that was suitable. Our features include acetate frames. spring hinges, and polarized/uv400 lenses (More information on these features below). We then wanted to create a business that gave back. We believe that not enough businesses are doing this and we both love giving back to the community. We decided to give back 10% of our profits to 4 different charities that we support (Red Cross, Heart and Stroke Foundation, March of Dimes and Seva). The cool part about this is that you get to choose from which of the 4 charities you would like to see the donation go to. We hope that you come along for the ride and help us establish our brand in the sunglass industry. 

What does "make them yours" mean?

Throughout all of our research we noticed that almost all modern sunglasses companies design their marketing campaigns and imaging around the beach, swimming or surfing. We however are from Northern Ontario where a lot of the year is winter and in the summer beaches are few and far between. "Make them yours" simply means that we realize not everyone is always going to be on that beach catching the rays wearing your Cauz Sunglasses. If you are that's great! But we want everyone to be wearing Cauz Sunglasses doing what they enjoy!


Wayfarers

When designing our wayfarer style sunglasses we were looking for a few different things. First we wanted to find a plastic that was durable and had some weight to it. To us there is nothing worse that ordering a pair of glasses online and when they come in they feel very cheap. That is not the case with Cauz. Our frames are made out of acetate which is a durable, high quality plastic. The next feature we were looking for were spring hinges. Spring hinge temples ensure that the glasses remain intact and do not become loose and out of shape. Also they are a very comfortable fit to the head. The last thing that we were looking for were polarized/uv400 lenses. Every high quality pair of sunglasses should protect your eyes.



Aviators
When designing our aviator style sunglasses we wanted to find a material that was durable and had some weight to it. We wanted to keep the look fairly simple but offer the same eye protection as our wayfarers. Our aviator line will have polarized/uv400 lenses and will offer a very comfortable fit .We are currently offering two different types of aviators with the hopes to expand this line in the future. We are hoping to get feedback from you our customers to bring different styles that you want to see on our website. 


Charities

Canadian Red Cross

The Canadian Red Cross mission is to improve the lives of vulnerable people by mobilizing the power of humanity in Canada around the world. We contacted the Canadian Red Cross because we believe in the values that they promote which are humanitarian values, respect, dignity, integrity, accountability, effectiveness and transparency. Click here to view the Canadian Red Cross website!

Heart and Stroke Foundation

The Heart and Stroke Foundation mission is to prevent disease, save lives, and promote recovery. They have a passion for health, making differences, learning everyday, being extraordinary, and embracing diversity. We contacted the Heart and Stroke Foundation because they are investing in life-saving research and constantly engaging Canadians to make health last. Click here to view the Heart and Stroke Foundation website!

March of Dimes

In 1949, in an effort to find a cure for the polio virus, mothers across Canada joined a North America-wide fundraising effort. These dedicated volunteers, known as the Marching Mothers®, went door-to-door collecting donations of 'just a dime' to donate to the Canadian Foundation for Poliomyelitics (sic) for research for a cure to polio. We partnered with March of Dimes because we love their vision of creating a society inclusive to people with disabilities. Click here to visit the March of Dimes website!

Big Brothers Big Sisters

Big Brothers Big Sisters of Sault Ste. Marie is committed to the healthy development of children and youth through valuable mentoring programs vital in fostering their full potential. We contacted Big Brothers Big Sisters of Sault  Ste. Marie because we feel that their organization is so important to ensuring all children have the ability to reach their full potential. Click here to visit the Big Brothers Big Sisters website!



Why we need crowd funding
A lot of people have asked why we need crowd funding. The simple answer is because we simply do not have the capital to purchase an order of our product. We believe that with your help we can start a business that is loyal to our customers and that helps our planet through donations while maintaining a high quality pair of sunglasses. Our slogan, make them yours will allow us to build a brand around you the customer. We hope that you will share the passion that we have for sunglasses and making the world a better place.

Rewards

 We have a variety of rewards to choose from including our AMAZING sunglasses. If you don't want a pair but just want to send your support we have something for you as well. See the right side of the page for a list of all our rewards
story_txt:
* If you pre-order sunglasses we will be in contact with you to find out which color you would like :)

Short Summary
Both Aaron and Alexis have a passion for sunglasses and we wanted to create a high quality pair of sunglasses without the HUGE brand inflation. We did a lot of research into the sunglass market and noticed that a lot of the brands are either high quality and very expensive or low quality and still have a mid ranged price. What we wanted to do was create a brand that offered the high quality features of your Rayban or Oakley sunglasses but at a price that is affordable. We did a lot of research into different types of plastics and metals until we found something that was suitable. Our features include acetate frames. spring hinges, and polarized/uv400 lenses (More information on these features below). We then wanted to create a business that gave back. We believe that not enough businesses are doing this and we both love giving back to the community. We decided to give back 10% of our profits to 4 different charities that we support (Red Cross, Heart and Stroke Foundation, March of Dimes and Seva). The cool part about this is that you get to choose from which of the 4 charities you would like to see the donation go to. We hope that you come along for the ride and help us establish our brand in the sunglass industry. 




What does "make them yours" mean?Throughout all of our research we noticed that almost all modern sunglasses companies design their marketing campaigns and imaging around the beach, swimming or surfing. We however are from Northern Ontario where a lot of the year is winter and in the summer beaches are few and far between. "Make them yours" simply means that we realize not everyone is always going to be on that beach catching the rays wearing your Cauz Sunglasses. If you are that's great! But we want everyone to be wearing Cauz Sunglasses doing what they enjoy!














Wayfarers
When designing our wayfarer style sunglasses we were looking for a few different things. First we wanted to find a plastic that was durable and had some weight to it. Spring hinge temples ensure that the glasses remain intact and do not become loose and out of shape. Also they are a very comfortable fit to the head. March of Dimes
In 1949, in an effort to find a cure for the polio virus, mothers across Canada joined a North America-wide fundraising effort. These dedicated volunteers, known as the Marching Mothers®, went door-to-door collecting donations of 'just a dime' to donate to the Canadian Foundation for Poliomyelitics (sic) for research for a cure to polio. We partnered with March of Dimes because we love their vision of creating a society inclusive to people with disabilities. Click here to visit the March of Dimes website!
Big Brothers Big Sisters

Big Brothers Big Sisters of Sault Ste. Marie is committed to the healthy development of children and youth through valuable mentoring programs vital in fostering their full potential. We contacted Big Brothers Big Sisters of Sault  Ste. Marie because we feel that their organization is so important to ensuring all children have the ability to reach their full potential. Click here to visit the Big Brothers Big Sisters website!





Why we need crowd funding
A lot of people have asked why we need crowd funding. The simple answer is because we simply do not have the capital to purchase an order of our product. We believe that with your help we can start a business that is loyal to our customers and that helps our planet through donations while maintaining a high quality pair of sunglasses. Our slogan, make them yours will allow us to build a brand around you the customer. We hope that you will share the passion that we have for sunglasses and making the world a better place.

Rewards

 We have a variety of rewards to choose from including our AMAZING sunglasses. If you don't want a pair but just want to send your support we have something for you as well. See the right side of the page for a list of all our rewards

story:
Hi! Let me introduce myself: Jon Camo, Montreal  independent designer. 

I’m 26 years old and father of a 3 years old son, but first and foremost the owner and creator of Chaud Lapin: Streetwear & Lifestyle brand.

 4 months ago I took the decision to quit my day job; I was a footwear designer for an international brand. On my free time, I’d be selling what I’d made for Chaud Lapin in music shows, events, car meetings from my car trunk, as the brand was not offered yet in stores or shops. 

You see, Chaud Lapin is not only the result of my Life, but also the result of my struggles and managing to do whatever I can with what I have, in order to realize my dream. 

Soon, I will get to design for the first time a whole collection without involving money in the process. What I want to achieve is to expand the Chaud Lapin line (Hats, Boxers (Men & Women) & and in the future produce Shoes, Condoms, Jeans and MORE).

Without tons of amazing people surrounding me and supporting my dream, I wouldn’t be where I am today and Chaud Lapin wouldn’t exist. 

I consider myself extremely lucky to receive as much love from my family as well as friends and even perfect strangers, on my road to success. 

So today, I’m asking you to help me build a Lifestyle Company, a brand with values, a success story.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Salut ! Laissez-moi me présenter : Jon Camo, designer indépendant de Montréal.  

26 ans et papa d’un petit gars de 3 ans, mais d’abord et avant tout le mastermind et créateur derrière Chaud Lapin : Streetwear & Lifestyle. 

Il y a quelques mois, j’ai pris la décision de quitter mon emploi; je dessinais des chaussures pour une compagnie internationale. Le soir, je vendais des produits Chaud Lapin directement de mon coffre de voiture dans des shows de musique, événements, rassemblement de chars, etc. 

Voyez-vous, Chaud Lapin n’est pas seulement mon projet de Vie, mais aussi le résultat de dur labeur et de difficultés surmontées. J’ai toujours trouvé le moyen de faire mieux avec peu dans le but de réaliser mon rêve. 

Dans très peu de temps, je serai en mesure de créer une nouve le collection sans impliquer un seul sou dans la production. Mon objectif : Agrandir la gamme Chaud Lapin en incluant des casquettes , sous-vêtements (Hommes & Femmes et ainsi produire des Condoms, Souliers, Jeans & PLUS!

Sans toutes les merveilleuses personnes qui composent mon entourage, Chaud Lapin n’existerait pas et la personne que je suis non plus. 

Je me considère extrêmement choyé d’être entouré d’autant de beau monde et de recevoir leur support au quotidien. Que ce soit des amis, la famille ou de parfaits inconnus, je sens une grosse vague d’amour me mener vers la réussite. 

Aujourd’hui, je vous demande un coup de main pour m’aider à construire une compagnie de Lifestyle, une marque qui a des valeurs, un success story. 

Crowdfunding campaign

The money from the donations will go directly into the line production, shipping fees and custom fees. 

Since I'm my own designer, there will be no design fees! Also, know that Chaud Lapin releases its gear in limited editions, which means that there’s this sense of unicity bonded to the product and the brand.  

If the funding doesn't reach the goal, I will still be delivering every item that has been selected by the crowdfunding donors, and will unfortunately have to let aside the other designs. 

With the crowdfunding campaign, I want to create a worldwide hype for Chaud Lapin, I want to live the dream I’ve had since I was just a kid: to be able to have a shop and call it my own. With YOUR help, everything is possible, even the wildest dreams.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Tout l’argent amassé ira directement dans le processus de production de la nouvelle ligne Chaud Lapin, dans les frais de poste et de douane. 

Comme je design tout moi-même, il n’y aura pas de frais! Sachez que Chaud Lapin offre une toujours des collections en édition limitée, ce qui assure la rareté du produit et de la marque. 

Si jamais nous n’arrivons pas à atteindre l’objectif prévu, je m’engage tout de même à livrer chaque item sélectionné par les donateurs mais devrai malheureusement me résigner à laisser de côté les autres designs. 

Avec cette campagne de fond, je souhaite créer un hype mondial autour de Chaud Lapin, je veux vivre mon rêve de jeunesse : ouvrir et gérer ma propre boutique. Avec VOTRE aide, tout est possible, même les rêves les plus fous.  

Impact

Every dollar raised equals a step towards the realization of this new collection and the beginning of an international recognition for Chaud Lapin. I started this project as my pursuit of happiness (in my own words: pursuit of hotness).

Lately, my mind has been boiling with so many ideas; I have this craving, this need to create. My head has become a real gold mine in terms of creativity. For Chaud Lapin and me, it is time to SHINE. 

I’ve got orders coming from all around the World even though I’ve never done any marketing for it, or even set foot there (France, Greece, Belgium, UK, France, USA and all the way to the other side of Canada). 

Chaud Lapin has been, along with upbringing my son, my most gratifying life project. I have such motivation to live from the earnings of what I create. 

Brainstorming, designing and creating stuff around funny ideas that will make each and every one of my clients happy has become a life goal. Chaud lapin is more than a sex-oriented design brand; it’s a positive revolution about creating good vibes and a sense of community. It’s a lifestyle that supports and encourages real VALUES (friendship, loyalty, respect, freedom and open-mindedness). 

I’ve had people coming up to me saying: "Hey Jon, since I know and wear Chaud Lapin, people stop me in the street to know where I got your gear.’’ This kind of recognition is exactly what fuels my self-esteem and pushes me into not giving up what I’ve put so much energy into. 

I can now say I have almost everything in my possession to accomplish my next collection. I’ve created a strong bond with my Chinese suppliers and have decided to produce everything in Canada, to ensure good cost and quality.  I create a long term relationship with my Chinese suppliers, Why not produce in Canada, for a matter of cost and quality. 

I hope you can now have a sense of the good vibes I want to bring and stimulate with this naughty project. Everything's possible. 

Every kind of help is accepted. At Chaud Lapin, we share the love and the good vibes, don’t be afraid to be part of the revolution, it’s the best reward an artist could hope for. It’s my vision, my dream, my purpose in life! 

- Jon

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Chaque contribution est un pas vers la réalisation de cette nouvelle collection et de la facette internationale de Chaud Lapin. La poursuite de mon bonheur est la base de ce projet (dans mes propres mots : pursuit of Hotness). 

Ces derniers temps, mon cerveau est en pleine ébullition! J’ai ce désir, ce besoin de créer. Ma tête est devenue une vraie mine d’or en terme de créativité. Pour moi et pour Chaud Lapin, c’est le temps de devenir sérieux !  

J’ai des commandes qui proviennent de partout dans le monde, sans publicité, ni jamais avoir mis les pieds là-bas de ma vie ! (France, Grèce, États-Unis, Belgique, UK, et le Canada d’est en ouest). 

Élever mes deux enfants (mon fils et chaud lapin) sont à ce jour mes projets les plus gratifiants. J’ai tellement de motivation, je souhaite véritablement arriver à vivre exclusivement avec Chaud Lapin. 

A chaque jour je brainstorm,  design, créée des prototypes de produits humoristiques et brillants dans le but de rendre chacun de mes clients heureux de son achat.  

Chaud Lapin c’est plus qu’une marque à saveur de sexe. C’est une révolution positive qui encourage des VALEURS comme l’amitié, la loyauté, le respect, la liberté et l’ouverture d’esprit.

 Je me fais souvent dire ‘’ Hey Jo, depuis que je porte ta marque, les gens m’arrêtent dans la rue pour me demander où ils peuvent se procurer tes produits ‘’. Ce genre de reconnaissance est exactement ce qui me pousse à continuer et à me surpasser, à ne pas abandonner ce dans quoi j’ai mis autant d’énergie. 

Je peux maintenant dire que j’ai presque tout ce dont j’ai besoin pour commencer à créer ma nouvelle collection. Le lien tissé avec mes fournisseurs chinois est béton et j’ai décidé de tout produire au Canada par souci de qualité et pour assurer un coût raisonnable.   

J’espère que vous êtes maintenant sensibles à toutes les bonnes ondes que je souhaite amener avec ce projet coquin! 

Tout est possible! Toutes les formes d’aides sont acceptées et bienvenues ! 

Chez Chaud Lapin, nous partageons le love et les attitudes positives. Je vous encourage à faire partie de la révolution; c’est le meilleur coup de pouce que je peux recevoir en tant qu’artiste. 

C’est ma vision, mon rêve, mon projet de vie !

-Jon

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
