story:
Modular Critter Maze

-----------------------

 

 

  • We need your support launching this sustainable business.  We will be making and selling modular critter mazes for the retail environment.  Currently there are no rat-sized mazes for sale in stores or on the web (hamster tubes and mice mazes are both too small) so we see a great opportunity!
  • Your support for the relatively low start-up costs of the tooling and production of the parts, totaling approx. $25,000.  The metal mold tooling is a one-time cost just under $15,000, and the remainder of the funds will go towards the plastic, production costs, packaging, and marketing. Sales will be based mainly on the internet at crittermazes.com, eBay, Amazon, other online sites a well as trade shows, events, and local pet shops around the United States. 

          

  • People are passionate about their pets and we’re passionate about keeping them happy and safe. Critters need stimulation to keep them happy and engaged and mazes are the perfect outlet.  It can also act as a temporary and secure babysitter when you want them to be engaged but can’t be hands on.  Our modular maze system is reusable, expandable, washable, configurable, and stores away compactly. Because it is so incredibly flexible, there are almost unlimited expansion possibilities for our mazes. Everything from custom colors and art work to alternate products like board games for miniatures.  There are a lot of critter owners out there; over a half a million homes have pet rats - and that’s not counting the other critters like hamsters, mice and the like.  That's worth the effort!".

 

Critter Maze Prototype KIT

  • Details
    • A Unit is a part the of a kit 2 bases, 4 walls, 4 columns
    • A kit has 9 units (more units if you buy and add them)
  • Critter Mazes has been designed by first time inventor and has a patent pending 
  • Your support will help get Critter Mazes up and running. Our relatively small start-up costs can produce thousands of parts and a deep starting inventory
  • This project is all about making a better environment for our smaller pets (rats, mice, hamsters and the like)!  Critters are smart, and since they get bored sitting in their cages all day, they need more stimulation and a safe place to explore and have fun.  
  • You can help thousands of bored critters and feel good about it!
    • Funding is going to tooling and then product making.  Secondary investments, sans funding, will be marketing and web presence, and more creative modular parts
    • Start up is negligible: Tooling (the metal injection molds) is about $15,000; the plastic parts are about $12,000.
    • The Maze is Modular: Modular is powerful. Each unit of the maze is comparable to a building block that attaches to the next block; this creates a sort of endless maze “possibility” both horizontal and vertical. 

      • For example a 3x3 unit kit (9 units) could make up a horizontal square, a vertical square, a long line, an L shape, the famous T shape, or the customer’s own designs. The more units added, the larger the maze becomes, and thus endlessly customizable. Eventually we can add options for custom work, custom design and limited editions.
    • How this came about: I was looking for a basic “rat maze”. I went to stores, I searched on the internet and no matter where I looked I was unable to find one. I did find a tiny mouse maze (wrong size), a tube kit for hamsters (still not a maze and the wrong size), and a tube box combo thingy that was also too small and still not a maze. But even the toys I did find for rats didn’t have the configurability and possibility for unique and as exciting a design that a maze system has. There are about half a million homes that have rats as “pets” and even more homes that have other critters needing entertainment. 500 kits will be just .1% of that number!
    • Niche Market: Being a part of a niche market can be a huge asset and this need is currently not being served.  We will be the only modular rat maze for sale on the internet and have the opportunity, time and passion to make it happen. Your contributions will help us serve this niche market by creating 500+ rat mazes & a renewable business model.  Your help will create an ongoing long term business!

      • Other interesting factoids
      • Add-ons: Walls with special shapes for recognition, doors, ramps and other fun creative stuff can add to the animal’s experience. If there are extra funds, it will be used for these optional parts
      • Packaging: Will be minimal and have low impact on the project and environment.  Currently, the packaging will be a shipping box with sleeve, but please offer suggestions.
      • "Made in USA": Why? Because I was born on the 4th of July and while we live in a world economy, I live in the United States.
      • Bases: The bases have several cool design elements
        • Translucent material so we can watch our critters play
        • Doubles as ceilings
        • Interlocking design to create any size maze needed.
        • Special base for multilevel maze
      • Walls:  The walls have been designed with several elements
        • Will fit in any direction placed in between columns
        • Have holes designed into them to hold columns
        • Some are at 90 degree angle and some are at a 45 degree angle
        • A double wall that is twice as long as a normal wall (or twice as tall depending on how you look at it) is also included
      • Columns:
        • Fit into the tops and bottoms of bases
        • Hold up to 8 walls
        • Can be made in several lengths
        • Fit into walls to help little critters climb up to the next level
        • Create a see though block for critter learning.
      • Add-on products and future development:
        • Custom walls with shapes for learning such as circles, squares, etc...
        • Reward systems
        • Teeter totter
        • Slides
        • Walkways
        • Ramps
        • Curved walls
        • Opaque walls
        • Clear walls
        • And other cool ideas (please submit some!)

  •  

  • Please Contact me and let me know what you are thinking! I could use opinions and thoughts. I want this to be a reality and every little bit helps!
  • We realize not everyone has a pet critter so we made some of our perks with the respect to your “perk trophy shelf” ( a single unit of the maze )
  • Everyone who funds our campaign will get a point of recognition based on your contribution level. A huge thank you on our webpage and a pile of products based on your level of support.  Without you, we don't exist. If you just wish to support without obtaining the product that’s fine! Just let us know and we will doubly thank you on our site.
  • PERKS
    • A unit is a part of a kit
    • A kit is a bunch of Units (9 in this campaign)
story_txt:
Modular Critter Maze
-----------------------
 
 

We need your support launching this sustainable business.  We will be making and selling modular critter mazes for the retail environment.  Currently there are no rat-sized mazes for sale in stores or on the web (hamster tubes and mice mazes are both too small) so we see a great opportunity!

Your support for the relatively low start-up costs of the tooling and production of the parts, totaling approx. $25,000.  The metal mold tooling is a one-time cost just under $15,000, and the remainder of the funds will go towards the plastic, production costs, packaging, and marketing. Sales will be based mainly on the internet at crittermazes.com, eBay, Amazon, other online sites a well as trade shows, events, and local pet shops around the United States. 
           

People are passionate about their pets and we’re passionate about keeping them happy and safe. Critters need stimulation to keep them happy and engaged and mazes are the perfect outlet.  It can also act as a temporary and secure babysitter when you want them to be engaged but can’t be hands on.  Our modular maze system is reusable, expandable, washable, configurable, and stores away compactly. Because it is so incredibly flexible, there are almost unlimited expansion possibilities for our mazes. Everything from custom colors and art work to alternate products like board games for miniatures.  There are a lot of critter owners out there; over a half a million homes have pet rats - and that’s not counting the other critters like hamsters, mice and the like.  That's worth the effort!".
 
Critter Maze Prototype KIT



Details


A Unit is a part the of a kit 2 bases, 4 walls, 4 columns


A kit has 9 units (more units if you buy and add them)



Critter Mazes has been designed by first time inventor and has a patent pending 

Your support will help get Critter Mazes up and running. Our relatively small start-up costs can produce thousands of parts and a deep starting inventory
This project is all about making a better environment for our smaller pets (rats, mice, hamsters and the like)!  Critters are smart, and since they get bored sitting in their cages all day, they need more stimulation and a safe place to explore and have fun.  
You can help thousands of bored critters and feel good about it!


Funding is going to tooling and then product making.  Secondary investments, sans funding, will be marketing and web presence, and more creative modular parts

Start up is negligible: Tooling (the metal injection molds) is about $15,000; the plastic parts are about $12,000.

The Maze is Modular: Modular is powerful. Each unit of the maze is comparable to a building block that attaches to the next block; this creates a sort of endless maze “possibility” both horizontal and vertical. 


For example a 3x3 unit kit (9 units) could make up a horizontal square, a vertical square, a long line, an L shape, the famous T shape, or the customer’s own designs. The more units added, the larger the maze becomes, and thus endlessly customizable. Eventually we can add options for custom work, custom design and limited editions.



How this came about: I was looking for a basic “rat maze”. I went to stores, I searched on the internet and no matter where I looked I was unable to find one. I did find a tiny mouse maze (wrong size), a tube kit for hamsters (still not a maze and the wrong size), and a tube box combo thingy that was also too small and still not a maze. But even the toys I did find for rats didn’t have the configurability and possibility for unique and as exciting a design that a maze system has. There are about half a million homes that have rats as “pets” and even more homes that have other critters needing entertainment. 500 kits will be just .1% of that number!

Niche Market: Being a part of a niche market can be a huge asset and this need is currently not being served.  We will be the only modular rat maze for sale on the internet and have the opportunity, time and passion to make it happen. Your contributions will help us serve this niche market by creating 500+ rat mazes & a renewable business model.  Your help will create an ongoing long term business!


Other interesting factoids

Add-ons: Walls with special shapes for recognition, doors, ramps and other fun creative stuff can add to the animal’s experience. If there are extra funds, it will be used for these optional parts

Packaging: Will be minimal and have low impact on the project and environment.  Currently, the packaging will be a shipping box with sleeve, but please offer suggestions.

"Made in USA": Why? Because I was born on the 4th of July and while we live in a world economy, I live in the United States.

Bases: The bases have several cool design elements

Translucent material so we can watch our critters play
Doubles as ceilings
Interlocking design to create any size maze needed.
Special base for multilevel maze

Walls:  The walls have been designed with several elements

Will fit in any direction placed in between columns
Have holes designed into them to hold columns
Some are at 90 degree angle and some are at a 45 degree angle
A double wall that is twice as long as a normal wall (or twice as tall depending on how you look at it) is also included

Columns:

Fit into the tops and bottoms of bases
Hold up to 8 walls
Can be made in several lengths
Fit into walls to help little critters climb up to the next level
Create a see though block for critter learning.

Add-on products and future development:

Custom walls with shapes for learning such as circles, squares, etc...
Reward systems
Teeter totter
Slides
Walkways
Ramps
Curved walls
Opaque walls
Clear walls
And other cool ideas (please submit some!)





 

Please Contact me and let me know what you are thinking! I could use opinions and thoughts. I want this to be a reality and every little bit helps!

We realize not everyone has a pet critter so we made some of our perks with the respect to your “perk trophy shelf” ( a single unit of the maze )
Everyone who funds our campaign will get a point of recognition based on your contribution level. A huge thank you on our webpage and a pile of products based on your level of support.  Without you, we don't exist. If you just wish to support without obtaining the product that’s fine! Just let us know and we will doubly thank you on our site.

PERKS
A unit is a part of a kit
A kit is a bunch of Units (9 in this campaign)

story:
Operation "Protective Edge" is drawing to a close. As the IDF completes the withdrawal from Gaza, we want to do our part to make sure that the Israel Defense Forces are fully prepared with all of the tools they need, should there be another emergency call-up in the future, to protect and defend Israel & the Jewish people. 

We (private Israeli soldier parents, together with My Israel Charity (UK) and Friends of the IDF) have already raised over 100,000 nis ($30,000) for important goods for the IDF soldiers - head flashlights, camelbak water carriers, non-electric phone chargers & the like. NOW......

Two elite IDF Paratrooper Units (reservists) need 160 pairs of Asolo Power Matic 400 GTX Hiking Boots. We have secured them at 50% off, at 600 NIS a pair ($175). These extremely fit paratroopers are sent ahead of the combat soldiers on special reconnaissance missions. They need to be quick on their feet while carrying heavy loads, as they seek out tunnels and the whereabouts of terrorists. These soldiers have not complained, and do their job in the best way they can, and know that there is no extra army budget at present to replenish or update their gear.

That's where you come in. 

Help us purchase these 160 pairs of boots, vital tools in helping "our boys" carry out their life-saving missions and protect our people and the Land of Israel.

On behalf of the brave, special soldiers of the IDF, we thank you for ANY help you can contribute to our mission.

Please be advised that all donations are through Cuban Hebrew Congregation, a 501 C3. You can also mail checks to Cuban Hebrew Congregation, 1700 Michigan Ave, Miami Beach, FL 33139. Please make the check out to Cuban Hebrew Congregation and indicate that the donation is for the Boots for Our Boys Campaign.

story:
Hello!

My name is Rumbie a Zimbabwean fashion designer :) I was raised in Botswana, studied in Zimbabwe and eventually completed a tertiary education in Fashion Design and Technology in South Africa. One of the most memorable moments on this journey as a designer is from the time I was in high school. I was ready to study fashion but the school I went to in Zimbabwe didn't cater for ‘fashion subjects’. After some serious convincing, I influenced the introduction of Textiles as a subject in the final 2 years of high school just so I could qualify to study Fashion at a University in South Africa. It worked :). I graduated 5 years later with a Masters degree in Fashion Design and Technology then proceeded to work with one of Africa’s successful fashion entrepreneurs, Nkhensani Nkosi, who mentored me in business. This opportunity allowed me to work closely with buyers from the leading retail stores within South Africa. My intense ambition drove me to birth my brand in 2012. Besides just being absolutely in love with fashion, I also started this brand to be an inspiration to aspiring entrepreneurs in societies like where I come from. Societies characterized by unstable social, economic and political conditions. I believe that the global success of my brand will be a beacon of light proving that anyone can do what they love and anything they set their minds to against all odds.

Last year I showcased at Zimbabwe Fashion Week, and what a great experience it was. I put a lot of hard work into the collection and it paid off. From that exposure, I have been selected to represent my country at two international events! World Fashion Week has approached me to represent Zimbabwe in Paris, and Africa Fashion Reception has also approached me to showcase a ready to wear collection in three different countries including Canada and Paris(again!). I have taken a leap of faith with these opportunities which are launching me into an international market, exposing my collections to much needed buyers and press from around the world. This will help me make a difference in my society and my brand as I have to now assemble the right team within my community to work with me in building the collections. I am also planning my own travel and accommodation for these events. With the help of everyone who believes in my talent, I know we will make a difference.

What I Need & What You Get

The platforms I will be showcasing on also come with great financial responsibility in production of the clothes, the travel and accommodation expenses to the venues. To execute the best quality products, I have to put together the right team for production that is the pattern makers, seamstresses, fabric factories, printers & embroiderers. The production alone will cost about US $2500. I will then have to travel to the designated countries where the events will be taking place at least 3 days before the shows to allow for fittings rehearsals and preparations. The transportation and accommodation cost from southern Africa to all the venues will be an additional US $6000. Firstly your help to get lots of publicity for the shows is greatly appreciated. You are already part of the amazing journey by reading this campaign and spreading the word to all of your friends, family and anyone you know who might have an interest in my projects.

Secondly I will need help with the financial part of this venture. Anything helps! I am offering perks for small and large donations like sneak peeks of outfits, original signed illustrations, accessories and even the actual garments before they hit stores!  I will post regularly to keep you updated with all the developments.

The Impact

My participation in the fashion events will attract the much needed buyers and press which will create a demand for my products and grow my brand to the next level. I am excited to go out and learn new things on these international platforms,  and  apply the knowledge to make a difference with in my local community. Long term I believe I will play a role in solving the unemployment situation through job creation in domestic production processes. 

    Other Ways You Can Help

    No worries if you can't contribute financially! Thank you in advance for reading my campaign, and feel free to spread the word. Please, tweet, post, update Facebook , text, email, and call (word of mouth) to tell people about the events.

    For more information about me and my last collections, please visit my website www.rumbiebyrumbie.com and "like" my Facebook page (Rumbie By Rumbie) or follow me on twitter and instagram (@rumbiebyrumbie). 

    I'm counting on you to help me out! A huge thanks in advance! :)

story:
So DailyBasics is an Underwear Company?

DailyBasics is a premium online retailer which offers a curated selection of high quality men's products, including:

  • Undershirts - Crew & V-Neck
  • Socks - Dress & Athletic
  • Underwear - Boxers & Boxerbriefs

Our mission: to ensure you feel fresh, comfortable and confident - inside and out! 

We offer convenient, free delivery so you never have to run to the store again the night before a big event and overpay for undershirts at a department store or risk not finding your size.  Never run out of fresh undershirts again!  

Who We Are

Allison, Akshay and Dan didn't dream of starting a men's underwear company when they were little kids. But fate intervened. The three met in business school and discovered an epidemic: working professionals are busy, traveling frequently and always on the go. They hate to spend precious free time on weekends shopping for basics.

We are launching DailyBasics to solve this problem.  We've been working on this startup for the past year - going through many rounds of product samples to make sure they are excellent quality that we would want to provide to our own friends and family!  By backing our campaign, you will get to try our amazing products at a steep discount AND have the opportunity to support the community! 

What We Need & What You Get

Our crowdfunding goal  is to raise $10,000:

  • Get excited!  By supporting us now, you can try our premium products at a steep discount. 
  • Try our product bundles and sample several DailyBasics' products at once!  Refill your entire underwear drawer! 
  • Most of the money raised will go toward our first order of inventory. 
  • A small portion of funds will go toward expanding our product into extended sizes, so our products can be enjoyed by a greater audience - including those taller than 6'5".   

 

What Makes Our Products Superior

 

Our Partners 

 

 

How we Started Daily Basics

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We really hope you give DailyBasics a try, but even if you don't need Men's undershirts, please share this site with your friends and family who may need our products!

  • Please help us get the word out to men everywhere!
  • You can use the Indiegogo share tools to share our campaign with your social networks.

THANK YOU for your support!  Please share your feedback in the comments section - we would love to hear from you.

story:
INVENTORY UPDATE:

  • Black color is sold out
  • Brown is limited quantities


Media coverage: 



From Concept to Reality


Our partners are standing by and excited to start crafting your Uber Good Wallet. We feel absolutely confident in our ability to deliver the Uber Good Wallet on time and without cutting any corners. And, we will work as hard as we can to make that happen.


Uber Good Wallet has been in testing since over a year. All this while, we've worked closely with our partners to remove any production bottlenecks and make sure everything is just right.  With our pre-launch efforts and planning, we feel confident in our ability to deliver your Uber Good Wallet in a timely fashion and without cutting any corners. 

Of course, unforeseen challenges and hurdles may still occur, especially when you have international shipping involved. Be rest assured, we will work with you to make sure you are happy. 

For us, Uber Good Wallet is not just a wallet. It's a medium through which we can make a difference in the world and a reminder that your purchase helped someone in need. That means a lot to us, we will work as hard as we can to make sure we deliver nothing but a delightful experience with our campaign.

Join the Uber Good community and stay in touch!

  • Twitter
  • Facebook
  • Instagram
  • Pinterest

story:
This project's goal is to create a professional and extensive PDF exporting tool for Inkscape - an Open Source vector graphics editor.
With this plugin you will be able to save your projects - designed with Inkscape - in Press Quality, ready for delivering to printing houses. Below you will find the key features of our project and some screenshots of current development stage.


  Here are the main features of this plugin:



Extended PDF export options.



Exporting your projects in RGB or CMYK color space, using color profiles. 





Adding custom bleed area, as well as crop & bleed marks to your projects



Quality and compression settings. Possibility to export text as curves. 



 


Where will the money go?

The project is in early development stage. The money will allow us to hire professional programmers, so that they can work full-time preparing this new feature of Inkscape. The completed software is going to be free and open source (under GPL), available at our website.


What's in it for you?

First of all, you will recieve a very usefull piece of software - especially if you are a graphic designer. Secondly, if you support us with:

1 - 20$ you will be credited at our website
20 - 100$ you will be credit at our website, and you will also receive a printed 2012 calendar promoting Inkscape
over 100$ you will be credit, you will receive our calendar and also a cool metal pen, with Inkscape logo engraved on it.


Who are we?

We are professional graphic designers, working with Adobe's and Corel's software on daily basis in printing industry. We are also huge fans of open source applications, wishing to move from Windows to Linux one day. To do that we need a really professional software under Linux. We hope that this project will bring us a step closer to our goal.
story_txt:
This project's goal is to create a professional and extensive PDF exporting tool for Inkscape - an Open Source vector graphics editor.With this plugin you will be able to save your projects - designed with Inkscape - in Press Quality, ready for delivering to printing houses. Below you will find the key features of our project and some screenshots of current development stage.  Here are the main features of this plugin:

Extended PDF export options.


Exporting your projects in RGB or CMYK color space, using color profiles. 


Adding custom bleed area, as well as crop & bleed marks to your projects


Quality and compression settings. Possibility to export text as curves. 


 

Where will the money go?
The project is in early development stage. The money will allow us to hire professional programmers, so that they can work full-time preparing this new feature of Inkscape. The completed software is going to be free and open source (under GPL), available at our website.

What's in it for you?
First of all, you will recieve a very usefull piece of software - especially if you are a graphic designer. Secondly, if you support us with:


1 - 20$
you will be credited at our website


20 - 100$
you will be credit at our website, and you will also receive a printed 2012 calendar promoting Inkscape


over 100$
you will be credit, you will receive our calendar and also a cool metal pen, with Inkscape logo engraved on it.




Who are we?
We are professional graphic designers, working with Adobe's and Corel's software on daily basis in printing industry. We are also huge fans of open source applications, wishing to move from Windows to Linux one day. To do that we need a really professional software under Linux. We hope that this project will bring us a step closer to our goal.

story:
Tired of hunting through pages of search results that
don’t meet your needs in order to find what you are looking for?

The New up and coming Search browser,
Meseek.com Is the solution for you!

Unlike the larger search engines, which focus on mass amounts of data, Meseek.com is designed to focus on the users specific data needs. Searches return customized results, that match search trends, page ratings and liked sites instead of hundreds of pages filled with sites that are barely relevant and you will probably never actual view.

Meseek.com offers its users a chance to customize their search results with its new T.I.E algorithm. Users can rate pages based on relevance and usefulness as well as like and ignore search results. The search engine will produce results to better match users’ requirements based on the user’s site ratings and what users search most making it a completely intuitive engine.

The more users that interact with the search engine the more customized and robust the results GROW based on what you search!

Rating a website result is easy as well! Once you have logged into your account a quick click on the number of stars, one through five, and the site is rated. You can easily change your assessments as well by simply clicking a different star rating. 

The site will remember your ratings and either produce more similar results or remove them from your search based on your rating!

If you don't want to take advantage of T.I.E to customize your results you don't have to... Simply search Meseek.com for your web results without creating an account.

Like most search engines, Meseek.com offers text and banner ad options for individuals and companies looking to promote their site online. We give Advertisers more Click Stats and Tracking Methods to ensure not only the best possible traffic, but also what users are clicking on your ads and the cost incurred. We hide Nothing unlike the other Giant search engines that make dubious claims...

Meseek’s PPC accounts allow those looking to place advertisements the ability to choose between text and banner ads to customize their cost-per-click ads and choose related keywords.

In order to keep the playing field even, the site pays out a staggering 51% of click share revenue to all publishers who are willing to place ads on their sites. This is quite a bit more than other companies, including Google’s AdSense... 

Publishers looking to sign up in order to earn money from ads can create a publisher’s account and set up what type of banners and text they are willing to allow on their site.

Meseek.com offers a great deal of customization and Publishers can chose to allow only text or banner ads on their sites, choose from a variety of color options and determine what size and shape ad will be displayed. Publishers no longer have to worry about eyesores appearing on their pages; instead they can choose options that match the sites set up and color schematics.

As both an opportunity to make money and a way to write about your passions, Meseek Articles gives writers a chance to publish articles in a variety of different categories including, gaming, science, technology, news, teen issues and more. 

Articles earn writers money based on the number of ad clicks which can either be paid out or transferred to an advertisement account where it can be used for pay-per-click advertisement. Meseek offers a Search Engine that could cost you NOTHING to Advertise!

There is also a Finance tab on the site that allows investors to look up stock symbols. The page can be customized to remember stock symbols so investors can see stock prices, increases and decreases, volume and so on, for their favorite stocks or for their portfolio in seconds, without having to research them over and over. 

Meseek.com also has a variety of different Games, simply for fun. Join in competitions against your friends and gamers around the globe for bragging rights and top scores. 

Prizes Coming Soon!

Why we need your Support?

We believe we have the Next Generation Search Engine using our Patent Pending T.I.E algorithm which enables each user to have and control their very own search engine when logged in.  

By showing your support you are enhancing our ability to continue design, development, and advertisement in order to share this with the World!

Thank you for your interest in the Meseek.com Search Engine!

story:
Mariclaro Bags and Wallets are

  • made from the original car seats of classic cars like Mercedes, BMW, Cadillac, Honda
  • one- of -a -kind pieces
  • relics of history stamped with the car each piece came from
  • handmade to last by us in our studio in Canada!

Here's our story

Contemporary green designs and craftsmanship from bedroom production to International boutiques

We are an independent Canadian design project. Our passion lies in incorporating the history of recycled material into beautiful and functional accessories. Attention to detail, layers of history and ethics are present in each of our creations. We believe in beautiful, unique, well-crafted designs made out of sustainable materials.

We (Willa and Sven) met around 5 1/2 years ago somewhere in the woods between Ottawa and Toronto here in Canada. We grew quickly from small - time bedroom production in rural Ontario into a successful design project. You can find our designs in boutiques worldwide. We also design bags for the Mercedes museum in Stuttgard and TEDx Talks.  Most importantly,  we continue to stick to our initial principals – making  unique and sustainable designs here in Canada.

Why the campaign?

With Indiegogo we want to give individuals the wholesale price by creating a giant wholesale order. This way we are able to give you a bag or a wallet at deep savings. When we've raised $10K, we can make this happen. Each item will be handcrafted by us in Canada.

At $30K, we will able to bring Mariclaro one step further and create an awesome new collection to offer you. You may be thinking we will do this by outsourcing internationally, but rest assured-- none of the principles of how or why we produce items will change, and they will continue to be made by our same standards, in Canada.

Our commitment

Our fundamental outlook is that life and beauty depend on how we use our resources.

We believe that design and innovation can have a positive effect on the environment. Hence, we need to be intelligent in the ways we use our resources here on planet earth. That’s why we are committed to designing new items from quality material that will extend the lifetime of the initial material, and last for another lifetime. We have found that by using the luxurious leathers and upholsteries from cars, we are able to create high- quality and extremely durable accessories. Our products have a unique history, and reflect our commitment to the environment.

We have been doing this for the last 5 years, and will continue to explore the path of sustainable design.  To realize ideas which are seen as improbable involves risk. It’s not the easy way, by far, but we are committed to design, and our environment, and so we boldly continue. 

Tell me more about the bags and the wallets

All the items we present in our Indiegogo campaign are handmade by us from the original car seat material of classic cars like Mercedes, Cadillac, Honda, and Volvo .

Using car leather is not only cool, but it extends the lifecycle of the leather another decade!

The first step of making the bags and wallets is sourcing the materials. Every week, we are on the hunt for the leathers of old luxury cars in scrap yards all over Ontario. After sourcing the material, we clean it and organize it by car brand and color.

Now begins the designing and sewing. Because the materials are specific to the car they originated from, every item needs special attention. We carefully select the materials for each bag, and join the pieces together in ways inspired by how they come out of the vehicle. We combine the car seat leather with high quality 69 nylon thread, 600 denier polyester liner, and metal hardware to assure their long life time. And that’s what you get – a one- of-a- kind piece designed to last a decade.

I am in, I want one! What’s next?

Simply check out the perks and choose the one you like best! For each perk, we have a chart showing the available colors and associated car brands. When you get one, we will send an order form where you will choose the colour you wish. Due to the nature of the material, we cannot promise the specific car and colour combination before they are made, but you will have the chance to rate your preferences of car model 1 to 3 (1= gold, 3 is bronze) and we will send your item in this range. 

After choosing your perk, tell your friends! Remember, the more orders we get, the less material in landfills. Together we can make this happen!



FAQ

Do we ship internationally?

Yes, we ship world- wide.

Can I request a specific car brand for the material used?

After the campaign, we will send out an order form to all the backers so that you may choose the colour you wish. Due to the nature of the material, we cannot promise the specific car and colour combination before they are made, but you will have the chance to rate your preferences of car model 1 to 3 (1= gold, 3 is bronze), and we will send your item in this range. 

What liners are for the bags available and how can I choose them? 

There is no liner on the wallets. For the bags, we offer and option of black, grey or burgundy( high quality 600D polyester) , or a patterned polyester, often in floral or geometric. The latter is the more environmentally- conscious choice, because it consists of new material off-cuts from a furniture upholstery factory.

Here you can find the specifications of the furniture upholstery we are using:

http://www.specfurniture.com/sites/default/file...

Is there a warranty on the items?

Our designs are warranted against defects in materials and workmanship for 365 days from the shipping date. The warranty does not cover reasonable wear and tear or abuse.

We do want you to fully enjoy your Mariclaro bag until the end of its life, and we want to see our designs on the streets, so we will always repair our creations even after the first year.  We will have to charge a small fee to cover the shipping and a small fee for labour, but we will keep it reasonable.

Can I receive my bag / Wallet before Christmas?

Unfortunately, we are not able to deliver your item before the holidays. This is a big project and it would be underestimating the scale of it to promise your item before the New Year.

If you want to use the award as a holiday gift, we can send you a gift certificate specifying your order so that you can give your gift on the special day.

story:
We have designed a bag that makes hitting the gym before or after work easier. As an attorney, it was difficult to fit exercise into my chaotic schedule. We have designed a bag that keeps everything you need for your day organized and clean, so you can easily fit the gym in before, during, or after work. 

 

FEATURES

The Everyday Duffle is designed to make your life easier by helping you keep your clean clothes ready for work and your dirty clothes isolated from the rest of your gear. The everyday duffle comes in three color options.  We've designed the bag with two shoe pockets: one for your dirty gym shoes, and another one for your work shoes. The bag also has a roll garment bag to keep clothes from getting wrinkled, a dopp kit for your bathroom essentials, a waterproof laundry bag for your dirty clothes, two external pockets, and four internal pockets.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  

MATERIALS

To make sure that the Everyday Duffle is durable and will last, we started with the highest grade materials.

The leather on this bag is vegetable tanned leather that is sourced from one of the oldest and most respected Italian tanneries in the world.  This leather is durable and will age beautifully with each additional use. 

For the exterior of the bag, we chose a 10 oz. waxed cotton to make the bag water resistant and durable. In addition, we used the most reliable zippers on the market, YKK zippers, to ensure that the bag will last.

 

 

 

 

 

DESIGN

When we started designing the Everyday Duffle, we wanted to have a great looking bag that was also functional and easy to use.  After numerous iterations, we were able to incorporate the functionality we needed for everyday use into a great looking bag.

 

PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS

 

 

 

Production Timeline 

9/17 - Kickstarter Ends 

10/17 - Send Our Survey

10/17 - Send Purchase Order to Factory

1/18 - Finish Production

1/18 - Ship Products From Factory

2/18 - Ship to Customers

PAST CAMPAIGNS 

Check out what people are saying about other products! 

 

Check out last three Kickstarter campaigns below:

THE MODERN DAY BRIEFCASE

 THE BRETON WEEKENDER

THE USER-FRIENDLY WALLET

 

INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING: IMPORT DUTY AND TAXES

We can collect import duty and taxes for certain countries. We will collect these additional fees in Backerkit after the campaign closes. We are able to collect import duty and taxes for all member countries of the E.U., UK, Canada, South Korea, Mexico, Brazil, and Chile. 

 Import Duties and Taxes will not be charged on the Convenient Minimalist Wallet by Austraila, Hong Kong, New Zealand, and Singapore. 

 Unfortunately, we are unable to collect import duty and taxes form any other country.

Here is a handy tool that can assist you in calculating duties. Remember to convert the US dollars to your local currency:

http://www.dutycalculator.com/new-import-duty-a...

story:
Zubits® make your shoes insanely easy. Just imagine...

  • Slip into wide open shoes as if there were no laces at all. 
  • Never tie laces again. Close with a simple magnetic click.
  • Remove your shoes hands-free.
  • No more tying, knots, double knots, or laces coming undone.
  • No more ugly floppy bows. Just a clean looking shoe.
  • Magnetically pair up your shoes and organize them in new places.

 

 

 

Summary

People have been raving about Zubits magnetic lacing solution since we first created them four years ago. Now we are offering them on Indiegogo for the best prices anywhere. 

We invented magnetic shoe closures out of our garage in California. Some Chinese knockoffs have tried to copy what we do, but their quality and strength are so poor that they are useless to use.  They are just not strong enough to actually work.

We've had so many positive reviews and supportive feedback from people of all walks of life. From runners, kids, elders, hikers, triathletes, adults, arthritis sufferers, gadget fans, gym goers, people with autism, occupational therapists, cross-fit buffs, moms, and everyone in between, they've told us how much they love their Zubits closures.

We will be ready to ship

Your support will help us have the funds for another production run.  We should be able to deliver as soon as the campaign is ended or very soon after.  

We have shipped thousands of Zubits closures before, both in the USA and all parts of the world, so we do not expect any delays or problems.  See the pictures at the bottom of packaged Zubits closures that are ready to ship.

Get your perks at the lowest price found anywhere!!

Frequently Asked Questions

  1. How can Zubits closures be easy to step out of, but stay on securely when I run?
    1. The force when you step on your heel with your opposite foot is very strong. So the Zubits magnets will separate when you do this. Consider that even with your regular shoelaces double-knotted, you can still step on your heel and squeeze out of your shoes because this action generates a lot of force. People do it all the time. But when you run, your shoes still stay on. When you run, the shoelaces are mostly lifting the weight of your shoe. Zubits are engineered to be incredibly strong for their size. Zubits can hold your shoe secure while running and jumping, but they will split open when you step on your heel because the forces are much greater.
  2. Will the magnets lose their strength?
    1. No. Not unless you find a way to heat them over 176° fahrenheit. Neodymium magnets don’t lose their magnetism over time or from other magnets (ceramic refrigerator magnets can). The magnets are enclosed in plastic and protected from corrosion and elements.
  3. Will Zubits work on any type of shoes?
    1. Zubits work on nearly any shoes in which you would normally tie the laces. They don’t work with velcro shoes because there are no laces. Zubits work great on boots. There is a little challenge on boots with speed laces (no holes up top) but there are work-around to make them work. Hard sole shoes like soccer or baseball shoes can also cause the Zubits closures to pop open from time to time. Please choose size #3 Zubits for the most secure hold.
  4. Do Zubits magnets hold securely?
    1. Running, going to the gym, riding a bike, playing at the playground, and most recreational sports activities won’t be a problem for most users of Zubits. Zubits have been designed to be much stronger than normal neodymium magnets alone. They are designed to hold your shoe securely during use, while still being easy enough to pop off when your done. Therefore, Zubits are offered in different sizes to reach a balance between secure use and easy release. So if you ever have concerns about performance, we recommend you choose the next stronger size Zubits than would normally be recommended for you. The stronger size magnets are not that much harder to pop off. My large male friends have used Zubits for running and the gym with no problems. Zubits are designed for casual shoes and recreational sports, so there are some high-level sports in which Zubits could separate under extreme movement or by larger individuals. If high performance is of great importance, again, choose the size #3 Zubits or if you are a large individual, consider not purchasing Zubits for that activity. The variables that affect Zubits are heavy individuals, extreme movements or flexing, and particularly stiff soled shoes. Zubits are usually not recommended for hard-sole athletic cleats used for soccer match play, High School football, or organized sports. When my 6’5” 235lb friend made hard running cuts on grass with his stiff soccer cleats, the Zubits popped open about 5% of the time. So this is why we can’t say they work on all people and all shoes all the time. In any situation, loosening the laces just a little greatly helps prevent them from splitting during activity.
  5. Will I come home with nails stuck to my shoes?
    1. No. Zubits closures have been specifically designed to greatly reduce any external magnetism emitting from the plastic casing of the Zubits. Nearly all the magnetism is directed toward the closing face of the magnet. It is difficult to stick even a small screw to the side of a Zubit. We have just never seen this be a problem in actual use. And you won't come home with nails stuck to your shoe. Of course, if you separate the magnets, metal will certainly stick to the face of the magnet, but it’s no problem to slide something off. In the video, when we hang the shoes to a metal object, this is being done by the face of the magnets, not with the Zubits closed.
  6. Can Zubits pinch fingers?
    1. Zubits rarely pinch fingers in normal use, but a pinched finger is possible and can sometimes cause some pain. People need to grab the outside of the magnets to pull them together. Thus users rarely place their fingers where the magnets join. Putting a child’s whole finger between even the strongest adult size magnets only “holds” a finger with no discomfort. That being said, a child can play with the Zubits and it can be possible to get the side of a finger pinched. We recommend that parents do the installation. When our own children play with our the magnets and get pinched (we have had many laying around the house), they are more startled than hurt and they continue playing with the magnets anyways ignoring the discomfort. Adult fingers are generally too thick and tough for much pinching to occur.

  7. For International shipment, will I have to pay customs or import taxes?

    1. Every country has their own Duty or VAT tax policy, some charge it and some do not. And sometimes packages go through without being charged Duty and some times they get stopped to pay Duty. It all depends on the country and the local customs office. So these are charges you may have to pay and they are charges made at the discretion of your country's policy. We hope that you don't get charged, but if you do, you are supporting your country's services. It is your responsibility to know and pay to import a product into your country. And legally, Zubits cannot list a purchased product as a "gift" or with a dollar amount below the purchase price. That's just the laws we are required to follow.

Ready to Ship
story_txt:
Zubits® make your shoes insanely easy. Just imagine...

Slip into wide open shoes as if there were no laces at all. 
Never tie laces again. Close with a simple magnetic click.
Remove your shoes hands-free.
No more tying, knots, double knots, or laces coming undone.
No more ugly floppy bows. Just a clean looking shoe.
Magnetically pair up your shoes and organize them in new places.

 
















 
 
Summary
People have been raving about Zubits magnetic lacing solution since we first created them four years ago. Now we are offering them on Indiegogo for the best prices anywhere. 
We invented magnetic shoe closures out of our garage in California. Some Chinese knockoffs have tried to copy what we do, but their quality and strength are so poor that they are useless to use.  They are just not strong enough to actually work.
We've had so many positive reviews and supportive feedback from people of all walks of life. From runners, kids, elders, hikers, triathletes, adults, arthritis sufferers, gadget fans, gym goers, people with autism, occupational therapists, cross-fit buffs, moms, and everyone in between, they've told us how much they love their Zubits closures.

We will be ready to ship
Your support will help us have the funds for another production run.  We should be able to deliver as soon as the campaign is ended or very soon after.  
We have shipped thousands of Zubits closures before, both in the USA and all parts of the world, so we do not expect any delays or problems.  See the pictures at the bottom of packaged Zubits closures that are ready to ship.
Get your perks at the lowest price found anywhere!!
Frequently Asked Questions


How can Zubits closures be easy to step out of, but stay on securely when I run?The force when you step on your heel with your opposite foot is very strong. So the Zubits magnets will separate when you do this. Consider that even with your regular shoelaces double-knotted, you can still step on your heel and squeeze out of your shoes because this action generates a lot of force. People do it all the time. Therefore, Zubits are offered in different sizes to reach a balance between secure use and easy release. So if you ever have concerns about performance, we recommend you choose the next stronger size Zubits than would normally be recommended for you. The stronger size magnets are not that much harder to pop off. My large male friends have used Zubits for running and the gym with no problems. Zubits are designed for casual shoes and recreational sports, so there are some high-level sports in which Zubits could separate under extreme movement or by larger individuals. If high performance is of great importance, again, choose the size #3 Zubits or if you are a large individual, consider not purchasing Zubits for that activity. The variables that affect Zubits are heavy individuals, extreme movements or flexing, and particularly stiff soled shoes. Zubits are usually not recommended for hard-sole athletic cleats used for soccer match play, High School football, or organized sports. When my 6’5” 235lb friend made hard running cuts on grass with his stiff soccer cleats, the Zubits popped open about 5% of the time. So this is why we can’t say they work on all people and all shoes all the time. In any situation, loosening the laces just a little greatly helps prevent them from splitting during activity.


Will I come home with nails stuck to my shoes?No. Zubits closures have been specifically designed to greatly reduce any external magnetism emitting from the plastic casing of the Zubits. Nearly all the magnetism is directed toward the closing face of the magnet. It is difficult to stick even a small screw to the side of a Zubit. We have just never seen this be a problem in actual use. And you won't come home with nails stuck to your shoe. Of course, if you separate the magnets, metal will certainly stick to the face of the magnet, but it’s no problem to slide something off. In the video, when we hang the shoes to a metal object, this is being done by the face of the magnets, not with the Zubits closed.


Can Zubits pinch fingers?Zubits rarely pinch fingers in normal use, but a pinched finger is possible and can sometimes cause some pain. People need to grab the outside of the magnets to pull them together. Thus users rarely place their fingers where the magnets join. Putting a child’s whole finger between even the strongest adult size magnets only “holds” a finger with no discomfort. That being said, a child can play with the Zubits and it can be possible to get the side of a finger pinched. We recommend that parents do the installation. When our own children play with our the magnets and get pinched (we have had many laying around the house), they are more startled than hurt and they continue playing with the magnets anyways ignoring the discomfort. Adult fingers are generally too thick and tough for much pinching to occur.


For International shipment, will I have to pay customs or import taxes?
Every country has their own Duty or VAT tax policy, some charge it and some do not. And sometimes packages go through without being charged Duty and some times they get stopped to pay Duty. It all depends on the country and the local customs office. So these are charges you may have to pay and they are charges made at the discretion of your country's policy. We hope that you don't get charged, but if you do, you are supporting your country's services. It is your responsibility to know and pay to import a product into your country. And legally, Zubits cannot list a purchased product as a "gift" or with a dollar amount below the purchase price. That's just the laws we are required to follow.


Ready to Ship

story:
WE MAKE WHAT WE LOVE.

WE ❤ WHAT WE DO.

BUT OVER THE YEARS, WE NOTICED THAT SOMEHOW, ALONG THE WAY, WATCHES HAVE BEEN LESS CREATIVE. 

SO WE SET OUT TO BUILD FASHION THROUGH ELEMENTS.

TIMELESS WRIST ART — FASHION FORWARD, HEART AND SOUL ART. BY USING SIMPLE EVERYDAY ELEMENTS. SO ESSENTIAL, WE REALLY CAN'T IMAGINE WRISTS WITHOUT.

Our goal is to offer an honest product that doesn't sacrifice quality! 

 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Thank you for checking out the Drift! We've received a ton of support getting this far and we’re really excited to finally share all of our hard work with everyone. We've worked hard to develop incredible watches that are infused with 100% real wood. There are tons of watches on the planet that are stylish, but nothing like Drift! Please help us raise $10,000.00 so we can push our first designs to production!   

 

 

With your support, we'll be able to bring the watches to life, and you can be the first to wear these awesome designs! All watches are made in women's and men's designs! 

- Kas & Zack

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

We think Drift watches are a wonderful design treasure that shouldn't be taken lightly. So we've put our product design experience to the work over the past months preparing for watch revival with improved craftsmanship for all to enjoy. Our updated watches feature 100% real wood and stainless steel bands, Japanese Quartz Movement all wrapped up in an original, vibrant design. The end result is the perfect blend between timeless style and modern.

The specs:

100% All Natural Wood

Stainless Steel Band and Case

Japanese Quartz Movement

Stainless Steel Butterfly Clasp

Splash Proof

Adjustable to fit any wrist size

Band lenght: 230mm (9")

Band width: 23mm

 

 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

 

Our Back in Black Style

Our Classic Style 

   

Our Modern Style

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The new Drift watches will combine the best of the past and the present. We’ve taken the timeless design of the original watches and rebuilt them using 100% real wood! Check it out!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Our biggest goal with this Indiegogo project is to get Drift watches out into the world so they can be enjoyed and compliment your style. As a result, the rewards for your support are pretty simple: you get Drift watches!

 

 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

      

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Every rewards tier will include a handwritten thank you card and a permanent spot on our website as a team member. After that, we have a few options to choose from, all of which will get you at least one Drift watch. Check them out here, and alongside the campaign to the right. All U.S. shipping is $10, and if you are an international friend, please add 15USD to your pledge.  

  • $5: The handwritten thank you and social media shout out!

  • $90: One Drift watch (any style)

  • $170: Two Drift watches (any style)

  • $250: Three Drift watches (any style)

  • $300: Four Drift watches (any style)

  • $450: Six Drift watches (any style)

That pretty much sums it up. We really appreciate all of your support. Without your support we will not be able to fund our designs. Please know that anything helps! Thanks again for checking out Drift!

 

 

 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Website: www.driftco.us

Email: driftcous@gmail.com

Facebook: www.facebook.com/driftco

Twitter: www.twitter.com/driftcous #driftco #driftcous

Pinterest: www.pinterest.com/driftcous

 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

 

 

FAQ

I'm having trouble with Paypal or am not sure that my payment went through.  What can I do to complete my contribution?

Sorry to hear about the difficulty!  If you're having any trouble at all contributing via Paypal, or if you want to confirm that your payment went through, please contact us at driftcous@gmail.com.  We'll do everything we can to smooth it out and make it as simple as possible for you!

How do I pick my watch style?

Don't fret! Here is how Indiegogo works: we receive your contact information when you contribute, and after the campaign, we'll reach out to have you confirm the style you'd like.    

What's the timeline for receiving the watches? 

 

Given the many moving parts coming together for the first time in this inaugural production run, we've estimated that we will ship the watches your way in August. Thank you for your support and patience during the process of building this company! 

 

 

Risks and challenges? 

There are always challenges involed in the manufacturing process that have the potential to delay delivery, but we have built strong realtionships with our partners and we are confident that we will meet our August 2013 deadline.

We have done our dotted our i's and crossed our t's creating a thorough business model, with suppliers ready and willing to begin production.

This indiegogo campaign will launch our first line, but we plan to expand and further develop our brand, but we can only do this with your support.

 

Thank you for your time and welcome to the Drift Co. Team!

 

Kas And Zack

story:
The Story of in.joy

The Who-Ha of where I came from and where I'd like to go...

I'm an artist who loves to work with my hands. I've been making art since I was a little girl, always crafting up something new. Whether it was making a new outfit to wear out of extra material or beading a new pair of earrings from scratch, there was never a shortage of creativity involved. I loved to paint as a child, still do! All of this led me to where I am today as a Wardrobe Stylist and a Jewelry Designer. This campaign however is specific to my Jewelry line.

in.joy launched in 2009 after taking several metalsmithing classes and embarking on a journey that led me to Bali, Indonesia. After launching my website in late 2012, I've been really excited to get the online store up and running. This is where i came to a road block...

By simply just asking for your support I have already accomplished a huge part of my goal; being vulnerable enough and willing to ask for help! However, your monetary support would truly make my thoughts become my reality. With your help and support, I will be able to fully fund this adventure to create my jewelry, have it  be available online and move forward towards furthering the success of my business.

What We Need & What You Get

Here it is broken down in further detail...

The number "29" is very specific to how it relates to me personally at this stage in my life as I enter into a new phase of my growth and development. Yet, still being realistic about what I need to get the first line made, produced & available for purchase online, I am looking to raise $2,900. The money goes directly towards the purchasing of all materials needed (metal, stones, wax)  as well as for the labor to produce the pieces in multiple quantities.

Just like a new movie or a series of webisodes seeks funding for your entertainment purposes, I seek funding for your gift giving & adornment purposes. It's all a matter of art!

Every donation you make, no matter how small, will be put directly into the production costs, allowing in.joy to bring creative manifestations into fruition and available to the public. Whether we reach the entire goal or not, the money will only be used for the above described purpose- To start production for the pieces that have been hand carved in wax, designed and ready to be made into wearable heartfelt jewelry.

I love jewelry myself which is why making it myself is so rewarding. As a supporter to this campaign, the rewards and perks are very exciting. As an example, you get more for your buck by joining the cause then by purchasing an individual piece. As a sponsor and mini backer, you reap the benefits by owning your own pieces at no additional cost to what you contribute. I want you to feel as rewarded as I do when I make a piece of jewelry and witness how much appreciation and love the recipient feels after receiving the gift.

Other Ways You Can Help in.joy

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help...

If you are unable to contribute at this time, we sure could use your help in getting the word out about the in.joy campaign. Please pass this along to your friends and family and share it via your social media of choice (Facebook, Twitter, etc)

Here is a direct link you can also share: http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/in-joy-jewelry


Thank you doesn't even express my appreciation for you, your time & support!


With love + gratitude always,

Xx

Meesh

story:
Summary

GetWoodie was established March 2013 by Dayquan McCall, owner of TikiMan Store LLC (http://www.tikimanstore.com/)

This campaign coincides with the launch of GetWoodie (http://GetWoodie.com) and is integral part of gaining exposure for the company as well as enabling it to obtain creative product packaging that GetWoodie supporters will appreciate. 

Contributors will help GetWoodie obtain product packaging that will reflect the precision and creativity of our products.  At the moment we do not have any product packaging so products are shipped without any packaging (inside of bubble wrap and cushion shipping envelopes).  Packaging from an established product packaging company will add a level of professionalism that will help get our products in to retail stores.

 

What We Need 

  • Funding goal of $27,495
    • $10,000 for product packaging from Tanda Francis Art & Design (http://www.looplooploop.com/slideshow/print_pack.html)
    • $17,495 for Mini 24" x 12" (50W) Laser Engraving System (http://www.epiloglaser.com/product_line.htm) 
  • If the goal is not reached, funds will go towards the same purpose.  The balance will be made up for via loans from Geneva Capital and Bank of America.

What You Get (Perks)

  • Wood GetWoodie logo Sticker
  • Personalized wood sticker
  • Wood Phone Skin for iPhone 4/4S/5 and Samsung Galaxy S3
  • Wood MacBook Pro Skin  

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about GetWoodie.
  • Add GetWoodie on instagram (http://instagram.com/getwoodie/)
  • Add GetWoodie on Twitter (https://twitter.com/getwoodie/)
  • Like GetWoodie on Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/GotWoodie)  
  • Repost the link, send to your friends, family and any listservs you may be a part of.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Last but not least: comment, like, repost, retweet, and tag GetWoodie product images and be sure to add "I Got A Woodie!"

Personalized wood sticker
Wood Phone Skin for iPhone 4/4S/5 and Samsung Galaxy S3
Wood MacBook Pro Skin  


 
 


Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

Get the word out and make some noise about GetWoodie.
Add GetWoodie on instagram (http://instagram.com/getwoodie/)
Add GetWoodie on Twitter (https://twitter.com/getwoodie/)
Like GetWoodie on Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/GotWoodie)  
Repost the link, send to your friends, family and any listservs you may be a part of.
Use the Indiegogo share tools!


Last but not least: comment, like, repost, retweet, and tag GetWoodie product images and be sure to add "I Got A Woodie!"

story:
Magzook was born on a highway.

While riding his motorcycle through Michigan, Devin found the cuff of his pants blowing up and exposing his legs, which resemble that of a yeti. He thought there'd already be a product on the market to remedy this annoyance, and he quickly found something to meet his needs, purchased it online, and hit the open road. This overpriced solution quickly failed, and he knew that he could create something of higher quality at a lower price point.

Not having a clue how to sew, the first prototype was made using copper wire, elastic nylon, two magnets and a metal clip. Seeing that it worked, he asked his grandma to teach him how to sew using her antique 1951 Singer Sewing Machine. Armed with a few metal clips, some spare webbing, and four magnets, he created the first pair of bootstraps called MagStraps. He soon realized the tightening system could be applied to other products, and after days of stitching and fine tuning the MagBelt  came to life.

With two magnets, some belt webbing and a metal ring, Devin created a magnetic belt that eliminates belt holes, belt overhang and adjusts to fit perfectly to your waist--even if you gain or lose weight. Devin wanted to get the product to market quickly and was looking for a business partner to help him along the way. At the time, Devin was driving for Lyft to help fund the idea. He picked up Kyle as a rider  one Saturday morning, showed him the MagBelt, and they soon decided to partner.

After deciding to launch the MagBelt on Kickstarter, they knew they'd need a great video and asked Mike to fly down from Seattle and help them out. After seeing how awesome the MagBelt was and it's pants-hoisting potential, he joined the Magzook team.  

Support Us, We'll Give You a Belt...or Four 

If you support MagBelt on IndieGoGo, you'll get a sweet belt. Give more and get more MagBelts—pretty much the definition of a win-win. If you want a belt that fits great, stays put, adjusts if you gain or lose weight, and generally looks awesome, then you need a MagBelt. 

“Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.” - Leonardo Vinci
story_txt:
The MagBelt is the perfect belt for everyone. It looks great in the pool, a night on the street, and will keep your pants up at all times--whether it be jogging, folfing, ice-fishing, playing Free Bird for your fans, performing acrobatic maneuvers, twerking, or just standing around...looking ice cold. 





 



 style="">  




  Choose from 4 different belts and buckles.

The MagBelt works for everything, from meetings to mountains.

While riding his motorcycle through Michigan, Devin found the cuff of his pants blowing up and exposing his legs, which resemble that of a yeti. He thought there'd already be a product on the market to remedy this annoyance, and he quickly found something to meet his needs, purchased it online, and hit the open road. This overpriced solution quickly failed, and he knew that he could create something of higher quality at a lower price point.
Devin invented the sliding magnet system to secure his boot straps.
Not having a clue how to sew, the first prototype was made using copper wire, elastic nylon, two magnets and a metal clip. Seeing that it worked, he asked his grandma to teach him how to sew using her antique 1951 Singer Sewing Machine. Armed with a few metal clips, some spare webbing, and four magnets, he created the first pair of bootstraps called MagStraps. He soon realized the tightening system could be applied to other products, and after days of stitching and fine tuning the MagBelt  came to life.
Devin's actual grandma. Not a paid actress.
Devin's motorcycle boots and his grandma's sewing machine.
With two magnets, some belt webbing and a metal ring, Devin created a magnetic belt that eliminates belt holes, belt overhang and adjusts to fit perfectly to your waist--even if you gain or lose weight. Devin wanted to get the product to market quickly and was looking for a business partner to help him along the way. At the time, Devin was driving for Lyft to help fund the idea. He picked up Kyle as a rider  one Saturday morning, showed him the MagBelt, and they soon decided to partner.
Meet the team! Kyle Johnston, Devin O'Neill and Mike Sternoff
After deciding to launch the MagBelt on Kickstarter, they knew they'd need a great video and asked Mike to fly down from Seattle and help them out. After seeing how awesome the MagBelt was and it's pants-hoisting potential, he joined the Magzook team.  
Whether giving a presentation or fly fishing, you're backing a belt that goes both ways.
We have sizes from Small to XXL.
Great for work. Man purse not included.
They're like a bunch of awesome magnetic cinnamon rolls.
Support Us, We'll Give You a Belt...or Four 
If you support MagBelt on IndieGoGo, you'll get a sweet belt. Give more and get more MagBelts—pretty much the definition of a win-win. If you want a belt that fits great, stays put, adjusts if you gain or lose weight, and generally looks awesome, then you need a MagBelt. 
“Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.” - Leonardo Vinci
We're the three best friends that anyone could have!
Product Warning:
The MagBelt contains powerful magnets that could be potentially harmful to people who have implanted medical devices such as pacemakers. Persons who have these devices should not wear the MagBelt. To avoid damage keep metal objects and media devices such as computer disks, tapes, and credit cards away from the MagBelt. Magzook assumes no liability for loss, destruction, and/or damage to any person and/or objects.

story:
Under 5 Minutes to a Brand New Look 

Just plug it in to start brushing your curls straight.
It’s that simple.
 

 

 

 

 ALL Types of Hair 

Curly, wavy, frizzy. All fabulous. All VAVOO-able.

 

 It’s like that thing you saw once...

 Only this one's much, MUCH better.  

 

 

 Features 

 


But our favorite feature is the most obvious one. Unlike some of the other ones you find on the shelf today, it works, and it works extremely well. 

It also comes with a 1-year warranty. Just in case anything goes awry.

 

 Full 360° Heat Safety 

 

VAVOO's protective back is made from temperature resistant coating. 
Because what's cooler than being cool? Not getting burned.

 

 Just the Right Temperature for YOUR Hair 


Hair isn't one-size fits all. Different hair types require different temperature levels.
That's why VAVOO lets you adjust the heat to find your perfection.
Anywhere from 338°-410°F (170°-210°C)

 

  VAVOO: A Look Inside  

 

VAVOO massively minimizes risk and severity of hair damage even in the long term.
Because it's made from quality components, not whatever was least expensive.

 

 A Travelling Gal’s Best Friend 

Look great no matter where you go.

Comes with standard US plug (EU & UK & AUS plugs available too, we'll ask before delivery)
Universal product (110w-220w power)
Cautionary safety regulations ( ETL & CETL safety certificates)

 

 The Finest Material: Ceramic Coated Plate 

 

You don't apply cheap and potentially harmful cream to your skin...
So how can you trust your hair with anything but the best? 


 What’s in the VAVOO Box 

 

 

  • 1 VAVOO (with a plug fit for your regional outlets)
  • A manual (with your warranty information) & safety certificates

That's it. You don’t need anything else. No serums, no creams, nothin'.

 

 Some Photos from the Process 

We started with some frustration at the current state of so-called straightener brushes, and overcame it with a stubborn mission of creating one that's awesome.  Then we researched by buying all the straightener brushes we could find, and reverse engineered them to find their shortcuts and issues.

In the meantime, we also interviewed lots and lots of girls with all sorts of hair to find out what was most important in a straightener brush.  Sometimes it wasn't in the words they said, but in the way their face shined when they saw a feature or touched a button. After that came designing and engineering and lots of tweaking and testing, finding the right manufacturers, and now we have an amazing prototype that works amazingly.
 

 And Now, It's Like THIS 

 

 Why We Created VAVOO 

 

One day, while eating breakfast together, Dan's girlfriend Viki was trying to straighten her hair with a straightener brush she was convinced to buy at the mall after seeing the woman use it on a wig.

Problem was, when she got home and tried to straighten her own hair, it didn't quite work, or work at all. Being the great boyfriend he is, Dan tried to help her figure it out, but quickly got super-frustrated. Being an entrepreneurial, solution-finding kinda guy, he called up his best friend Mor, and they got right to work. They didn't really pick their head up until... VAVOO.

We hope you love it as much as Viki and our other testers do, and thanks for supporting us. 


                       Mor, VAVOO Co-founder & CEO.

                                   

 

 Back VAVOO with Trust 

 

This isn't one of those hopeful, amateur-ish crowdfunding campaigns. 

This is a sure thing, "a there's no way we sleep until it's in your hands" kind-of-thing.

Why are we so confident?

We finished up the prototype and it's ready to go.  We have everything already set up and ready to go as soon as we hit GO.

We also have 7 years of intense eCommerce experience, and have developed and sold a few products already. That helps too.

Oh, and then there's the fact that we're super-confident this is the best, highest quality straightener brush. So-much-so we're offering a year warranty on all VAVOO brushes.

Every VAVOO comes with a full one year warranty
Just in case.

 

 A Satisfying Brush Stroke 

 

 

 

 Rewards 
 


 

 

 Timeline 

 

 

 Meet the Vavoo Team 

 

 

 

   Marketing Team

 

 We're Social
