story:
STARBABY ENTERPRISES - making our dreams come true, by helping yours.


The Burlesque Boudoir - Fashion Week

Starbaby Enterprises is celebrating it's one year anniversary by kicking off New York Fashion Week (NYFW) with their new production, The Burlesque Boudoir. 

The New York City based marketing company continues to provide a unique Fashion Week Experience for both the public and industry members.
New York Fashion Week is a private, industry-only occasion, that happens twice a year, and Starbaby Enterprises wants to include all fashion followers and devotees to a luxury event that allows everyone to feel like a VIP Guest.

This event will take place on September 4, 2014 at Opus 51 in New York City, featuring a live lingerie fashion show and burlesque performance, showcasing designs by up and coming UK Designer Louise Ferdinand Lingerie and Celebrity Designer Stevie Boi Shades. 

As one of Starbaby Enterprises' goals is to provide top tier PR and production to entrepreneurial designers, we are providing  Louise Ferdinand with the unique opportunity to have her first runway show in New York City during Fashion Week.

In addition to providing the fashionable entertainment, for this event, Starbaby Enterprises has aligned themselves with the amazing breast cancer charity, Walk the Walk America.This innovative organization works around the globe raising awareness and funding for different breast cancer research and survivor support initiatives.  


A Bit About The Company

Starbaby Enterprises was founded in 2013 by Actress and entrepreneur, Jordan Elizabeth Gelber. After working for several years in marketing and PR for both the fashion and entertainment industry, Jordan felt stifled and demotivated. She was stuck in positions that didn't fully utilize her strengths, leaving her unable to realize her full potential. 
Noticeably, there were many in the same position, and Jordan ventured out on her own to correct this by providing an individualized brand marketing strategy to aid others to be successful in their chosen field.
Our typical client is someone in either the fashion or entertainment industry, who is both talented and motivated, but may not have all the resources to reach their desired business objectives.
Many of our clients are often working solo on their ventures, and may not have the branding experience, funding, or PR network to get noticed. 
The process is to make ourselves available to these individuals and figure out what their business identity, goals, and budgets are. After a thorough evaluation, we create high caliber projects and/or marketing campaigns, like The Burlesque Boudoir, to give them the brand presence they so badly deserve at a reasonable investment.
Every client and project we take on is treated with the utmost care and respect. Whether it be a solo venture who is working two other jobs to support their new clothing line, or a great charitable cause, our number one goal is to make their venture's future a better one.

Your donation and where it goes

Starbaby Enterprises works with a vast network of like-minded partners and affiliates. However, some projects require us to branch out of our network and secure production assets that still require funding. That's where you, our beloved sponsors and investors, come in. 

In order to make this project a success, we need to achieve a certain level of production. Top tier buyers and press need to be "wowed" and entertained with new and exciting events. It takes the right venue, the right entertainment, and professionalism all around. Only so many of these things come free.

Curious about where your sponsor dollars are going? Here is a short list:

  • Production for the Fashion Show (ex. lighting, chairs, hair, makeup team)
  • Models 
  • Burlesque Dancers & Entertainment
  • Printed Marketing Materials (flyers, step & repeat, programs)
  • Virtually and Digitally Based Marketing (Social Media Campaign Sites, Marketing Services)
  • Venue Rental & Bar Guarantee
  • 20% of your donation goes directly to Walk The Walk America

    The Challenge

    As mentioned, our biggest challenge is getting the right audience to attend the event. We work incredibly hard to put on an enticing show for fashion media and buyers. Once we get them in, it is a guaranteed home run. We have a tried and true business model that has proven its success with past events such Janique Fashion Week, LQUID Launch Party, and the Heavenly Sinful Spring Fling; all of which you can read more about on our Company Facebook Page


      Other Ways You Can Help

      Don't feel that a monetary donation is for you? We understand. Do us a favor and help share our project with others. Send them to our event page at The Burlesque Boudoir - Fashion Week or our Facebook event page.

story:
Souschef is the world’s first multi functional kitchen-top storage device. Its 6-in-1 capabilities are:

  • Storage of up to 12 dry ingredients (fine to coarse)

  • Dispense ingredients based on teaspoon, tablespoon and cup measurements

  • Inbuilt memory for recipe storage and all-at-once dispense

  • Serving size based dispensing 

  • High quality wooden chopping board

  • Embedded weighing scale

Souschef ensures you have all the tools to achieve perfection in the taste of your cooking every time, for any occasion. It truly is your sous chef! 

 

As Seen On:

  

 

  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

ABOUT MY ORDER

How can I order a Souschef?

You can get hold of your Souschef through our Indiegogo page here. Backers will be the first few to receive their Souschef units thus, saving them a lot, since the retail price will be higher.

I placed an order for Souschef, but I did not get a confirmation email. How can I check the status?

Please refer to this article on How to Check if Your Contribution is Successful. If the issue persists, you may contact us at www.souschef.co with the subject heading “PRE-ORDER CONFIRMATION”.

There was an error with my contribution. What is the issue?

Please refer to this article on common contribution errors and steps to resolve: Common Contribution Errors.

ABOUT SOUSCHEF

How do I set up Souschef upon delivery?

Souschef will be delivered with a step-by-step instructions manual. It can be set up in 3 simple steps:

  1. Fill in the jars with the dry ingredients from your grocery shopping

  2. Assign each jar a name using the User Interface

  3. You are now ready to use Souschef to dispense ingredients precisely

Follow our instruction manual to explore more features such as Recipe based dispensing, low level notification and many more. Believe us. Souschef is straightforward for anyone to set up and use!

Can I manually choose ingredients and the quantity while cooking?

Yes! When you are using Souschef, you always have the control to manually select the ingredients and their quantity. Just key into the device as usual, and the needed will be dispensed.

What happens if one of the jar does not dispense properly?

Souschef is a modular device. So even if one of the jars stops dispensing, you can easily replace that module. All you have to do is contact us and we’ll immediately ship you a new one at a very nominal cost.

What kind of jars do I get with the $199 perk?

You will get a total of 12 jars, 6 for fine ingredients and 6 for coarse ingredients.

If you want to customize your jars based on your preference and cooking methods, just fill in the contact form at www.souschef.co with the heading “CUSTOMIZE JARS” within one week after backing us.

What happens if I use more bigger granules than fine powders?

Souschef comes with 6 jars for fine ingredients and 6 jars for coarse ingredients. If you want to mix and match your jars according to your preference, fill in the contact form at www.souschef.co with the details within one week after backing us.

How can I clean Souschef? Is it dishwasher safe?

Souschef has been designed to have minimum cleaning and maintenance.

Both the wooden top and dispensing cups can be rinsed with water. The cups are dishwasher safe while the wooden top is not.

Can I use my own jars in the device?

Souschef comes with customized jars and dispensing mechanisms that fit perfectly in the device. So any other jar will not be compatible.

ABOUT DELIVERY 

Where do we ship?

Souschef is available worldwide. International shipping dates may vary depending on certification.

When will we start shipping?

Souschef’s super-early bird pre-orders will start to be fulfilled around June-July 2016 based on first-order, first-deliver basis. Souschef team will keep you updated of your shipping status closer to delivery.

ABOUT PERKS

$25 perk: What colour is the apron?

The apron is white, with a black Souschef logo.

$50 perk: What colour is the T-shirt?

The T-shirt is white, with a black Souschef logo.

$50 perk: How can I claim the $50 voucher and what can I use it for?

You will receive the voucher along with the T-shirt. You may use the voucher in the future when you wish to purchase Souschef at its retail price.

Can I get the units of the bundle package delivered to different addresses?

Not yet. In the current release, bundle package can be delivered to only one address.

Can I purchase additional jars?

Yes! You can fill the contact form at www.souschef.co with the heading “CUSTOMIZE JARS” within one week of placing order.

We will send you the price list and other details.

HOW CAN I CONTACT YOU?

You can send in your queries via our website’s enquiry form. We will get back to you within 1 working day. We won’t keep you waiting by sending automated replies.

Please also read through the FAQ first to find your answer. We are receiving a lot of special requests, and are responding as fast as possible!

For questions related to the Indiegogo campaign, you can contact us via our website www.souschef.co

Souschef has been designed to have minimum cleaning and maintenance. 
Both the wooden top and dispensing cups can be rinsed with water. The cups are dishwasher safe while the wooden top is not. 
Can I use my own jars in the device?
Souschef comes with customized jars and dispensing mechanisms that fit perfectly in the device. So any other jar will not be compatible.
ABOUT DELIVERY 
Where do we ship?
Souschef is available worldwide. International shipping dates may vary depending on certification. 
When will we start shipping?
Souschef’s super-early bird pre-orders will start to be fulfilled around June-July 2016 based on first-order, first-deliver basis. Souschef team will keep you updated of your shipping status closer to delivery. 
ABOUT PERKS
$25 perk: What colour is the apron?
The apron is white, with a black Souschef logo. 
$50 perk: What colour is the T-shirt?
The T-shirt is white, with a black Souschef logo. 
$50 perk: How can I claim the $50 voucher and what can I use it for?
You will receive the voucher along with the T-shirt. You may use the voucher in the future when you wish to purchase Souschef at its retail price.
Can I get the units of the bundle package delivered to different addresses?
Not yet. In the current release, bundle package can be delivered to only one address. 
Can I purchase additional jars?
Yes! You can fill the contact form at www.souschef.co with the heading “CUSTOMIZE JARS” within one week of placing order. 
We will send you the price list and other details.
HOW CAN I CONTACT YOU?
You can send in your queries via our website’s enquiry form. We will get back to you within 1 working day. We won’t keep you waiting by sending automated replies. 
Please also read through the FAQ first to find your answer. We are receiving a lot of special requests, and are responding as fast as possible! 
For questions related to the Indiegogo campaign, you can contact us via our website www.souschef.co

story:
emmortal Clothing Co.

For those who don't know me, my name is Joshua Quarles. I am currently a student and track athlete at Cerritos College, 18 years of age and I am pretty much just your average every day person that's trying to start a business. As you can imagine it's hard enough to keep up my grades as well as be a dedicated athlete, but on top of that it's hard to find work hours that fit my schedule. I'm not a genius and God knows I'm not a member of a rich family or rich myself and I guess I wanted to help prove that as long as you have the drive to achieve a goal, you can do anything. emmortal Clothing Company's goal is to celebrate those who have helped make the world a better place through their talent. We will produce clothing that are inspired by famous artists, musicians, actors, role models ext. Other than famous role models, emmortal also stands for things that have impacted society and what society has improved on. emmortal Clothing Company will be producing a collector line, those shirts will be limited and made out of better material and original artwork, you wouldn't want to wear a regular t-shirt again. I have many goals for my company to achieve, I just need a decent start, any donations received will go towards funding the marketing and design of our company. Even if you can't donate you can still help by spreading the word of emmortal Clothing Company, but of course any amount would be appreciated. Thank you for all the help.

story:
Roger's Beginning

Roger started his fashion career designing clothes for both men and women with fine fabrics directly from Kenya and the Ivory Coast. His dedication to offering innovative styles in the highest- quality fabrics allowed him to build a strong client base.  Soon after, Roger expanded into European styled clothes to meet customer demands. As the business "kept growing" Roger decided to focus on men's fashion which lead into the opening of Roger's Menswear. Roger had found his niche catering to men sizes medium to 6X.

 "It seemed like I was the only retailer in this region that was catering to the taller gentleman. Since then that has been my niche, supplying a quality dressing experience to men who are most times directed to that small section in the back of the store labeled BIG & TALL." 

In 2008 the economy hit a tough road which caused Roger to close his business, but this was only to be temporary. Some clients and customers would later see Roger throughout the years and ask about the business and when would he begin again. It wasn't until Shaneka, his eldest daughter, returned from fashion school that ignited the spark to build this collection and manufacturing company. Just like before Roger has built a team of dedicated constituents to transform Roger's Menswear into the R.C Turner Collection. 




The inspiration behind the collection is culture. America, the melting pot of many peoples, cultures and styles. How often do we recognize all of the cultures that have contributed to this vast country. As a fashion student at Kent State University Shaneka was able to scribble in many courses that helped shaped her perspective of the fashion world as well as the cultured world.

 "In my spare time I studied Pan-Afrikan studies and attended events hosted by the Russian club, the German club, the Hispanic clubs, the Native American clubs and so on. So when I returned home all I could imagine was constructing a fashion line that embraced the nature of culture- fashion in a refreshing manner." 

We are in an age of enlightenment, every few decades artist hit a new peak of creativity. It is time we embrace something new from the hands of a talented, skilled man and his artistically innovative daughter. Giving menswear a revamp from past into a new era of renaissance fashion. While remaining true to the tradition of quality fit, fabric and  style.

I hope you enjoy!


The Funds

We have made progress in constructing our first collection and acquiring branding as well as legal necessities. Now we need your help raising funds for:

  • Manufacturing of Samples: We are finishing up our first collection and will need to start producing samples to show local businesses.
  •  Storage for Samples: After we get the samples made and shipped we must have a location to store them.
  • Transportation: Our sales representatives will need funds for transportation. To get from store to store.
  • Supplies for design house: We will be purchasing new mannequins, better sewing machines, fabric and other necessities. 
  • Build our Design Team: We are looking for individuals to add more talent to our team. Anyone interested please contact Shaneka via menswear@rctcollection.com

The Impact

The R.C Turner Collection is looking to partner with a local non-profit CBDC. This organization dedicates their time to uplifting youth in the community that would be deemed as "at risk" or "problem children". So far they have played an active role in mentoring students, especially young men in local schools across New Castle County. Their mission is to provide support and knowledge in a trade or skill that will help individuals become successful in the future. 

The R.C Turner collection will provide supports in training these young men and women as well as mentorship. In the future we plan on providing monetary support as well as employment to individuals in need.


Risks & Challenges

It wouldn't be business if their weren't any challenges.

  1. Finding a retailer willing to cater to the larger man. As we mentioned before, not many retailers in the region were willing to cater to sixes above 2XL. That is why this is our number one challenge.
  2. Embracing or Inclusion of all culture. Some culture we don't relate to, please don't take it personal. Respect.
  3. The ability to distribute our goods in a timely manner. Getting goods manufactured and shipped is a timely process that can cause an issue when trying to make a deadline.
  4. Choosing a suitable manufacturer. We must find a manufacturer that shares the same expectation of quality that we do. We also plan to be manufactured in America as well.

Other Ways You Can Help

Give from the heart... all donations are welcome but not all support is monetary.

  • Share our campaign on your Facebook or any other social media page
  • Email your friends and family. Maybe you know someone who would be interested in our product or services.
  • Join our team: If you have skills in fashion or business contact us to join our team. 
  • "Like" our Facebook page and share with friends.

story:
All about Sustainability

Change is the only option to sustain our world and that starts with being aware that every purchasing choice can make a difference. We are committed to genuine sustainability. Our jackets are bought with the Fairwear Foundation label (Corporate Social Responsibility) and have high standard certifications (GOTS, OCS 100, OCS Blended, OEKO TEX, REACH) to prove our commitment to sustainability. You can read about the Fairwear Foundation here http://www.fairwear.org/22/about/.

For the spirit of giving

Here, in our town in Germany, we have many refugees from Syria. In the spirit of giving, while so many have given to me, I would like to offer to also give. If my fundraising efforts are met I would like to donate 10 jackets to our local refugees here. I did not originally intend to do this, but realise that for sustainability we also need to sustain the human spirit. Always give forward.

Stickt Jackets

When my first daughter was born I started my first business with my mom, selling handmade european wool diaper covers (handmade by me www.humbird.eu).  My second business, Stickt, is all about creating quality crafted jackets that reflect what an individual you are.  Stickt is my passion for creating jackets that look good and made with quality materials by people that are fairly treated. It is difficult to find a really nice looking zipped hoodie that is original,  looks good, and is manufactured helping protect the Earth and its people. 

Join us today.

We create jackets that represent you.  

                               

Funds will go towards:

1.  Very high quality multi-needle embroidery machine that will allow larger quantities to be produced due to the shortened time needed and produce a better stitch. 

2. The set up of a new website. The domain www.sticktclothing.com is already owned by Stickt.

3. A set of Fairwear Foundation jackets to begin creating a Stickt jacket.

Perks:

$25-Key Fob

   $50-Limited Edition Stickt Shirt

                                       $70-Organic T-Shirt plus Key Fob                                       
      

$100-2 Shirts plus Key Fob

  


$150-Stickt Jacket (Dahlia or Compass) 

            

$250-Stickt Jacket with theme choice and sleeve.

                                                                                                                     

Perks are mailed at various times due to the fact that some are already made and some are not.  I have never mailed out a late package and don`t intend to now which is why I have given myself a bit of a cushion.  You will probably be surprised with an early arrival.  So join me now and be surprised =)

A little bit about Eva and I

I studied biochemistry at the University of California-Davis.  I worked in the lab of Steve Anderson after graduation and began studying to become a chemistry teacher. I then taught chemistry in California until I went back to school, this time UC Santa Cruz to study chemistry.  While there I had the opportunity to teach in Salzburg at the International School.  My second month there I met my now husband at the rock climbing gym and have been in Germany ever since.
I met Eva at our current job and she quickly became a trusted friend and a person to turn to.  She is always willing to give her input and model for me. She is German and lives here with her husband and daughter.

                  

Your impact

ALL contributions make a difference so jump on and join.  You are contributing to a company leader with a successful track record.  You can see my current success and good reviews with my diaper cover business on eBay (humbirdcreations) and can also view my current website www.humbird.eu.

You might be wondering, if I have a successful business why do I need funding for a new one.  My current business is successful in that it has given me the means to create my prototypes, buy a quality home embroidery machine, and support my sewing habit.  It is not a high income business.  What it has done is given me the insight and experience needed to get a business started and running.  I created the website, I take the photography, I set the prices, and I know what it costs to run a business through the last 4 years of throwing myself into it.  So don`t wait, join me today.

Other Ways You Can Help

Share, Share, Share my links.  Talk about it with people

And that's all there is to it.

          

Testimonials for various clothes I have created:

1.  Bought this as a gift and she loved it!

2.  Beautiful work... Perfect size!! I just ordered another one... Can't wait to get it

3.    "Hallo Dawn!

Vielen lieben Dank für die schönen Überhosen und die Geschenke!

Ich bin wirklich sehr zufrieden damit.

Meine Tochter hatte bereits chronische Windeldermatitis und wir waren schon am verzweifeln, weil nichts helfen wollte, auch nicht die vom Arzt verschriebene Creme.

Seit wir Stoffwindeln in Kombination mit deinen Überhosen verwenden ist die Dermatitis weg!"

4.   "Liebe Dawn,

vielen Dank für die tolle Windelüberhose. Sie passt perfekt und hält wirklich trocken.

Ich wünsche Dir für Deine weitere Zukunft alles Gute und viel erfolg mit deinem Humbird- Shop. Ich werde den auf jeden Fall weiter empfehlen

Franziska

5.  Guten Tag, 

Die Hosen sind hier angekommen. Sie sind sehr schön. 


These embroidery designs by Urban Threads and KatieLDesigns.  They rock.

Testimonials for various clothes I have created:


1.  Bought this as a gift and she loved it!
2.  Beautiful work... Perfect size!! I just ordered another one... Can't wait to get it
3.    "Hallo Dawn!
Vielen lieben Dank für die schönen Überhosen und die Geschenke!
Ich bin wirklich sehr zufrieden damit.

story:
Our Story:

Chakana Roots is a fair trade artisan collective that incorporates repurposed Andean fabrics into contemporary designer fashion.  Each pair of boots is a unique, one of a kind, hand crafted creation that is made by a family of multigenerational cobblers.   

What is Chakana Roots all about?

We directly work with the amazing artists that we are honored to call friends and familia.  All of our funds go directly towards supporting a way of life that is wholesome and honorable.  We are striving to bring a moral and upright business to the market place in which artists are honored and recognized for creating amazing and unique products.

Through supporting Chakana Roots, customers are insured that footwear is original, fresh and funky and created by an artist in a workshop instead of an anonymous laborer in a factory.  We aim to create one of a kind pieces of art and we want to offer the opportunity for everyone to artistically create their own pair of custom footwear!  We think that everyone is an intrinsically an artist and want to invite them to be able to dream up and create their own pair of boots!

Where is your money going?

Your generous contributions will be used to support Chakana Roots and our mission in the following essential ways:

  • Fair-trade and ethical product development and production! 
  • Our latest improvements to all of our boots, which will include a comfier insole and a sleek leather inside lining. Also, now offering a sleek outer brown leather option too!!
  • Funding for our new and improved state-of-the-art website that allows people to interactively be able to create their own custom boots and matching custom clutches!
  • Expenses involved in getting Chakana Roots to trade shows/events to further our market exposure!
  • Associated marketing and administration costs which include but are not limited to: advertising, lifestyle and product photoshoots, catalog development, event/travel expenses and all the continual financial unknowns that we experience consistently!!!

Other Ways You Can Help:

  • During our 45 day Indiegogo campaign we will also be offering a 25% discount on ALL of our current awesome in-stock inventory when you shop on our website: www.chakanaroots.com/shop
  • Please use the promocode "letsgogo25" in your shopping cart right before checking out!
  • SPREAD the word about our campaign! LIKE us on Facebook and SHARE this with all your friends and ask them to share! Share on Indiegogo! Help us reach out beyond our current audience so everyone can know about Chakana Roots and our funky company!

Chakana Roots Wants To Stoke You Out With The Following Sweet Perks:

For as little as $5 you can help support a sustainable campaign and a company that is striving to bring more color and creativity into the world through ethical and fair trade business practices.

$5 - Chakana Roots Sticker

Show your support for Chakana Roots by putting a Chakana Roots sticker on your gear!

$10 - Chakana Roots Tote Bag

Get your very own reusable Chakana Roots tote bag for trips to the grocery store and farmer's market!

$15 - Palo Santo (5 Sticks)

Palo Santo is a natural wood aromatic incense used for centuries by the Incas and indigenous people of the Andes as a spiritual remedy for purifying and cleansing, as well as to get rid of evil spirits and misfortune. 

$25 - Stash Pouch

These bright and fun small stash pouches keep all your important items together in one special space!

$30 - Chakana Roots T-shirt

Support Chakana Roots in style with a super comfy 100% Organic Cotton T-Shirt with our sweet logo on both the front and back!

$35 - Funky Headband


This sweet and stylish accessory will have you looking fresh and funky!

$40 - Incan Beenie

This bright beenie will get you more attention and compliments than anything you currently own!

$50 - Peruvian Blanket

Whether you are going to a festival, the park, or the beach, this colorful blanket will keep your scene dialed!

$75 - Custom Clutch

Create a funky custom clutch by selecting your textile and choice of leather directly on our website.


Think about having a custom clutch to match your pair of custom boots!!!

Upon donation we will issue you a promo code so that you can create this custom clutch directly through our website!

$180 - $225: Custom Pair of Chakana Roots Boots!!

Custom order your very own pair of new and improved Chakana Roots Boots and receive over 10% off the retail price! We have designed a comfier insole and a sleeker inner leather lining within all of our boots! AND we are now offering the option to choose between our 15 colors of suede or black or brown shiny leather! Create your dream pair of custom footwear by selecting your favorite color, inner lining, textile and sole! 

Upon donation we will issue you a promo code so that you can create this custom pair directly through our website!  *Please note that shipping is not included through Indiegogo but instead will be collected on our website at time of checkout*

Choose between all our funky styles: 

Apu: 

Uku Pacha: 

Uku Pacha in sleek brown leather: 


Amaru: 

Puma: 

Condor:

Chakana:  

Hanan Pacha:  

Check out all of our styles on our website: www.chakanaroots.com

$1000 - 2 Day Sailing Trip!

Join the founders of Chakana Roots on a chartered all-inclusive two day sailing trip on beautiful Lake Tahoe! Explore the beauty of the famous East Shore, Emerald Bay and the state parks aboard a 26ft live aboard sailboat! A once in a lifetime opportunity to see and experience Lake Tahoe like never before!

$5000 - Lake Tahoe VIP Getaway!

3 day/ 2night Lake Tahoe VIP Getaway for 2 people! This perk includes 2 Roundtrip flights (within the continental US) for you and your guest, lodging, food and much more included in this once in a lifetime experience to live the Chakana Roots life for a weekend. Stay at a 4-Diamond Resort! Sail Lake Tahoe! Hike and bike world class trails! Dine at premier restaurants! Hang out and party with the coolest crew at a Chakana Roots VIP Party!

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT! 

CHAKANA ROOTS LOVES YOU!
story_txt:
Our Story:Chakana Roots is a fair trade artisan collective that incorporates repurposed Andean fabrics into contemporary designer fashion.  Each pair of boots is a unique, one of a kind, hand crafted creation that is made by a family of multigenerational cobblers.   What is Chakana Roots all about?
We directly work with the amazing artists that we are honored to call friends and familia.  All of our funds go directly towards supporting a way of life that is wholesome and honorable.  We are striving to bring a moral and upright business to the market place in which artists are honored and recognized for creating amazing and unique products.
Through supporting Chakana Roots, customers are insured that footwear is original, fresh and funky and created by an artist in a workshop instead of an anonymous laborer in a factory.  We aim to create one of a kind pieces of art and we want to offer the opportunity for everyone to artistically create their own pair of custom footwear!  We think that everyone is an intrinsically an artist and want to invite them to be able to dream up and create their own pair of boots!
Where is your money going?
Your generous contributions will be
used to support Chakana Roots and our mission in the following essential ways:

Fair-trade
     and ethical product development and production! 
Our latest improvements to all of our boots, which will include a comfier insole and a sleek leather inside lining. Also, now offering a sleek outer brown leather option too!!
Funding
     for our new and improved state-of-the-art website that allows people to
     interactively be able to create their own custom boots and matching custom clutches!
Expenses
     involved in getting Chakana Roots to trade shows/events to further our market
     exposure!
Associated
     marketing and administration costs which include but are not limited
     to: advertising, lifestyle and product photoshoots, catalog
     development, event/travel expenses and all the continual financial
     unknowns that we experience consistently!!!
Other Ways You Can Help:
During our 45 day Indiegogo campaign we will also be offering a 25% discount on ALL of our current awesome in-stock inventory when you shop on our website: www.chakanaroots.com/shop

Please use the promocode "letsgogo25" in your shopping cart right before checking out!
SPREAD the word about our campaign! LIKE us on Facebook and SHARE this with all your friends and ask them to share! Share on Indiegogo! Help us reach out beyond our current audience so everyone can know about Chakana Roots and our funky company!
Chakana Roots Wants To Stoke You Out With The Following Sweet Perks:For as little as $5 you can help support a sustainable campaign and a company that is striving to bring more color and creativity into the world through ethical and fair trade business practices.$5 - Chakana Roots StickerShow your support for Chakana Roots by putting a Chakana Roots sticker on your gear!$10 - Chakana Roots Tote BagGet your very own reusable Chakana Roots tote bag for trips to the grocery store and farmer's market!$15 - Palo Santo (5 Sticks)Palo Santo is a natural wood aromatic incense used for centuries by the Incas and indigenous people of the Andes as a spiritual remedy for purifying and cleansing, as well as to get rid of evil spirits and misfortune. $25 - Stash PouchThese bright and fun small stash pouches keep all your important items together in one special space!$30 - Chakana Roots T-shirtSupport Chakana Roots in style with a super comfy 100% Organic Cotton T-Shirt with our sweet logo on both the front and back!$35 - Funky HeadbandThis sweet and stylish accessory will have you looking fresh and funky!$40 - Incan BeenieThis bright beenie will get you more attention and compliments than anything you currently own!$50 - Peruvian BlanketWhether you are going to a festival, the park, or the beach, this colorful blanket will keep your scene dialed!$75 - Custom ClutchCreate a funky custom clutch by selecting your textile and choice of leather directly on our website.Think about having a custom clutch to match your pair of custom boots!!!Upon donation we will issue you a promo code so that you can create this custom clutch directly through our website!$180 - $225: Custom Pair of Chakana Roots Boots!!Custom order your very own pair of new and improved Chakana Roots Boots and receive over 10% off the retail price! We have designed a comfier insole and a sleeker inner leather lining within all of our boots! AND we are now offering the option to choose between our 15 colors of suede or black or brown shiny leather! Create your dream pair of custom footwear by selecting your favorite color, inner lining, textile and sole! Upon donation we will issue you a promo code so that you can create this custom pair directly through our website!  *Please note that shipping is not included through Indiegogo but instead will be collected on our website at time of checkout*Choose between all our funky styles: Apu: Uku Pacha: Uku Pacha in sleek brown leather: Amaru: Puma: Condor:Chakana:  Hanan Pacha:  Check out all of our styles on our website: www.chakanaroots.com$1000 - 2 Day Sailing Trip!Join the founders of Chakana Roots on a chartered all-inclusive two day sailing trip on beautiful Lake Tahoe! Explore the beauty of the famous East Shore, Emerald Bay and the state parks aboard a 26ft live aboard sailboat! A once in a lifetime opportunity to see and experience Lake Tahoe like never before!$5000 - Lake Tahoe VIP Getaway!3 day/ 2night Lake Tahoe VIP Getaway for 2 people! This perk includes 2 Roundtrip flights (within the continental US) for you and your guest, lodging, food and much more included in this once in a lifetime experience to live the Chakana Roots life for a weekend. Stay at a 4-Diamond Resort! Sail Lake Tahoe! Hike and bike world class trails! Dine at premier restaurants! Hang out and party with the coolest crew at a Chakana Roots VIP Party!THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT! CHAKANA ROOTS LOVES YOU!

story:
Our Goal:

To provide our retail customers high quality children's clothing made right here in the USA. 

We at Right Bank Babies don't want to sacrifice quality in our production or take jobs away from Americans by producing overseas. So we are trying this season a bit differently. 

By creating a pre-season campaign we can: 

  1. Guarantee stock on your favorite items
  2. Keep production within the States
  3. Give our loyal customers a great price for pre-orders
  4. Not over or under produce our season, keeping our costs right on track

By purchasing these pre-order products you are not only adding quality clothing to your child's wardrobe, but you are supporting Right Bank Babies as a business and ensuring our production through this season.

We sincerely thank you for your belief in our products and our company as a whole!

About RBB 

INSPIRED CREATIVE PRINTS AND COMBINATIONS. We believe in using proven style concepts, adding a fresh take with a modern print and creating a truly vintage-modern brand. The styles can be a classical or edgy depending on how they are combined and accessorized.

REVERSIBLE.  We believe in REVERSIBLE whenever possible. Reversible designs for children create exponential outfit combinations while giving the added value of a space saving two outfits in one.

LASTING AND SEASONLESS DESIGN. The pieces evolve as your child grows with features like adjustable waists and armholes. Colorful unexpected patterned prints camouflage stains, and designs layer to span from one season to the next.

TRUST IN A MADE IN THE USA BRAND. We support our local community while being able to keep a close watch on safety and quality. We personally visit our fabric mills, printers, cut and sew factories and distribution warehouses regularly. We go above and beyond CPSIA testing requirements and use a local approved lab for testing.

AWARD WINNING GARMENTS: Our fun-yet functional clothes are favorites of the magazines and bloggers. The clothes are used by photographers worldwide and have been in over 200 magazines. RBB is one of the fasted growing Los Angeles Children’s Brands with showrooms in 8 countries.


Our goal is simply $5,000 to start...

but we are confident that we can exceed this goal with the help of our wonderful customers SHARING our Campaign. 


Below you will see our "Perk Items". These are your pre-sale options for purchase. You may choose one perk or all twenty! Just make sure to note what size you will need at check out. These are amazing deals so make sure to take advantage before the campaign expires.

The name Right Bank Babies is based on the Right Bank of the Seine River in Paris, the fashion district. A mom inspired by Parisian life set out to create clothing that is fun, yet functional fashion for children. Right Bank Babies’ clothing philosophy is to stick with styles that surpass trends by creating pieces that can be worn alone as a classical look, or layered for a funkier feel. Don’t save the fancy stuff for special occasions- as every day is a special occasion with a baby. Instead, Right Bank Babies suggests putting the fancy dress over jeans and layer on tee-shirts and sweaters. Children live life with wild abandonment and Right Bank Babies feel that their fashion should reflect that.


Founder and Designer Ellen Uzarowicz: 

"I began Right Bank Babies nine years ago with two crazy babies at home. I wanted fun and beautiful clothes that were lasting, luxurious, fun and practical. I took my love of patterns prints and fabrics from Paris combined it with the vintage styles and tossed in the easy boho layering of Los Angeles. It took off and now I lay in bed dreaming in patterns. My daughters are now 9 and 10 years old and are still my biggest inspirations."

The name Right Bank Babies is based on the Right Bank of the Seine River in Paris, the fashion district. A mom inspired by Parisian life set out to create clothing that is fun, yet functional fashion for children. Right Bank Babies’ clothing philosophy is to stick with styles that surpass trends by creating pieces that can be worn alone as a classical look, or layered for a funkier feel. Don’t save the fancy stuff for special occasions- as every day is a special occasion with a baby. Instead, Right Bank Babies suggests putting the fancy dress over jeans and layer on tee-shirts and sweaters. Children live life with wild abandonment and Right Bank Babies feel that their fashion should reflect that.Founder and Designer Ellen Uzarowicz: "I began Right Bank Babies nine years ago with two crazy babies at home. I wanted fun and beautiful clothes that were lasting, luxurious, fun and practical. I took my love of patterns prints and fabrics from Paris combined it with the vintage styles and tossed in the easy boho layering of Los Angeles. It took off and now I lay in bed dreaming in patterns. My daughters are now 9 and 10 years old and are still my biggest inspirations."

story:
COR MADEIRA : WOOD COLOR

www.CorMadeira.com


Please Help Us! Entwine in the Philosophy...

By wearing or gifting an Entwine, or other Cor Madeira accessory with the signature screw detail, you are spreading the philosophy of togetherness. Our unique adornments are not only fashion statements but social statements as well. Remind on-lookers that we are ONE RACE, with more similarities than differences. We are all braided together with similar materials...


Background ::

Cor Madeira was launched as a solo endeaver, originally braided by the hands of Danielle Nicole. For over a decade, her medium of expression has been paint, but a recent project in textile painting while living in Brazil, has called her to fashion.

 

Danielle was painting scarves inspired by the colors of the northeast of Brazil, wrapping real life women with the patterns in her paintings at the time. In her search to add more texture to the painted adornments, she created a braided component. This soon after, lead to her design of the Entwine, organically becoming Cor Madeira’s signature accessory.

After the Entwine’s rapid success on the beaches of Brazil, Danielle decided to expand the line, and bring it to Los Angeles. Danielle, then, quickly teamed up Los Angeles based designer, Lisette Solis, to create and expand on what they now call Cor Madeira’s ‘eco-chic’ lifestyle. Together they are firmly rooting the company’s philosophy in sustainability and quality design.

With current collaborations in Los Angeles, Brazil and Chile, the goal is to create a network of artisans abroad who sustain the craft of their indigenous artisanal traditions including, South America, South-east Asia, and Africa. The brass screw is a signature mark detailing every piece of Cor Madeira product. It is symbolic of the company’s foundation, rooted in the construction of a sustainable, eco-chic planet.

Philosophy ::

Cor Madeira's signature collection, Entwine, aims to create a social awareness that evokes a philosophy inspired by Mexican philosopher, Jose Vasconcelos. He believed that cultures are intermingling and becoming a 'new human type', even possibly soon to be one race. In the braiding of different up-cycled materials coming from different regions of the world, We showcase our Entwine as a campaign in support of his theory. The screw detail signing every Cor Madeira piece, is to remind us of our connectedness to one another, together constructing one race.

“…the distinct races of the world tend to mix more and more until they form a new human type composed of a selection from each of existent lands”

In “Vasoncelos of Mexico.” John H. Haddox cites Vasconcelos’ theory of the mingled race in the preface of “La Raza Cosmica,(qtd. Vasconcelos 53).


What we need (the specifics)...

The $10,000 breakdown


20% to incorportate as an LLC. and complete licensing and trademarks


15% to do Couer trade show for Fall 2014 (this takes place in february/march 2014)


15% to expand our marketing campaign through brand exposure (packaging, collateral material, photoshoots)


20% to buy needed tools for the workshop (carpentry and metalsmithing)


5% to broaden our network of designers, creating an artists collective to strengthen the CM platform

25% to expand production by finding helping hands abroad who are already trained in their indigenous artisanal traditions.

0% to spread the philosophy of UNITY


Why we need it...

They said be transparent, so here we go...

Cor Madeira is a dream of ours... but more than just a dream, we believe it's mission. We truly believe in the social impact this accessory line can have. But we sincerely need your help to make it happen.

Between the two of us, we have a lot of very valuable skills that can take this company far with low overhead cost.

Half of the story ::

Lisette has over 10 years experience as an apparel/accessory designer and stylist. She knows her materials and has 75% of the tools to create with them. (hopefully after reaching our goal, we can gather the other 25) 

With the relationships she has made over the years in the fashion industry, she has collected a powerful group of friends and fashionistas willing to help her in her dream..... And although her huge artillery of skills are available for trade (from metal-smithing to styling to photography) there only so many favors you can ask. Right? 

Well, since Lisette was already seasoned in fashion design, she decided to go back to school and strengthen her foundation with a marketing degree. Sounds great right!? Well, it will be... The problem she is JUST finishing her return to school. 

What does that mean? STARVING STUDENT!!... and more hungry than ever. This is where you guys come in :)

The other half ::

Danielle also has over 10 experience as an fine artist/designer. She attended OTIS College of Art and Design before she decided to travel to Brazil the first time and volunteer her time teaching art to children. She has on-going project called Universal Pigment, that donates art supplies to existing children's programs abroad. Her desire is strong to make a social impact for the better.

Danielle has also had the fortunate opportunity to oversee production for an American based jewelry company in Brazil, who uphold some of the same standards in sustainability and fair trade that CM hold. These connections and experience are  a priceless piece of the Cor Madeira Puzzle as well.

Danielle is formally trained as a painter but has been working as a graphic artist for the past two years. She is currently juggling her time between freelance assignments and Cor Madeira. 

What does this mean? STARVING ARTIST!!... and more hungry than ever. THIS IS WHERE YOU GUYS COME IN :) :)

WE NEED YOUR HELP!!

We wouldn't be asking if we didn't sincerely need help. We whole-heartedly believe in the social change we can all create in the wearing of these accessories. But it is going to take many of us together, and build.  


What you get...


THE THANK YOU:   

We will have a special dedication page on the website with all of our supporter's names to publicly recognize all of the donations pledged. Every contribution is a large contribution. Thank you! (Delivered December 5)

THE STICKER: 

For your graffiti pleasure, the sticker displays the Cor Madeira campaign for you to easily spread the philosophy... "forming a new human type soon to be one race". (Delivered December 10)

THE HANDWRITTEN POSTCARD: 

A handwritten thank you note from us, Danielle and Lisette, on recycled paper... because we care! :) (Delivered December 10)

THE GIFT CERTIFICATE: 

Each gift certificate will come in increments of different amounts depending on the pledge. These will be redeemable December 5, JUST IN TIME FOR CHRISTMAS! (Please remember it takes 5-10 business days for all orders to be delivered)

THE CD: 

A Cor Madeira CD compilation featuring "Warm Water" by Banks (the song featured on the video). This special mix tape will be produced by Sergio V of The Basement! This is an exclusive offer you can only find here. Once these are gone, they are gone. You don't want to miss this one! (Delivered December 10)

THE SWEETS BASKET: 

Yummy! A basket full of raw chocolates hand picked by us, from Anandamide : Psychedelicatessen. This is sustainable chocolate!.... and a Long Beach local favorite! (Delivered December 10) www.blisscompound.com

THE ORIGINAL SIGNED PRINT: 

These are original signed prints by Danielle Nicole (one half of Cor Madeira). Choose one of three! These are limited edition and numbered. (Delivered December 10) www.tweedlashes.com

THE SPA BASKET: 

These baskets are hand-made with love! All products are made with 100% organic ingredients bottled and wrapped with 100% recycled packaging. Recipes for these delicious potions are gathered strictly from native California plants. If you are thinking about gifting this basket of goodies, you may want to get one for yourself too! We promise this one will keep you inside for the evening. (Delivered December 10)

THE CUSTOM ENTWINE SET: 

You pick the fabric! Tell us what colors and patterns you would like your Entwine to be. You can even send us some fabric that has some sentimental value to you. Maybe it's your kiddo's baby blanket or basinet sheet, or your favorite jeans from high school you don't fit anymore and should have thrown away years ago but can't for reason, or your grandfather's old army socks ;) Whatever your heart desires, we will braid it, and make an Amigo Bracelet to match! (Delivery dates will vary... but we get it to you before Christmas!)


THE TACOS AND BEER: 

Our Favorite! These lucky winners will get to enjoy a hearty meal of Tacos and Beer with us! If you are within 300 miles of Los Angeles, we will come to you with warm smiles and empty bellies ready for a good time! If you are a bit outside our reach, we will still deliver to your door a meal of your choice, of equal or lesser value, accompanied by a picture of us eating Tacos and Beer! (Deliver Dates will begin January 5)

THE PRIVATE DINNER PARTY: 

This eco-chic Dinner Party includes two seats next to the both of us at La Tabela. This is a private dinner by Chef Jerumel Laygo staged on a communal table. The closest 'Farm to Table' experience in Los Angeles. Fresh and organic to gourmet cuisine. (Dates and location will be disclosed at the close of the campaign) www.latabela.com 



THANK YOU! THANK YOU! THANK YOU!

If you can't share monitarily with us right now, please spread the word! This is sometimes the most valuable gift that can be donated.

Every small gesture is a huge contribution to the support of the philosophy. One by one we can we help each other understand that at the core we are the same... many colors entwining to create a 'new human type'.

Wear an Entwine. Share an Entwine. Help us to spread the philosophy!

Thanks for your time! -Cor Madeira

story:
Negash Campaign Summary

Negash Detroit Mantras: 

  • We Represent Loyalty and Royalty
  • We have Royal Blood in our Veins
  • We are Pharoahs 
  • We Create like a Gods, Command like Kings, Work like Slaves

This Campaign is for our New Product Designs & Apparel at Negash International: 

  • We need to produce new inventory in order to stay fashion forward and relevant in the current trends and stay classic in our fashion designs. 
  • We are international, with roots in Egypt/Ethiopia/Saudi Arabia/Morocco/India/Italy, however, we are based in Detroit, MI of the United States of America.  Detroit is our home and we need to expand our brand to all our local and international fans and patrons. 
  • Your contribution to our campaign will be rewarded by your new attire and new look on fashion and design
  • Your funds will attribute to our growth as an International company based in the United States.  The funds for this campaign will drive our new designs to the market sooner than if we were to fund this completely without  your assistance. 
  • We appreciate all of our fans and supporters.  New product designs is a way of thanking you as the consumer and letting  you know that we appreciate  your insight and suggestions. 
  • We need your continued support. 

What We Need & What You Get

PERKS & REWARDS for Contributing to our Apparel & Designs Project: 

  • OUR GOAL: $25,000
  • LEVELS OF CONTRIBUTION: 
  • $25 = Negash Deshret  Beanie/Cap
  • $50 = Negash Signature or Deshret T-shirt
  • $100 = Negash Loyalty and Royalty Crewneck
  • $200 =  Detroit Package: Negash Detroit Made Me Hoodie and matching t-shirt, plus a Deshret Beanie.
  • $300 = Pharaoh Package: Negash hoodie, Negash Crewneck, Negash T-Shirt and Beanie
  • $500 = Negash Isis or Negash Hotep Boots
  • $1,000 = God and Goddess package: 1 pair each of Isis and Hotep Boots, 4 T-Shirts, and 2 Beanies.
  • If we do not meet our goal: whatever funds we raise will attribute to Product Design Inventory

The Impact

More on your impact on  our campaign: 

  • Our new product design will be a reflection on all your input, feedback and support 
  • This will support a local/international brand that is based in Detroit, Michigan
  • You will be supporting the rebuilding of Detroit, MI in these harsh economic influxes in our nation.  You will be a contributor in building up one of America's finest cities, the Motor City Capitol of World
  • Our first product line, the Negash Intro Boot was introduced in 2010. Since that time, it has become our highest and most sought after apparel.  Next we introduced the Negash Isis Boot in 2012. We want to design more foot apparel to satisfy your needs as our fan and supporter.  
  • We want to accommodate  your sense of fashion, comfort, style, royalty minded and loyalty to our brand. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Social Media and Support:

  • Tell your friends about Negash International | Negash Detroit| Negash NYC
  • Follow us on our Social Networks: Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, MySpace, LinkedIn.  You can find us by searching: Negash or Negash_International
  • Blog: www.negashdetroit.blogspot.com

Thank you for Supporting Negash: Negash Detroit, Negash NYC, Negash International!!!

Team Negash Management: Rocklin Negash, LouJack Negash, Xiang CCLC

story:
Short Summary

Latex clothing is gaining popularity in fashion magazines, a lot in part due to celebrities like Katy Perry, Lady Gaga, and Rihanna. Until now, there hasn't been ready-to-wear latex designs that are easy to wear and take care of. Pretty Thoughts plans on changing the course of fashion history, and needs your help!

My name is Erica Templeman, and I am the owner and designer of Pretty Thoughts, a clothing company that specializes in mainstream, ready-to-wear latex clothing. My campaign is to raise money to purchase a fume hood, to assist with the continuing growth my company is experiencing. I've expanded quickly in the past two years since I begun Pretty Thoughts--my debut fashion show at Boston Fashion Week 2011, the Spring/Summer 2012 fashion show at the international Rockabilly rendezvous Viva Las Vegas Rockabilly Weekender 15, and following up with the addition of plus sizing and the Spring/Summer 2013 line debuting at Viva Las Vegas Rockabilly Weekender 16. My designs are available for sale on Karmaloop.com's Kazbah, a site for their independent designers, as well as my Etsy shop and I take custom orders via email. I have been working hard adding plus sizing debuting November 2012 as well as new designs tailored to the extended sizing, and planning next year's engagements that are pushing my limited budget to it's maximum potential.

 

What We Need & What You Get

I'm looking to raise $2,500 to assist with the purchase of a fume hood. One of the many reasons that Pretty Thoughts is different from other latex designers is the specialized finishing process that makes the latex clothing easier to wear as well as care for. Chlorination as it is called, requires the mixing of hydrochloric acid and bleach diluted in water. It produces chlorine gas, which is deadly if inhaled. While I use respirators, chemical safety gloves, and goggles, the process still requires me to perform it outside, which becomes exceptionally limiting with the unpredictable New England weather. With a small ductless fume hood and the correct HEPA filters, I would be able to perform the process inside. 

What *you* get out of funding Pretty Thoughts

-Everyone who donates, regardless of amount, will be listed as a donor on the Pretty Thoughts Website and will receive my undying gratitude.

-Donate $10 and get special 5" x 7" print on glossy cardstock signed by the designer with a personalized thank you note on the back.

-Donate $25, get a wall calendar featuring gorgeous models in Pretty Thoughts designs as well as the 5"x7" print thank you note.

-Donate $50, and get all of the above, and a set of 4 hairbows in the Spring/Sumer 2013 colors before they are available to the public

-Donate $100, and get all of the above, and you get to give a name to one of my Spring/Summer 2013 designs.

-Donate $500, and get all of the above, and you get a behind the scenes tour of the Boston studio, as well as lunch with me to collaborate on upcoming designs/colors. Travel to Boston not included.

-Donate $1000 and get all of the above, and you get to come to and be in a photoshoot! You will be invited on the set of a Pretty Thoughts photoshoot and you will receive star treatment and be in a Pretty Thoughts photoshoot. Travel to Boston, MA not included.

****For international sponsors, please add $2 to assist with shipping costs for prints, and $5 for calendars and hairbows****

The Impact

Pretty Thoughts is changing the course of fashion as we know it. Latex clothing is commonly used as a futuristic fabric in costuming, and is gaining popularity in fashion magazines. There's also a lot of interest in latex clothing thanks to celebrities, but until now, there hasn't been ready-to-wear latex designs that are easy to wear and take care of. It's a flattering material for most body types, smoothing you out and holding you in. My designs are also designed for the most comfortable wear while being fashionable-- like the flirty kickpleat skirt, the fun bustier and the adorable babydoll dress. It's no different than wearing other fine fabrics or materials, such as silk, satin, or leather, and is significantly easier to take care of!

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't donate but still want to help? Spread the word! Tell your friends all about Pretty Thoughts and my ready to wear latex clothing for the mainstream market, including designs for women of all sizes!

story:
Do you matter? 

If you were told that the outfit you are wearing has more meaning such as creating jobs, inspiring innovation and celebrating with a whole group of people from another country, other than just a manufactured piece of item in a factory, will you feel more confident to buy and wear it?

 I have two major goals: 
1) To awaken the sleeping giant of fashion that lies in the continent of Africa by creating meaningful, trendy, contemporary fashion that carries the beauty of love, culture and diversity using the finest African traditional garments and fabric, that is usually worn on special occasions by African royalty. Starting with the Toghu, a traditional regalia worn by the royalty and on special occasions by the Tikar people of the North west Region and the Bamileke.
2) To give you confidence, poise and value with an added sense of adequacy with every piece of my creation. I want people to wear my creation with a justified amount of boldness and humility leaving behind a feeling of sharing and belonging. 
So far, the people wearing my fashion label without knowing have contributed to celebrating with the African people, bringing dreams alive, creating jobs for the indigenous in west Africa and waking up the sleeping fashion industry in Africa. 

By us adding value and modernizing the "toghu" Many Cameroonian designers have been inspired on how to further exploit this rich culture hence creating more fashions and jobs.
I need your help to change more lives, create more jobs and wake up the African fashion Industry. Your donations will not only make this possible but it will also be a part of creating history. 

In just a few years we have been able to build a great following due to our ground breaking work, playing a big role in lots of shows around the world, creating a lot of interest and awareness on our brand.We received major recognition from media giants like the BBC and New African Woman. This attracted the attention Cameroon officials and we had our first major contract in 2010 to create special contemporary outfits for the Cameroonian delegation to the 2010 World Cup in South Africa.


This phase was either the great beginning or the great end for our career in fashion. We plunged into the job determined to bring out the best for our nation so we could be fashionably represented at the world cup. This sweet dream turned sour when we realized our work went all in vain. Until this day, we did not receive up to ¼ of the payments though we supplied the goods and on time to our buyers. 
Failure is inevitable when you are in the process of creating something big and worthwhile. We did not stop at the first major failure and we will not stop now. Like it is said, if you haven’t failed then you have not really tried. I will keep trying and that is why I need your help. 
This was the turning point in my life - debts, loss of trust from our friends, deception, confusion, frustration. Many things came to an end. After all our hard work turned into failure, my first partnership business went bankrupt, ending the partnership and losing some fans and clients - The company that was built on young and vibrant inspirations that brought together thousands of young people around the world to dare, to be bold and face their future courageously especially in the creative world. However my partner and I chose to but as the beginning of a new and beautiful day. Instead of one, we now have two amazing fashion innovations thriving in two different parts of the world and we are both grateful for the tough times and proud of our new birth. 
Today an even more amazing company is born – KibonenNY of which I am very proud. 
Kibonen NY did not go far from the original concepts. The Toghu still stays primordial – Putting Cameroons own pride and culture on the high fashion scene, working with other African prints and luxurious textiles to create a fresh fusion of rich contemporary styles, fabrics and trends is all of what makes this brand truly unique. 
Besides being a fashion lifestyle brand, KibonenǀNY is an ethical fashion brand. Cameroon is a country with abundant talent, unbelievable design aesthetics, amazing and beautiful people yet over 49% of the population live below the poverty line. This was another gripping factor that urged the formation of my brand - using the business of fashion to help create employment in Cameroon, paying employees a fair wage that will not only aid survival but allow them to improve their standard of living. 
After realizing the potential that ethical fashion could provide. 
KibonenNY together with some partners formed the Cameroon Fashion Common Initiative Group and instigated the start up of an ethical factory - “Made In Camer”, which today is an independent, charity based, eco and ethical clothing production unit that supports local talent and provides employment to Cameroonians in one of the poorest communities. Made in Camer aims to create a sustainable and creative long term solution to Cameroons economic crisis by putting forward community driven, ethical and environmentally friendly trade in fashion. The bigger aim for Made in Camer is to have many other local and international designers as well as other companies with specific production needs produce from Cameroon and distribute on an international level.

The great news for us today is that it is very possible. 
KibonenNY has been selected to take part in the prestigious Mercedes Benz Fashion Week in South Africa. This is every fashion designers dream and one of my Dreams come True. This is a major visibility platform that comes with amazing opportunities

With all the excitement, I am kindly asking for your support to help make KibonenNY the revolution it seeks to be not just a piece of clothing to wear but an innovation that seeks to implement a substantial improvement in the lives of many whose voices have been drowned by the forces of nature, pressure and lack of proper resources. You will not only be wearing a beautiful piece of creation, you will be giving back to the world and making it a better place.

With your generous Donations, KibonenNY will be able to;

Execute the 2013 collection which will be showcased at the Mercedes Benz Fashion week in South Africa ,Flight and logistics to SA, Production of Items for sales at the Africa Fashion Week Trade Expo, Hire PR to take advantage of this exposure and enhance branding and marketing and an extensive media campaign,do a Lookbook, do a fashion video for promotion, an Ecommerce website and improve on the equipment at the Made In Camer Fair trade Production center in Bamenda and do an official Launch of KibonenNY brand in NYC.

Our total expense is really high but we will like to start with a minimum amount which can enable us kickstart.

Perks Perks Perks!!! What you receive with the pledge 

Huge amounts off the retail value of our Collections and fair trade items, not yet available in stores. Most importantly, you become part of our story of bringing high quality, well designed African-made clothing

story:
Get organized!

We all have lots of things going on in our lives. From business stuff to home decoration to sports. And it gets more every day.

Get a grip on it again! Enter your tasks in an easy to use App and see how things relate. It's like a powerful shopping list with a graphical twist. And it works wonders as our brains are wired for images, not for lists.

What's the idea behind it?

If you ever used a mindmapping tool, you already know the idea. Collect your thoughts as a simple tree that shows the relations between them. Mindmapping tools are great for this, but they stop exactly there. They don't remind you what to do.

With task managers it's the other way around. They remind you what to do, but they are usually organized as lists. That works well for 5-10 items. But the larger the list gets the more confusing it is.

Organize:Fab will bring the best of both worlds together: plan and structure like in a mindmapping or drawing App, and later on get all the benefits of a great task manager.

The great thing is that it's still a straightforward task manager under the hood - so you can use the map view to plan your tasks and switch back to a list view to actually get your work done:

And naturally a time based planning mode is available, too.

 

The interface supports themes. This means you can choose between different layouts, background colors, etc.

What we already have

We already have all the basics in place. A task manager that does everthing a great task manager does:

  • Easy to use, intuitive interface with multiple themes
  • Supports your favorite organization method (like GTD or Contexts)
  • Quick-Add window and system-wide shortcuts to capture new tasks
  • Drop emails, web links or files on Organize to convert them to tasks
  • Powerful review features (daily, weekly, monthly) with reminders
  • Really flexible in structuring your tasks: supports subtasks, subprojects, subcontexts
  • All the basics for task management included: reminders, repeating tasks, priorities, color markers, flagging
  • Share your task lists with other users by email
  • Cloud Sync
  • available for Windows, Mac, iPhone and iPad
  • have a look at it at http://www.taskfabric.com/

Project Timeline

We already have the basics in place and - as you can see from the snapshots - a working beta release. This release already supports a basic diagram layout, but needs some fine-tuning (additional layout styles, improved layout display quality) and we need to get the marketing straight. A preview release of the current development will be available as trial download from http://taskfabric.com/download.php by mid-December. Give it a try yourself!

December:

  • Finalizing the Beta download for Organize:Fab
  • Improve layout and scaling display quality
  • Add WBS (Work Breakdown Structure) diagram style

January:

  • Finalize product development
  • Final testing of finished product
  • Packaging for release
  • Make download available to the public by end of January

February:

  • Distribution: Backers get their license keys in 1st week of February
  • Press announcements and public availability of Organize:Fab

 

About Us

We are a small startup company located in Hamburg, Germany. All our team members have been project managers for different customer before we started taskfabric. We successfully managed projects for small companies up to large enterprises.

We started taskfabric in early 2012 because we couldn't find any product on the market that suited our own need to manage lots of tasks for private and company related projects. All the products we looked at simply limited us more and more after a while instead of helping us. The goal of Organize is to make it differently: easy to use, but with enough goodies under the hood so you can start quickly with your first project and still be happy with 10 or more projects.

Use of funds

We've built the basic product. We've set up the infrastructure (Web Site, Cloud Sync). Now we need your help to take the next step and enhance Organize:Pro for Mac and Windows with a great visualization and mind mapping feature and get the marketing up and running.

We know what we're doing - we all have a project management background and worked as project managers from small comanies to large enterprises for years. Just download what we got so far from http://www.taskfabric.com/ and see for yourself. So we know exactly what is required to pull this off.

You are getting in early. This gets you a great product ahead of everyone else. 

We are asking you to help us make Organize:Fab a reality.

story:
Our Story

Phenomenal Woman the Movement (PWTM) is a company founded by two extraordinarily talented God-fearing women who act with integrity in all they do. We each feel personally accountable for upholding the highest standards of behavior, including honesty and fairness in all aspects of our business. We will set-up and run our business as a clothing company, but this is also the beginning of a movement where we will seek to encourage and uplift women of all economic classes and age groups. Primarily, the profits from this company will be used to start other business ventures that will allow us to continue our mission of helping women within the United States and throughout the world. These ventures include motivational seminars, housing projects, health awareness programs, community service events, etc.... As mentioned PWTM will be legally operated as a clothing company, but will foster a revolution with the purpose of encouraging woman to feel good about themselves and their bodies.

 

The Impact

 

Our clothing line is unique in comparison to any other clothing line currently available. We are inspired everyday by what we are doing and can't wait to share these same feelings of inspiration, confidence, and fierceness with women of all ages and sizes througout the US and the world. We are two single mothers of integrity that have, over the last year, invested all our time, money, sweat, and tears into our vision and we are right at the point of entering the market to share our innovative ideas and designs. We are only in need of a little push across the finish line to make this happen! We are only asking for what is required and with your help and prayers, we will be lauching our line in April 2012, so please check out our website during this time to view what you helped us to accomplished.

 

We are on track to revolutionize the industry and lead the next fashion craze for what women want.


 

What We Need & What You Get

Labor: $3,000.00
Equipment: $2,000.00
Total: $5,000.00

 

Other Ways You Can Help

(Unleash the DIWO! -- 'Do It With Others' by asking folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign. Don't forget to remind them about the share tools!)

$3,000.00 


Equipment:
$2,000.00 


Total:
$5,000.00 



 


Other Ways You Can Help
(Unleash the DIWO! -- 'Do It With Others' by asking folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign. Don't forget to remind them about the share tools!)

story:
People need things when they go places. And they need to put those things in something. Like an awesome bag. That's what we set out to do, and we absolutely killed it. 

 

  

   

 

       

      

 

  

 

 

   

Använda is a word in Swedish. Because that’s where we are right now. It’s nice out here. You should come visit. The country- not us, we’re busy that weekend.

Använda means ‘to use’ in Swedish. Now you can seem smart when you’re explaining where you got your awesome new bag to that girl on the bus who’s way out of your league. Or guy. Whatever. You're welcome.

 

 

   

      

 

 

  * For all EU orders, prices include all VAT and duty fees. 

For bulk orders, please contact us at : support@anvanda.com

 

  

 

FAQ

Q: Can I also use this for hiking or is it just a city bag?

A: 

My colleague is 6ft and he took it with his Girlf on the hike up to Machu Picchu (they didn’t take the bus), by the end of the trip they were fighting on who gets to use it. I have personally taken it to climb Ometepe the smaller of the two volcanoes in Nicaragua it was an 8 hour hike. The sole of my timbos fell apart, I got attacked by giant ants, but the bag came through with flying colors.

As for the straps the good thing about it is you can change on the fly to a messenger. So if you get tired of carrying it on both shoulders you can switch to sling. If you feel the need for padded straps we will offer our backers at the end of the campaign.

In the bottom of the bag is an extra compartment for reflective rain cover. Sometimes when hiking the weather suddenly turns, or perhaps ,as a safety concern, you need people to see you when it gets dark. I don’t believe there is a more versatile but at the same time simple bag on the market. So no it's good for hiking, it's f*cking great for hiking.

 

Q: What is the difference between Leather and the Vegetarian Lether?

A: 

The trim and the square section on the right side. Both materials are durable. Some people prefer non leather for religious or other reasons. The vegetarian leather a.k.a. pleather looks similar to leather but feels different.

Most of us in the office prefer the luxury of soft leather but give you the option to decide.

 

Q: Is the bag water resistant?

A: For most of us this is our everyday carry & we didn't want to use harsh chemicals. Instead of coating the bag, we designed a removable reflective rain cover in the bottom compartment.

 

Q: How do I order the bags?

A: The only way to get one is through our Indiegogo page here! People who back the project get to have their very own Använda bags earlier and save a bunch over the future retail prices ranging from $119-$159. Here is how it works: 
1. You have to pledge for a reward you want.
2. To pledge for a rewards click the "Back this project" button on the right side of the project page. 
3. Select the rewards you want in return for your pledge. Select the country you want it shipped to and finish the pledge. That’s it! 
4. We will send you a survey after approx. 2 weeks for your size, color and trim options for the Använda bags. 
5. You will then wait till for the bags to be shipped to you. =)

 

Q: What are the dimensions and weight of the bag and wallet?

A: Anvanda Large 
H50cm = 19.7in 
W35cm = 13.8in

Weight is:

1 kg = 2.2 Lbs. Large: 1.2 kg = 2.6 Lbs. 

Anvanda 
H40cm = 15.7in 
W30cm = 11.8in

Wallet:

6.6cm x10.1cm x 2.2 cm weighs 2.4 ounces 
2.6x4x.8 inches weighs 70 grams.

 

Q: Can use it as a camera bag?

A: 

Yes you sure can. Take the anvanda bag put a camera in it and BAM! - you have a great f*cking camera bag. If only it were that easy. We are some picture loving, backpack wearing, urban travel fanatics. The last thing we want to do is mess up our awesome dslr by not having the right gear.

At the end of the campaign we will give our backers the option of purchasing an anvanda waterproof/shockproof camera bag insert for dslr and slr cameras, you know so you don't f*ck your camera up.

 

Q: Can I change my pledge to real leather?

A: At the end of the campaign we will send out a survey so you can pick whichever add-ons you would like to receive.

 

Q: Noce bag but it would be even better with a sternumm/ cross strap.

A: Ok technically this is not a question but really?

"Nice bag"?

We don't make nice, we make f*cking great.

So you're one of those bike messengers, motorcyclist, or perhaps even a skateboarder? Reflective rain cover not enough for you, now you want sternum straps!?

Damn right we have a cross strap, 
The strap snaps into the bottom hooks if you need uber stability. These will be available to our backers after the campaign.

 

Q: I am vegan, are you vegan?

A: Well, schucks. If you mean "you" as in me writing this. No I am not vegan, my colleague is though, which is what lead to us making a vegan version of the bag. ☮

 

Q: I want a fucking awesome wallet, can I add it to my pledge?

A: yes, we already have this option. If you are buying more than 2 bags we intend on offering the wallet after the campaign is over, and promise to do our best efforts to have it's price offered to our backers to be as similar as possible to the Indiegogo price.

 

Q: How do I specify my address?

A: We'll be reaching out to all our backers after the campaign ends to collect shipping address in a survey.

 

Q: How stain resistance is the bag?

A: I accidentally marked up my bag a few weeks ago, i was f*cking devastated. They only gave me one company issued bag, so you can imagine how i was feeling.

I left it on the sofa a few days and then went to the sink and took so soap and water…walla! It came out. With mild soap and water you will be fine.

For bag ♥'ers: 
If you get the leather version , which I have, Dampen a lint-free cloth with cool water and wipe clean. Start from the top and wipe -- do not rub -- while moving downward. Refrain from saturating it; let everything air-dry. Buff with a lint-free cloth dampened with leather cleaner and conditioner.

 

Q: I want a large quantity of bags, can you provide us with any discounts?

A: Of course we will! Just shoot us a message with the following details and we will get back to you on our discounted pricing and details on how to pledge. 
1. What style of bags do you want to order ? 
2. How many orders in EACH style ? 
3. Will they all be shipped to the same address ?

 

Q: I want to gift the bag, how do I do so?

A: Its simple, order one of our bags and in the survey (sent out at the end of the campaign) mark it as a gift and we will gift wrap it for you for free!

 

Q: Will the bag be available in additional colors?

A: We are still evaluating adding more colors, if we do decide we will let our backers know.
