story:
A Better Footwear Experience:

We've found this generally comes down to 3 things.
How do your shoes fit? How do they look? How do you put them on everyday?  

The HICKIES Lacing System is an upgrade from traditional laces, those old-world strings. It improves the Fit, Aesthetics, and Usability of wearing shoes for everyone. It's a new era of laces, designed to keep you moving. So no matter how you run, walk, dance or play through your day, you can do it more freely, more comfortably, and more beautifully.


The HICKIES Lacing System is a simple design made with smart materials. There are no bows to tie, no loose laces, and no holding you back. It at once makes your shoes more comfortable, adjustable, adaptive, and sleek. Fasten only once, slip on and off every time. Very convenient.




The HICKIES Lacing System is a modular one, meaning instead of one lace running through the length of each shoe, you have one strap per pair of eyelets. This gives you maximum control when it comes to customizing tightness, comfort, and style. Experiment to find your perfect fit.




The modular, no-tie technology behind HICKIES laces is what makes it a universal product that provides dynamic benefits for all.




When the campaign ends, we will send you an email so you can choose your packs and colors :)







Our team comes from all corners of the globe—Argentina, Israel, Venezuela, Russia, Germany, Switzerland, Mexico, Canada, Taiwan, Korea, and the United States—so there was no better place to call home than the cultural melting pot that is New York City.








Yes,
You can adjust the fit.

Yes,
They will hold on tight and stay secure while you
are playing your favorite sports.

Yes,
We now have a version
for kids!

Yes,
They are waterproof. You can throw shoes
with HICKIES laces in the washer,
but not the dryer!

No,
You don’t have to open and close
them every time. Just slip on, and slip off. Voila!

No,
They don’t have latex. They are made from love and TPE
(known in the materials world as thermoplastic elastomer).

No,
You don’t need to have a “shoelace size”,
HICKIES' elastic compression and modular design makes them
a one-size-fits-all product. Magic? We think so :) But really it's just
smart materials and a bit of engineering.

How many come in a pack?
Enough for 1 pair of shoes! Adult packs contain 14 units per pack, and 10 units per pack come for children.

Cool, so how do I choose my packs/get my gift card?
Moments after you back the campaign, we will send you a thank you email which will have your gift card ready for use immediately on HICKIES.com towards our current collections (if you don't see the email in your inbox please check your spam folder). Once the campaign closes, we will send a follow up email with instructions on how to pick your packs of HICKIES!

Ok last question, why did you name it "HICKIES"?

The story of HICKIES is one of creativity, serendipity, and love. Together, Gaston and Mariquel went out on a limb, quit their jobs, and embarked on a journey fueled by passion. To this day, we see HICKIES as a mark of affection for the shoes that take you to all the places you want to go.

story:
Why LuLaRoe?

 

This past year, I hit a point in my life where I needed to place my family, my health and my passion for art at the top of my priorities.  After many years of placing these important factors at the bottom of my "To Do" list, LuLaRoe has allowed me to work at making sure that they are back at the top where they belong.

LuLaRoe is a family owned company with most of their products made right here in the United States.  They believe that fashion & beauty come in EVERY size and create styles for every body type. 

I LOVE owning part of a company that can make women (...and men!) feel beautiful every single day and defy the "norm" of the fashion industry!  

Visit www.lularoe.com for more information about this amazing company!

...or www.facebook.com/lularoekmb for more information about LuLaRoe KMB

What are these CRAZY kids up to now?!?

 

LuLaRoe KMB is looking to purchase a Step Van to create a mobile boutique!!!  ...and we need your help to do so!  This helps us bring all the fashion that you have grown to love and wear without the time commitment previously needed for a Pop-Up Boutique! 

Previously, when hosting a Pop Up Boutique, the hostess needs to clean their house, prep their kids, and be home an hour before the party to help me move all of the inventory into her house.  With a mobile boutique, there would be no need to clean or be home early!!! 

LuLaRoe would simply back into your driveway minutes before your show and you can shop!  At the end of the event, we simply pull away leaving you NO mess!!!

You could even have a lunchtime pop up in the parking lot at work and earn FREE clothes!!!! 

...and of course, your donation will not go unnoticed!!!

See our perks to see what you can earn!

Other Ways You Can Help

 

We understand if you can't help, but you may know someone who can! Please help us out by sharing this campaign on your Facebook page

 

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!!!!

Kristen Belculfine

story:
At Andar, our mission is to minimize and organize what you carry. Since 2015, we have designed several wallet styles ranging from bifolds to money clips to cardholders providing options for your personal carry preference. The Turner is our latest design to join the Andar family and we want to share it first with the crowdfunding community.

Keep your pockets light and access your cards instantly.

Throw in your most used card in the front pocket for easy access.

Comfortably hold one to eight cards in the center pocket and have quick access with the pull of the tab. 

Store your cash or another card in the back pocket.

 

The back pocket will fit any currency that is 170 mm long (when folded in half) and 70 mm high. If you have a bill that is over 70 mm high, it will show above the back.

We have chosen to use a full grain leather for the Turner, as we have with all of our leather wallets. Although full grain leather is more expensive and more difficult to work with, we feel the tradeoff is worth it because of the durability and the look and feel that is developed over time.

 INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING
Our prices and shipping fees do not include GST, VAT or other country taxes. You can calculate what you can expect for duties and taxes using this site here:
https://www.simplyduty.com/import-calculator/

story:
Thanks to the support of 775 contributors, we are...

***NOW SHIPPING***

Place orders on our website (libertadapparel.com) and get your shirt before your next trip.

Tested and reviewed by:

 

 

 

 

 

Whether on business or holiday, looking sharp when you travel often leads to a more elevated experience. From fine restaurants to meeting new people, dressing well opens more doors to attractive possibilities.

And who doesn’t hope for unexpected adventures when they are away from home? It’s why we travel.

 

 

But, nice and stylish clothes can't handle the rigors of travel. They get damaged easily, wrinkle and collect odors. 

The alternative isn't great either. Clothes that are built for travel make you look like you're hunting big game in the middle of London. 

 

 

I’m Kyle and 11 years ago I decided to make some massive life changes. So, I started to travel the world to find a new way to work and live.

Making the investment in myself has paid off and I’ve transitioned from wandering-corporate-refugee-backpacker to globetrotting entrepreneur with a mission. 

Early in this journey, I realized that my appearance had a huge impact on my experiences. When I retired my polyester shirts and cargo pockets, everything changed for the better.

But, it was dressing well that highlighted the problem. There wasn’t anything on the market that looked great and traveled well. I had to pack more clothes and do more laundry just to look presentable.

That experience led to what is now Libertad: Upscale Style + High Performance

Professional to personal; day to night; hot to cold; wet to dry. What you have in your carry on must manage it all.

 

Travelers pack a lot into a day. So, Libertad's #1 goal is for you to look great no matter what you're doing. 

Staying true to classic design, the color and cut were chosen so you won’t look underdressed at meetings, or like you just came from the office when going out at the end of the day. 

Coat or no coat; tucked in or out; you can be prepared for anything without packing a lot of shirts for each occasion. 

 

 

Changing environmental conditions are unavoidable when you're on the move. Taxis, airports, planes and hotels...travelers make these transitions frequently and rapidly. Add the weather outside and your body is taking a beating. 

Libertad's proprietary fabric has superior moisture management and built in thermal regulation. 

So, whether you are at sea level or 35,000 feet, our shirts fight to keep you dry and comfortable without getting clammy or collecting odor.

 

 

Merino wool: the all-natural, high-performance fiber.

This isn’t the heavy, hot and rough wool of the past. Libertad has created a proprietary, lightweight fabric that is soft enough to wear next to the skin and light enough to be worn all year round.

 

 

Advancements in wool technology allow us to spin and weave the Merino into a much finer fabric no longer limiting its use to blankets and heavy flannel shirts. 

 

 

 

 

 

By combining our lightweight material with the natural breathability and temperature regulation of Merino, it can be worn comfortably all year round.

Add odor & wrinkle resistance and you have a shirt perfect for travel anywhere at any time, day after day.

 

 

Other natural capabilities of Merino perfect for travel:

  • UV protection 
  • anti-static 
  • durable
  • stain resistant
  • flame retardant 
  • colorfast 

 

     

     

    Impressed with Merino? It's not done...It's also eco-friendly and sustainable.

    Merino has a smaller environmental impact that helps preserve the world we love to travel.

    • Biodegradable. It breaks down and returns to the soil. 
    • Renewable. Not only does the wool grow back each year, but the food for sheep, grass, is also renewable and sustainable under the best land management practices. 

     

    Not just all talk...

    We've been testing this with volunteers for the last year. Here's what they have to say...

     

     

     

     

    Design & Size Details

    We are offering both regular and tapered cuts. When you order, Kickstarter will not require you to select design, color or size. That will happen at the end of the campaign via survey. Essentially, buy now and choose later. 

    Also, all shirts will have a pocket, but no button placket. Just like the dark blue in all the photos.

     

    Risks & Challenges

    My strategy to mitigate challenges is to work with the best people. My factory makes fabric for the biggest wool brands in the world. Another key team member is my wool expert that has been in the wool industry for 30 years. Lastly, our independent quality control company also has 30 years experience in wool specifically. 

    During the one year R&D phase of this project, between myself and my wool expert, we've had 3 in-person meetings with the same team that will produce the shirts sold on Kickstarter. Additionally, we’ve worked on three trial rounds together and they understand exactly what makes Libertad fabric special since they have created it with us. We know each other and have built a solid relationship. 

    During the manufacturing process, we will be making more trips to meet with our manufacturers to continue our hands on approach to this process.
story_txt:
Thanks to the support of 775 contributors, we are...***NOW SHIPPING***Place orders on our website (libertadapparel.com) and get your shirt before your next trip.Tested and reviewed by: 



    Whether on business or holiday, looking sharp when you travel often leads to a more elevated experience. From fine restaurants to meeting new people, dressing well opens more doors to attractive possibilities.And who doesn’t hope for unexpected adventures when they are away from home? It’s why we travel.  But, nice and stylish clothes can't handle the rigors of travel. They get damaged easily, wrinkle and collect odors. The alternative isn't great either. Clothes that are built for travel make you look like you're hunting big game in the middle of London.   I’m Kyle and 11 years ago I decided to make some massive life changes. So, I started to travel the world to find a new way to work and live.Making the investment in myself has paid off and I’ve transitioned from wandering-corporate-refugee-backpacker to globetrotting entrepreneur with a mission. Early in this journey, I realized that my appearance had a huge impact on my experiences. When I retired my polyester shirts and cargo pockets, everything changed for the better.But, it was dressing well that highlighted the problem. There wasn’t anything on the market that looked great and traveled well. I had to pack more clothes and do more laundry just to look presentable.That experience led to what is now Libertad: Upscale Style + High PerformanceProfessional to personal; day to night; hot to cold; wet to dry. What you have in your carry on must manage it all. Travelers pack a lot into a day. So, Libertad's #1 goal is for you to look great no matter what you're doing. Staying true to classic design, the color and cut were chosen so you won’t look underdressed at meetings, or like you just came from the office when going out at the end of the day. Coat or no coat; tucked in or out; you can be prepared for anything without packing a lot of shirts for each occasion.   Changing environmental conditions are unavoidable when you're on the move. Taxis, airports, planes and hotels...travelers make these transitions frequently and rapidly. Add the weather outside and your body is taking a beating. Libertad's proprietary fabric has superior moisture management and built in thermal regulation. So, whether you are at sea level or 35,000 feet, our shirts fight to keep you dry and comfortable without getting clammy or collecting odor.  Merino wool: the all-natural, high-performance fiber.This isn’t the heavy, hot and rough wool of the past. Libertad has created a proprietary, lightweight fabric that is soft enough to wear next to the skin and light enough to be worn all year round.  Advancements in wool technology allow us to spin and weave the Merino into a much finer fabric no longer limiting its use to blankets and heavy flannel shirts.      By combining our lightweight material with the natural breathability and temperature regulation of Merino, it can be worn comfortably all year round.Add odor & wrinkle resistance and you have a shirt perfect for travel anywhere at any time, day after day.  Other natural capabilities of Merino perfect for travel:
UV protection 
anti-static 
durable
stain resistant
flame retardant 
colorfast 
   Impressed with Merino? It's not done...It's also eco-friendly and sustainable.Merino has a smaller environmental impact that helps preserve the world we love to travel.
Biodegradable. It breaks down and returns to the soil. 
Renewable. Not only does the wool grow back each year, but the food for sheep, grass, is also renewable and sustainable under the best land management practices. 
 Not just all talk...We've been testing this with volunteers for the last year. Here's what they have to say...    
Design & Size Details
We are offering both regular and tapered cuts. When you order, Kickstarter will not require you to select design, color or size. That will happen at the end of the campaign via survey. Essentially, buy now and choose later. 
Also, all shirts will have a pocket, but no button placket. Just like the dark blue in all the photos.
 
Risks & Challenges
My strategy to mitigate challenges is to work with the best people. My factory makes fabric for the biggest wool brands in the world. Another key team member is my wool expert that has been in the wool industry for 30 years. Lastly, our independent quality control company also has 30 years experience in wool specifically. During the one year R&D phase of this project, between myself and my wool expert, we've had 3 in-person meetings with the same team that will produce the shirts sold on Kickstarter. Additionally, we’ve worked on three trial rounds together and they understand exactly what makes Libertad fabric special since they have created it with us. We know each other and have built a solid relationship. During the manufacturing process, we will be making more trips to meet with our manufacturers to continue our hands on approach to this process.

story:
EVEA. FASHION TO PRESERVE THE AMAZONIAN FOREST

SUSTAINABLE FOOTWEAR AND BAGS

A few years ago, I traveled to the Jungle in Peru and after knowing the wonderfulness of the Amazon and its great biodiversity, I also discovered the great challenge that is deforestation. I had heard the subject before, but it was very shocking to live and see it. It is so from that moment I decided to do everything possible to change that situation. In parallel Jorge sought to develop accessories with sustainable materials. Celeste reflected on how to integrate greater value in her fashion designs. That's where Evea was born

At Evea we develop sustainable footwear and wallets with rubber from communities of the Peruvian Amazon, who collect the latex from the tree and transform it into dry sheets, without cutting down any tree, without damaging any animal and without contaminating the environment. Help us to protect the planet! You can also preserve the forests from anywhere in the world

 

 

How is the forest preserved with an Evea shoe or accessory?

The Amazon region is one of the most beautiful and biodiverse areas in the world, but the main problem is Deforestation. In Peru, 120,000 hectares of forest are deforested annually due to disorganized agriculture, logging and illegal mining that unbalance the ecosystem.

Faced with this great challenge, we have seen a SOLUTION that allows generating spaces for the protection of forests in a proactive way, generating income in the communities and encouraging the care of trees: The Natural Latex of Shiringa (Wild Natural Rubber)

 

THE SHIRINGA:

The hope of the Amazon Forest

The shiringa tree (wild natural rubber) grows in the Amazon and has a milky liquid called latex, which is extracted through a sustainable and artisanal process. An incision is made in the bark, taking care not to damage the tree. Then the latex is stored in trays to be later converted into sheets of dry rubber. Which are processed and used in our Evea footwear soles.

Also, for the development of rubber biotextile latex is applied in cotton blankets that are then dried to obtain a biomaterial friendly to the environment that is a lower impact alternative in our accessories Evea. We have been investigating and improving textures in resistance to abrasion and adhesion, with the aim of improving this new product.

 

THE STRATEGIC FRAME OF CONSERVATION

One of the causes of deforestation is largely due to the lack of patrolling of large areas of territory. Since there is no occupation of these spaces, they tend to be deforested. Peru has more than 60% forest territory  and there are less than 1000 forest rangers to care for such a large area. Therefore, Evea considers of great importance the strengthening of communities and the enhancement of forests with products of biodiversity, through strategic fencing. When a rubber tapper has incomes from the extraction of the latex from shiringa in his space, he has an incentive to go through all the forest where his shiringa trees are found and in consequence he patrols the area, protecting it from any illegal logger. This is how the "Strategic Conservation Fence" is formed.

 

FUNDS THAT WE NEED 

We want to invite you to be part of this impact and for that we are looking to raise $ 6000 which would be used in the following way:

1) Adjustment of 5 Molds of women's sizes (From 36 to 40)

2) Development of a Mold for women (35)

3) Development of 5 Sizes for men (From 42 to 46)

4) Working capital for the development of footwear. Any additional fund exceeded the goal contributes to having the capital to prepare Evea orders from around the world.

If we increase the possibilities of products and services we can create more "Strategic Conservation Frames"

 

EVEA PRODUCTS THAT GENERATE STRATEGIC FENCES

The products below have only been released for the Crowfunding campaign. Take advantage of this special occasion and help us take care of the Amazonian forest :)

0. I remember Evea

1. Evea slippers.

2. Evea Ballerinas

3. Evea  Bags

4. Trip to the interior of the jungle - La Ruta del Caucho.

 

Sustainable Products

Sizes

 

Timeline

 

MODEL SELVA NOW 

Evea Women Shoes

 

Evea Women Shoes - Jungle Print

Evea Women Shoes - Leafs Print

Evea Women Shoes - Black & Moon

 

Evea Men Shoes

Evea Slip on Upcycling

Three colors of the Earth for you. Upcycling style

 

We only have 6 models of this Evea Footwear! Upcycling Style!

 

Model AGKAN

Evea Women Shoes

Evea Women Shoes - Yellow

Evea Women Shoes - Pink dolphin

Evea Women Shoes - Blue

Evea Women Shoes - Pachuco

Evea Women Shoes - Pachuco Light

Evea Women Shoes - Green

Evea Women Shoes - Red

The Rubber Route

All the Evea way started with a trip to the jungle

 

 

Other ways you can help to protect more forests :)

  • Share the campaign
  • Be an ambassador in your country 

 

Evea Team

Referrals & Media Evea

  • Fashion Revolution: "How to save the Amazon" - https://www.fashionrevolution.org/peru-blog/how... 
  • BID - IADB: "5 Business by Millenials looking for a sustainable world" - https://blogs.iadb.org/sostenibilidad/en/2017/0...

 

 

Brand Label Allies

 

Allies

story:
Since our last successful Kickstarter, people all around the world can’t take our jeans off! We’ve been touring North America demoing our jeans at events across the country all while innovating our proprietary technical performance denim making them better than ever!

What started as a stylish climbing pant has quickly evolved into a pant that is perfect for virtually any activity. Introducing Boulder Denim 2.0: stretchier, softer, more water repellent, more durable, and now more affordable than ever!

Our athletic fit is designed to have a slim tailored look for men with muscular legs without being skin tight. Most athletic builds have to size up their waist to fit their bigger legs and butt. With our athletic fit, you no longer have to size up the waist.

 Our men’s slim fit is designed to have a slim tailored look for men with a more slender frame. They’re a medium-low rise that fits slim body types perfectly.

Our men’s jogger-chino hybrid is a cross between our slim and athletic fit that converts from a chino to a jogger with a simple low-profile cinch. The recently unlocked women's jogger-chino will be a mid-rise. No sample photos of the women's available yet.

 Our women’s high-rise skinny fit flatters most body types. Our unique contoured waistband sits lower in the front and higher in the back eliminating gapping and preventing the front from digging in when seated.

Our women’s mid-rise straight leg flatters most body types from curvy to a straighter frame. Slim fitting from the knees up with more room below the knees. Our unique contoured waistband sits lower in the front and higher in the back eliminating gapping and preventing the front from digging in when seated.

Our jeans are perfect for travel and the outdoors so we wanted to design a puffy jacket that would be the perfect companion to our denim. Our water-resistant hooded puffy jackets have a tailored slim look for both men and women. They are water resistant and feature a waterproof reverse-coil zipper. Our jackets are made with DuPont’s environmental and vegan-friendly Sorona filling that keeps you warm without harming any animals. The jacket also easily rolls into a pouch converting the jacket into a comfortable travel pillow which is perfect for travel, camping or taking a quick nap at work.

                            

      

Taz and Brad met 14 years ago as busboys at their local Spaghetti Factory in Vancouver, Canada. They had a “did we just become best friends” moment after they spent an entire shift discussing business ideas and ways to make the big bucks as 15 year olds. Fast forward 14 years with a couple of successful and failed businesses under their belt, they feel they have finally hit the jackpot with Boulder Denim which allows them to pursue their passion for climbing while building a brand that fits perfectly into their lifestyle. For the past year, Taz and Brad have been touring North America sponsoring climbing festivals and getting the jeans on as many people as possible at climbing gyms across the continent. At the same time, they've been working directly with their manufacturer to make everyone's favourite denim even better and more affordable than ever.

Videography: Jeff Frieberg of Sora Digital 

Photography: Levi Harrell, Jeff Fierberg, Mark Scherle, Bradley Spence 

Location Sets: Bacchus in New Paltz, Central Rock Gym in Warwick 

Props: Peak Design’s Everyday Backpack 30L, Future Motion’s Onewheel XR

story:
Story

2020 - A year no one will forget. One virus changed everything. Lives are being lost, families are forever changed. Flights all over the world are halted, borders are closed, and entire economies have been shut down. Each and every life on this planet has been affected.

Who’s to Blame? Who knows….. WHO knows

Many people complain about being in lockdown - not being able to go to work, to the gym, to the pub or the club or to do whatever they want to do. But we have a different view. Thanks to these lockdowns, we all gain something that is priceless: TIME

TIME to try a new recipe and enjoy it with your family.

TIME to fix all those little things at home you have been promising to do for months, if not years….

TIME to understand your kids who you never realised grew up so fast and were drifting away from you because neither of you had time for each other.

TIME to catch up on with your old parents whom live miles away and you are always too busy to meet or call.

TIME to water all those dying plants in your garden.

No matter how different we are, we are all equal, regardless of our culture, religion, occupation, financial situation or whether we are famous or not.The disease treats us all equally, and perhaps we should now treat each other that way too.

CLARO watchmakers are pleased to introduce PR.C: POWER OF RESILIENCE. CLARO, a unique wristwatch that serves as a testament to human ingenuity and a wearable reminder of the challenges and sacrifices of the Covid-19 era.

 

“As a boutique watch manufacturer, we saw countless clients, friends and competitors shut down or suspend operations almost overnight in the face of the coronavirus,” said George J. Von Burg III, Group Managing Director of CLARO. “We didn’t want to just give up and close our doors. We decided early on to view this situation as an opportunity. We wanted to use the talent and know-how we’d spent years developing to create something new: a watch design that honors this specific moment in time.”

The Design

The PR.C’s unique design is the product of a three-month marathon of brainstorming and teamwork.

Its half-dome dial evokes the ubiquitous face masks worn by billions around the world to counter the spread of the virus. Instead of hands, the PR.C uses three individual rotating discs, each running separately and keeping an acceptable "social distance” from each other. A red-toned exhibition caseback reveals the craftsmanship of the PR.C’s Swiss-made movement, a heart that is always beating.

Inscribed on the dial is the PR.C logo and the phrase “Who knows” – or is it “WHO knows”? “As a Hong Kong-based company, we wanted the watch to be a reminder of the sacrifices made by those in the People’s Republic of China, the epicentre of this disease. We also wanted to recognize the hard work of groups like the World Health Organization,” says George J. Von Burg III. “But on a lighter note, we wanted to underscore the fundamental human condition of this lockdown era. ‘What time is it?’ ‘Who knows.’” The PR.C is truly the product of an international effort: designed in Hong Kong and Switzerland, it is powered by a Swiss-made CL-888 / Swiss-Ronda 503 movement encased in a 316L stainless steel case, with a double-domed sapphire glass from China and genuine leather strap from Italy.

The watch comes in nine different colors and strap options, representing  the diversity of human experience – our culture, beliefs, the color of our skin – and the universality of our shared challenges during the coronavirus outbreak.“

“At the moment it feels like the world is in peril and we are in turmoil. If we don't take responsibility as proper human beings, what really is the point?” says George J. Von Burg III. “Difficult times often bring out the best in us. Many of us have the opportunity to grow, change, and seize new and amazing opportunities. In our conception of the PR.C, we wanted to bring out this thought process and allow a new light to shine through the sadness all around us.”

The creation of the Power of Resilience Timepiece is an embodiment of creativity, not just a tool to measure time, but is also an emotional connection, representing our hope for the future.

Our movements

Images

'

story:
It's about time. Say goodbye to wires. Say hello to true connectivity. With lightning-fast Bluetooth 5 technology, a certified IP67 waterproof and dustproof rating, 32 hour battery life, these truly wireless, auto-pairing earbuds are exactly what you’ve been waiting for.

Aria was developed after extensive research to meet the needs of the most discerning listener. With a host of premium features like all-day battery life, total waterproofing, noise cancellation and smart assistant compatibility (just to name a few), these earbuds are ready to take your listening to the next level.

 

 

 
 

Our team has spent thousands of hours and tested nearly 100 different drivers with the best audio engineers available to push the boundaries of audio technology to create ARIA.

Superior technology means superior sound: Experience ARIA’s top-shelf sound quality and bask in its incredibly powerful bass, crisp mid-highs, and crystal clear vocals, and have your own personal bubble that encompasses you in premium acoustics.

 

 

 

Who says you can't play all day? With 32-hour battery life that allows up to 8 hours of initial play time and an additional 24 hours from the handy charging case, you can keep your playlist on repeat without breaking a sweat.

Our award winning designers and R&D team designed ARIA to have the best battery life on the market - beating even much more expensive headphones currently on the market.

 

 

ARIA features the latest and greatest in Bluetooth technology. With Bluetooth 5, you get the strongest and most reliable connection yet for consistently seamless connectivity between your devices. Strongest connections and speeds means more capacity for data transfer, which means more incredibly detailed and robust sound dimensions and zero audio-video lag, only possible with this cutting edge Bluetooth technology.

Beyond speed and strength of connectivity, did you know that hackers can hack your phone through older Bluetooth 4.1 and 4.2 in less than 10 seconds? Bluetooth 5.0 achieves unparalleled, military-grade security to keep your personal information secure.

 

 

Our ergonomic design tested against a variety of ears ensures that everyone can have unhindered access to superior sound.

We’ve spent months collecting data on thousands of ears across all 6 continents to create the perfect combination of ARIA’s proprietary form factor, ear tips, and wings. While ears are unique like fingerprints, our analysis found the ergonomically optimal tilt, angle, and contact points to securely, but comfortably, place the wing to maximize comfort, sound seal, and distance to eardrum. ARIA can achieve a comfortable and secure seal in every ear with its unique system combining the use of both earbud tips and wing tips.

 

 

Being truly wireless means ARIA never gets in your way, but helps you get to where you want to be. We developed ARIA to have strong and secure connectivity to your device with a working distance of 35 ft, so you never drop a call, lose connection, or miss a moment when you have ARIA.

After meticulous engineering, countless prototypes, and relentless testing on the world's most discerning ears, the result is better sound quality whether your device is in your pocket, your hand, or on the bench while you're on the court.ARIA sets you free - roam around the house, play your hardest on the field, even take a dip - ARIA never stops you from doing your thing. Tested for for thousands of hours in dozens of different settings, ARIA uses a custom made LDS antenna to increase bandwidth and signal reception while reducing interference and noise.

 

Our magnetic secure-fit technology guarantees your earbuds never get lost or fall out of place.This design optimizes for battery capacity and compactness by removing the need for unnecessary buttons or mechanics and helps you achieve a perfect fit every time. No buttons, no springs, no mess.

 

 

 

 

Ever have lag issues with your Bluetooth speakers or earbuds? Nearly all true wireless earbuds out there - by Bose, Jabra, and Beats sure has.

After relentless research and a commitment to the best sound quality technology can provide, we managed to remove virtually all sound lag between your device and our buds. Never miss a beat and experience videos exactly as they were meant to be. 

 

We use a proprietary silicone material paired with our extensive ergonomic tests to ensure ARIA provides the right contour for every ear while creating a impeccable seal for outside noise cancellation. The result is your own sound studio, wherever you need it. 

ARIA outperforms other major brands by overcoming a common limitation in wireless audio tech: the stereo call. With ARIA, you can take your phone calls and listen through both earbud pieces so that you can literally be all ears.

 

 

 

We are proud of ARIA because we believe we’ve truly made something better than what’s out there. We’re a team of engineers and audiophiles with a passion for creating amazing products that bring the best possible listening experience to every pair of ears. When designing ARIA, we tested more than 200 different permutations of earbud design, charging case circuitry and composition, and Bluetooth chip choice to bring you what we believe are the best earbuds available.

Unlike other crowdfunding campaigns, we've already spent months developing a manufacturing-ready model and only need funding for the initial batch order. Purchase yours today and you won't need to wait long to start listening with ARIA.

Team xFyro has been on the cutting edge of Bluetooth audio technology, championing wireless earbuds before AirPods were even a rumor. In fact, before the AirPods came out,  we'd already been selling our waterproof wireless earbuds. Since then, we've sold thousands of units across 29 countries.

story:
About Sock Invaders 

We created Sock Invaders to try to put more fun and pop culture into designer socks. We figured it should be possible to have the bold designs and colours, but also have more than simply lines and dots. Why not patterns or characters that give us fond memories and make us smile? It wasn't easy, but that was our challenge and after a year of redesigns and samples, we finally did it. And we hope you enjoy them!

Designs

We feature 5 designs in the video, but have made designs for 5 additional games. We made 2 versions of each, for Medium and Large size, as well as 5 knee high designs in a small size. 

We didn't want the Medium and Large to be exactly the same, so below are the alternative versions we made in a Medium size, so for anyone whose feet can fit both sizes, you'll have a nice choice of designs:

Sizes

Small: EU 35 - 40
Medium: EU  37 - 43 
Large: EU 42 - 48

About the Team

We are two best friends working on this who first met at age 11 at secondary school and have been good friends ever since. Jonathan has been working on socks for about 5 years now, starting out with a kids character socks brand. He also teaches kids English in Asia and is a bit of a hardcore gamer and some would say the main driving force behind Sock Invaders. Andre lives in London and joined the project in 2017, helping to get Sock Invaders off the ground. He pretty much only plays Fifa and Call of Duty, but we're working on changing that!

Production and Shipping
We plan to begin production around the 10th of April and begin sending the packages via airmail from a large and well known fulfilment company based close to the factory that produces them. Our packages should take 1-2 weeks to arrive, depending on location.

After the Campaign

Well, this is only the very beginning. Our long term goal is to work with indie video game developers and artists and collaborate on sock designs inspired by their work. Until then, we have a number of ideas for the next range and hope to become an indie sock company with a passionate customer base who look forward to seeing what designs we come up with next. We also look forward to making a difference in the lives of the less fortunate through much needed sock donations to local charities.

Sock Invaders are ready and waiting to go into production. With your help we can make our first production run. Please back our project and in return you'll be among the first and only people in the world to wear these funky socks we designed.  

Sock Donations
As mentioned in the video, we will be donating one pair per backer to homeless shelters at the end of the project. This is because socks are heavily in demand and badly needed by homeless shelters as they receive very few new socks as donations. However we are making a large quantity of socks for this project and feel it's our duty to do our part and help out. The socks we donate will surely bring some joy to those who wear them and will be put to good use. 
 

Supporting the Campaign

Please consider backing the project by purchasing some of our cool socks. Or share us on social media to help spread the word and raise more socks for our charitable cause.

Thank you for checking out the campaign and thanks again for your help!

story:
If you missed our campaign connect with us at DarkGryphon.com 

The story of how it started - Super Cars and Carbon Fiber

 An enthusiast of super cars and high tech materials, I thought to myself wouldn't it be amazing if there were luxury wallets being made of the same carbon fiber used in super-cars that makes them ultra light and strong? Something that embodied the same beauty yet was flexible, resilient and soft enough to be handmade into accessories.

  I wanted to use it in a new and interesting way, as a flexible fabric not a hard panel material. After lots of research and experimentation I eventually figured out different processes to modify it into a softer and more resilient luxury fabric compared to the stiff material it was traditionally being made into. Earlier this year I began working with an awesome designer in NYC to make initial designs: something sleek, luxurious, modern and one of a kind.

 But Why Carbon Fiber? Carbon Fiber is an exotic high tech material, used in sports cars and fighter jets, it has amazing tensile strength and beautiful patterns. It is is composed of a microscopic crystalline structure of carbon. Most kinds are stronger than steel in tensile strength and lighter than aluminum. The strongest carbon fiber in the world is up to five times stronger than steel when used in special applications.  

How are we using it? In collaboration with excellent material engineers we started with a raw carbon fiber weave and developed custom coatings that would make it flexible and drape-able. It is water proof, highly resilient and beautiful. This is beyond a doubt a new era in luxury high tech materials and the beginning of the road to many endless possibilities. 

The Designs

The wallets are made of a soft coat flexible carbon fiber with an attractive semigloss or matte finish and genuine leather accents. The deep black gloss and graphite like reflections come from the natural color of the carbon fiber weave.

1. Lightweight Carbon Fiber Clip (Black)

                         or Carbon Fiber-Kevlar Hybrid Colored Clips



2. Textured Carbon Fiber Wallet (Black) "With RFID Shielding 2.0" - Bifold (Slim)

Most new credit cards have RFID (radio frequency identity) chips embedded to allow you to put your card over a reader to complete a transaction without having to swipe it. Unfortunately, this makes it a possibility for identity theft using handheld card scanners to gather your financial information off your card remotely. We've employed a double layer Ni-Co Radio Frequency Shielding Conductive Fabric inside the lining of the pockets to help block the ability of hackers to remotely steal the information on the new generation of credit cards and personal IDs.


The exterior has a special coating with a uniquely textured feel. You can actually feel the ridges in the carbon fiber weave when you run your fingers over it.


Unique textured feel

  Metallic RFID Lining in Pockets



3. Women's Carbon Fiber Clutch Wallet (Glossy) - "With RFID Shielding 2.0"

Twill Carbon Fiber Weave Paired with Soft and Luxurious High Quality Leather

              Beautiful leather and plenty of storage in a super slim design.


                                                     Split Cash Compartment

Includes a Hidden RFID Shielding fabric in the pockets and walls

                       Hidden Zipper Compartment for change or Keys




4. Matte Finish "Twill" Carbon Fiber - Men's 2 way Trifold


An awesome full sized wallet made with twill Carbon Fiber Weave Paired with Luxurious High Quality Leather. Has a Matte finish coat.


5. Glossy Carbon Fiber Beige Leather Bifold (Slim)

 


A beautiful rich and luxurious look, for those of you that would like a bit more color.

Gloss coat brings out the most in the deep eye catching reflections of the carbon fiber weave


6. Vintage Leather Minimalist Wallet in Light Tan + Black Carbon Fiber Clip *Our Most Minimalist Design!*


Beautiful Vintage Meets Modern Minimalist: Each piece is made with an incredibly soft and durable vintage style leather matched with a modern carbon fiber cash clip.

The wallet has 2 horizontal card slots on the front, one of which is pouch sized and can take cash,  plus 2 vertical card slots on the back side



-Small and slim enough to fit in the front pocket

-Comes with a detachable carbon fiber clip with different carry options: 

Clip can be used to attach cash securely to the back of the wallet as an all in one slim front pocket wallet. Alternately you can use the clip separately for small bills + your most used card in your front pocket and use the leather wallet for larger bills and other credit cards in your back pocket. Either way its slim enough to barely feel its there.




Featured in:


 Where you come in! We have all our designs finalized and have secured agreements with 2 excellent manufacturers, all we need is your help to get the funds for the minimum order quantity of the materials. We expect manufacturing to take about 1 month after the campaign ends then we start shipping!

Last but not least, we need your help to make this happen, its the only way! Give us a share on social media and help us get our dream of having these amazing products out to everyone!


         Share on Facebook       Share on Twitter
                                      

Risks and Challenges:

We have already begun manufacturing 2 of the above designs in initial quantities. For that reason our minimum funding target is intentionally lower than usual. We believe that the risk for this project is relatively low since we have done our due diligence and are production ready. Based on how much funding we generate we will add products from our stretch goals. Regardless to say sometimes unforeseen circumstances may surface such as mass manufacturing challenges, material shortages or budget issues. We think that this is highly unlikely and we are confident in our ability to deliver high quality products on time, but for the sake of transparency it is best we mention the "worst possible" case scenarios. 



FAQ

1. Which designs have RFID Shielding?

Textured Carbon Fiber Wallet (Black) With RFID Shielding 2.0- Bifold (Slim)

and Women's Carbon Fiber Clutch Wallet (Glossy) - With RFID Shielding 2.0

2. What is RFID?

RFID (radio frequency identity) chips allow you to put your card over a reader to complete a transaction without having to swipe it. As implied it uses radio frequencies.

3. What is Carbon Fiber?

Carbon fiber is composed of microscopic crystalline structures of carbon. Stronger than steel in tensile strength and lighter than aluminum, the strongest carbon fiber in the world is up to five times stronger than steel when used in special applications.

Being an extremely strong and super-lightweight material it has found popular uses in special high-performance applications such as NASA Space shuttles, fighter jets, and most iconically in high end super cars. In these applications its been used as a rigid lightweight material. We have taken the science beyond and made it into a resilient flexible fabric.

4. Do you use real Carbon Fiber? How is it different?

Yes we use real carbon fiber, it is infused with special coatings and heat treated to produce a flexible fabric rather than the hard panels used in the auto industry. This allows it to be made into wallets and luggage accessories. 



Visit Our Official Website

story:
The JIVAN, one of our Joplins styles, exposing all of its features.

We need this start-up capital that will help cover the costs of expanding our product line, gaining scalability, and reaching a wider audience. As a thank-you to everyone who contributes to this campaign, we provide pairs of our sunglasses at prices lower than what we normally charge.

 

*This model does not float since the lenses are not completely surrounded by the frame. In the photos, Gabriela and Andre, sharing good moments with their zen spontaneous mood.

In the photo above, some of our ambassadors who already wear Joplins and support us.

 

Our designs embody the vibe our brand wants to emanate: cool, light, good vibes while also connected with purpose and simplicity. We have been praised for simplicity and smoothness in everything we are doing. We are also making sure to give attention to details regarding quality so that we continue to offer a world-class product.

Bamboo is 100% sustainable when cut past the first node, it continues to grow normally. It is cost efficient, requires no irrigation, rarely needs replanting, it grows rapidly, can be harvested in 3-5 years,  grows in a wide range of environments and it produces 35% more oxygen than an equivalent stand of trees. In addition, bamboo is biodegradable. 

Including double flexed hinges, it will make your sunglasses stronger, harder to break the frames because of it's flexibility and also, offer a better fit to your head. Whatever your head size is, we have a pair of sunglasses for you.

Bamboo is very resistant and is nowadays used in many ways as house construction, bicycles, roads and bridges, furniture etc. It is also resistant to humidity, so you can put it in the water as many times as you want :) 

Joplins Shades float! If you'd like to go stand up paddle boarding, wakeboarding, or even surfing, you can count on Joplins to be floating right next to you in case you take a fall. :) 

The bamboo is very lighter than aluminum, acetate, wood, and polycarbonate. It is very comfortable, so you almost don't feel it on your face. We guarantee it will fit smoothly on your face and especially above your nose.

All of our sunglasses are handmade and each of them has a special touch. Therefore, your sunglasses will never be quite like any other pair. 

All Joplins models come with the top lenses POLAROID 1.1 mm TAC with 100% UV400 protection reducing eye fatigue and shock absorbing. Besides that, all the lenses are POLARIZED, offering a glare-free vision, maximum sight comfort and a clear contrast, very special for days sunbathing at the beach, cycling, skiing or driving a car.

 

 

Founded in California, Joplins went directly to Rio de Janeiro, where it reflects the warm, tropical climate and the upbeat vibes of samba and then Lisbon, where the team has just begun operations. We think that these 3 locations would give us the synergy we need to help develop our idea, followed by the sun, lots of beaches, good energy and nature. We are still in very early stage with only a few pieces in the market and we would like to raise funds to help us increase our productivity, then gaining scale and be able to consolidate what we have given birth.

Beyond making a monetary contribution, you can help us by sharing this campaign with all your friends and family. Go ahead and post the campaign URL on Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. The more people are aware of what we are doing, the smoother our expansion will go. We appreciate all contributions at this crucial stage in our development.

We know how it has been difficult to put this campaign together. For the past six months, we have been busy constantly. We would like to give special thanks to the people who have helped bring this project to life:

Thiago Caruso - Camera
Bruno Lacerda - Photography and Actor 
Ricardo Hirth - Designer
Lucas Rangel - Social Media and Actor
Marcos Gomes - Logistics and Actor
Ingrid Ribeiro - Actor
Pedro Felipe - Actor
Paula Meirelles - Actor
Gabriela de Oliveira - Actor
Felipe Kaiuca - Actor
Tayra Fuentes - Actor
Luise Mesil - Actor
Mariana Cardoso - Actor

Do all your sunglasses float?

Yes, with exception to the model Zeneye, which is not fully framed on the lens. 

Do you do International shipping?

Yes, we do. You might be eligible to customs considering your country regulations.

Do you do prescription lenses?

We don’t do prescription lenses at this time, but we look forward to working with prescriptions in the near future.

GUARANTEE

We offer a 360-day (1-year) guarantee on the frames and lenses. If there is any problem, just let us know at hello@wearjoplins.com and we will make sure to take care of everything. 

 

 

If you need any help: hello@wearjoplins.com

Thank you for your time and support.
story_txt: The JIVAN, one of our Joplins styles, exposing all of its features.We need this start-up capital that will help cover the costs of expanding our product line, gaining scalability, and reaching a wider audience. As a thank-you to everyone who contributes to this campaign, we provide pairs of our sunglasses at prices lower than what we normally charge. *This model does not float since the lenses are not completely surrounded by the frame. In the photos, Gabriela and Andre, sharing good moments with their zen spontaneous mood.In the photo above, some of our ambassadors who already wear Joplins and support us.  Our designs embody the vibe our brand wants to emanate: cool, light, good vibes while also connected with purpose and simplicity. We have been praised for simplicity and smoothness in everything we are doing. We are also making sure to give attention to details regarding quality so that we continue to offer a world-class product.Bamboo is 100% sustainable when cut past the first node, it continues to grow normally. It is cost efficient, requires no irrigation, rarely needs replanting, it grows rapidly, can be harvested in 3-5 years,  grows in a wide range of environments and it produces 35% more oxygen than an equivalent stand of trees. In addition, bamboo is biodegradable. Including double flexed hinges, it will make your sunglasses stronger, harder to break the frames because of it's flexibility and also, offer a better fit to your head. Whatever your head size is, we have a pair of sunglasses for you.Bamboo is very resistant and is nowadays used in many ways as house construction, bicycles, roads and bridges, furniture etc. It is also resistant to humidity, so you can put it in the water as many times as you want :) Joplins Shades float! If you'd like to go stand up paddle boarding, wakeboarding, or even surfing, you can count on Joplins to be floating right next to you in case you take a fall. :) The bamboo is very lighter than aluminum, acetate, wood, and polycarbonate. story:
Did you know that the participation rate of Muslim girls in sports is about half that of their peers? One of the barriers to participation is the clothing worn for religious and cultural reasons. We aim to change that.

ASIYA™ is culturally-appropriate activewear. Our innovative fitness fashions and fabrics are easy to move in, to play in, to compete in. ASIYA honors and encourages Muslim women of all ages—young girls, tweens, teens, mature women—to experience a new level of confidence, cultural integrity, comfort, and health.

Sports participation is important for building lifelong leadership skills and self-confidence. In fact, in one survey it was discovered that 94% of women executives participated in sports (Source: EY Women Athletes Business Network & espnW, October 2014). We want all girls to have the opportunity to establish healthy lifestyles and build a foundation for future success.

Our first line of products — sports hijabs — will enable Muslim girls and women to be physically active and participate in sports while upholding their religious and cultural beliefs.

And if you don't wear a hijab, you can still support this effort to empower more young women to play (and win).  

ASIYA is creating three styles of sports hijabs to meet the specific needs of the Muslim female athletes who inspired and designed them.

 

ASIYA™Lite and ASIYA™Sport are ideal for sports practice or games, with the ASIYA Sport design tailored close to the neck and intended to tuck inside a uniform to avoid inadvertent snags or grabs from other players. 

ASIYA™Fit is ideal for working out with additional coverage in the front.

Designed to stay secure without the need for pins, our stretchy one-size-fits-all sports hijabs have a unique head-band feature inside to hold the hijab tight to the base of the neck. The ASIYA™Sport style now also comes in a Youth size, for girls age 10 and under.

Each style is made from our unique sweat-wicking and breathable soft mesh ASIYA™Cool fabric technology, so athletes can stay cool and comfortable while dressing modestly. 

Finally, a line of sports hijabs to help Muslim girls and women alike enjoy all the benefits of playing sports.

We Believe In Modesty — Clothing can represent your beliefs and who you are as a person.

We Believe In Freedom — Clothing should enable your endeavors, not be a barrier.

We Believe In The Power Of Sport — Participation in sports helps set girls up for success as students, community members, and future leaders.

We are in the midst of worldwide dialogue around topics like immigration, what women should and shouldn’t wear, and overall racial equality, questioning how we honor freedom of expression and inclusion. 

At the same time, amazing Muslim female athlete role models are emerging as international sports organizations are lifting their bans on headwear to allow Muslim women to compete in the hijab.

Earlier this year we even saw the first-ever US Olympian compete in a hijab, silver medalist Ibtihaj Muhammad (who reportedly chose to pursue fencing because the helmet covered her hair and neck). We want to join these amazing athletes as champions of inclusion and empowerment.

The idea for ASIYA began in the Brian Coyle Community Center gym, in the Cedar-Riverside neighborhood of Minneapolis, where Fatimah Hussein has been helping young Muslim girls gain access to sports and physical activity for the past decade. She founded a non-profit program — G.I.R.L.S. (Girls Initiative in Recreation and Leisurely Sports) — to create girls-only gym time several nights a week. 

As the girls gained self-confidence and a love of sports, they wanted athletic uniforms and apparel that let them compete in public while upholding their religious and cultural beliefs.

In a collaboration with the Cedar-Riverside community and the University of Minnesota, prototype basketball uniforms were developed in 2015, but Fatimah soon realized that a versatile line of sports hijabs — something that wasn’t readily available in the U.S. or anywhere — would create many more opportunities for girls to participate and grow through team play.

That realization inspired several generations of prototypes that were tested by the girls to optimize for fit, fabric, and performance. Experienced marketer Jamie Glover, who credits sports for helping to shape who she is today, joined Fatimah to build a brand so they could meet this need beyond Minneapolis.

Watch the girls run with the World Champion Minnesota Lynx in this recent WCCO-TV story.

Our brand name ASIYA (AH-see-ah) was selected because it’s the name of a highly revered woman from Islamic history, Asiya bint Muzahim, who is known for being courageous and standing up against injustice. We thought she was the ideal role model and champion for our cause.

The young girls you see in this campaign have been an integral part of the product design process and they can’t wait for finished production versions of these sports hijabs to be ready for action. That’s where you come in...   

  • Purchasing fabric
  • Cutting+Sewing manufacturing - we're proud to be Made in the USA!
  • Outfitting athletes with sports hijabs so they can play to their potential

Whether you want to pre-order a hijab or just help this mission become a reality, we have a reward option for you!

All three styles of sports hijabs are available for pre-order through this campaign in your choice of color — white, black, navy, or grey.

You can have a single hijab in any style for $35, or you can opt for a dual-pack of hijabs in different colors and/or styles for $60. Great for home and away game color options or having different styles for different uses.

If you want a dual-pack of hijabs AND the rest of our ASIYA gear available through this campaign (long sleeve shirt, drawstring bag, headband), there’s an option for that as well at the $100 level.

For campaign backers who want to support this effort but do not have a need for a sports hijab, we have several reward tiers where your contribution helps sponsor a young Muslim athlete.

For every ten $25 contributions (or every five $50 contributions) a promising athlete will be outfitted with an ASIYA hijab and gear. And as a thank you, we’ll send you some fun ASIYA-branded gear — either a headband or drawstring bag at the $25 level, or a high-performance long sleeve activewear shirt for $50.

You can also sponsor an athlete on your own at the $250 level, or a full team for $1,000. 

 

Fatimah Hussein, CEO, Co-Founder 

As a Licensed Graduate Social Worker, Fatimah has been dedicated to serving her community in Minneapolis for many years. Recognizing the need for girls-specific physical activities in the Muslim community specifically, she established the non-profit organization Girls Initiative in Recreation and Leisurely Sports (G.I.R.L.S.) in 2008, which provides resources and gym access for girls. Now she’s driven to make sure every Muslim girl who wants to play sports is able to play sports and gain all the lifelong benefits without needing to compromise her cultural beliefs. 

Jamie Glover, President & COO, Co-Founder 

Growing up playing competitive sports through college, including being named All-American Honorable Mention in volleyball, Jamie strongly believes that the court and field are critical classrooms for learning leadership, teamwork, and lessons like how to win with grace and lose with dignity. After ten years managing marketing roles for major brands, she is excited about working on this social venture, using business for good and making a meaningful impact in the world.

Jan-March 2016: Product Design - fit & style 

March-May 2016: Fabric Sourcing - evaluated over 80+ fabrics! 

May-June 2016: Prototype Development 

July-Sept 2016: Testing and Business Planning 

Oct-Nov 2016: Fundraising! 

Nov 2016 -Jan 2017: Manufacturing 

Feb 2017: Fulfillment - rewards received by the end of February! 

March 2017: Online sales of sports hijabs 

 April-June 2017: Development of next line - team uniforms & activewear!

Please support this campaign to help us create innovative activewear that is easy to move in, to play in, to compete in, and ultimately honor and encourage Muslim women of all ages to experience the benefits of playing sports while upholding their religious and cultural beliefs. Thank you!

story:
“Every journey starts with a single step.” -Confucius

Confucius is right; he usually is. It’s also true that active lifestyles are hard on your feet.  And if Confucius could have, he would have said you should give your feet the relief they deserve with a pair of Pakems!

Pakems is on a mission to fundamentally change what active people wear on their feet before and after their favorite activity.  Not only are Pakems a comfortable solution to getting where you want to go outdoors and relaxing afterward, they are perfect for your commute to work, to wear when you travel, to walk the dog, to run an errand - they are truly a "cool weather flip flop." 

Pakems are lightweight, packable shoes for outdoor enthusiasts. Our winter line includes both high-top and low-cut styles. Both are water-resistant, insulated, and have a solid rubber outsole for great traction.  What is really unique about Pakems is that they come with a matching tote bag to make them easy to take everywhere.  


Meaning, they are super lightweight and compressible so they fit into the handy bag that has compression straps for extreme packability.


Each pair of Pakems comes in a matching tote bag that has been battle tested by some of the most extreme athletes on the planet.  For those exact moments when you want to get out of your uncomfortable footwear, all you have to do is slide the shoes out of the bag, slip your feet in, and adjust the elastic draw cord for a precise fit.  When done wearing, you simply smoosh them together, and put them back in the bag for easy transport.  The strap on the Pakems bag can be removed and used to loop around your ski boot buckle for a hands-free way to carry your boots!  



We’re working to raise the money to get the children's molds made so they can enjoy Pakems too. The good news is the moulds only have to be made once.  Children's Pakems will be great for the end of the ski day when ski boots are very heavy for the little ones.  They are also great for fitting in a child's backpack on inclement weather school days.  We already have orders for kids shoes but can't fulfill the orders without your help.  Our hope is IndieGoGo fans will back this campaign to help us raise the $40k needed to complete the molds and buy the materials.  


Pakems started as a statement that Julie Adams, originally from Findlay, Ohio, made while on top of a mountain in Europe on a ski vacation.  She was able to take the extended trip after quitting her 18-year corporate career as an employment attorney. She left the security of her job so she could find a new career path which would allow her to spend more time with her 5-year old son. She was tired of him being the last one picked up from daycare every single day.  So there she was - sitting in her chair in the snow and having a few beers, with her ski boots off because they were so uncomfortable.

At that moment she said out loud, “I wish I had a pair of packable shoes to put on right now!”  Aha!!  Then, she thought about all of the times when she and her son would get to the bottom of the mountain and he would sit down and start crying because his ski boots hurt so “baaaaaaad” that he couldn’t walk. Being a single mom, she was always carrying her skis, her poles, her son’s skis and she was in ski boots herself, so there was nothing she could do but carry him by the handle on his ski harness like a lunch box through the village with him flailing and crying. Those then-imaginary boots would have made that walk very different.

Pakems has introduced a campaign called “Step Into Your Intentions.”  The liner in the foot bed of each shoe has a positive message on it that is important to our team members.  Julie is passionate about anti-bullying as she was bullied as a child. Thus, our first intention is “be kind.”

Thanks to Julie’s commitment and her perseverance, and with lots of help along the way, Pakems have been on the market for about eight months.  However, we’re a long way from reaching our full potential and getting Pakems on kid's feet. In order to do that we need your help. Support us by pledging today; we’ll be able to buy our new molds and produce kid's shoes and it sure will make Bodie super happy.


By backing Pakems, together we can carve a niche in the footwear industry (and allow a startup company to carve that niche).  You will become an important part of building a company in one of the hardest industries to break into. That’s what IndieGoGo is all about, right? Helping the little guy or in this case, the little gal. :)

Sincerely,

Julie Adams and the Pakems team.

story:
A Dream Come True!

My name is Rochelle Carino. I've been designing for 7 years working for other companies and decided to start my own label, Rochelle Carino, 3 years ago.  New York Fashion Week is the biggest platform in the United States for  new designers to show their work and can open up doors and endless possibilities. My line has been invited to showcase as part of an emerging designer show on February 8, 2014! This is the chance of a lifetime and I want to make the most of this incredible opportunity. Right now, I do all the designing, sewing, production, marketing, promotion and sales myself. I work a full time job to pay my bills so all of this has to be fit in whatever free time there is. But this is what I love doing and every minute is worth it. New York Fashion Week could be that final step which would take my career to the next level.  With your help my dream could finally become a reality!

Your Support Means Everything!

I need $5000 to help cover the show fees which include the venue, models, hair, make-up, marketing and transportation. This will also help with the cost of materials and production for orders generated from the show. Every penny helps even if I don't reach the entire goal.

I appreciate your support and I am excited to offer some fun perks in exchange!  All the items will be made by me and customized to what you want and your measurements. 

It All Started With a Fortune Cookie...

After a very frustrating and heartbreaking time, I asked the universe for some guidance and a sign that I was on the right path. That day, I got my answer in a fortune cookie. It said "Take that chance you've been considering". New York Fashion Week immediately popped in my head. At that moment, I made a promise to myself to really go for it and not let my own fears or self doubt get in my way. It's amazing how we can find inspiration and hope in the smallest things. Life is too short not to go after what you want.  The very foundation of my designs and business is based on that idea. Do what makes you happy. If you like it, wear it. I don't really follow the trends. All that matters is that you feel beautiful and let your confidence and personality shine through. My designs are girly, flirty, sexy and fun. I try to evoke that feeling a little girl has when she plays dress up, happy and ready to take on the world where there are endless opportunities and anything is possible and look great while doing it. I find inspiration in the little things and incorporate those details into my designs which most of the time is in the form of feathers, anything sparkly, or bold prints.

Ultimately I hope to take those values beyond my fashion line . I want to start a foundation and a fund so that I can help others achieve their goals and dreams. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please help me get the word out by telling your friends and sharing this on Facebook, instagram or any other social media site!  You can use the Indiegogo share tools! 

Follow me on instagram and tag me in a comment @rochellecarino  to receive a special promo code towards any purchase on my website, rochellecarino.wix.com/rochellecarino

I cannot thank you enough for taking the time to read this and for all of your help!!!!!
story_txt: A Dream Come True!My name is Rochelle Carino. I've been designing for 7 years working for other companies and decided to start my own label, Rochelle Carino, 3 years ago.  New York Fashion Week is the biggest platform in the United States for  new designers to show their work and can open up doors and endless possibilities. My line has been invited to showcase as part of an emerging designer show on February 8, 2014! This is the chance of a lifetime and I want to make the most of this incredible opportunity. Right now, I do all the designing, sewing, production, marketing, promotion and sales myself. I work a full time job to pay my bills so all of this has to be fit in whatever free time there is. But this is what I love doing and every minute is worth it. story:
ABOUT MALVIN + JOYCE

 
Over the last 20 years, fine crafted footwear has slowly slipped away from the USA, but Malvin + Joyce footwear is dedicated to change the way Americans buy their products. 

With over 15 years in the apparel & footwear industries, we have learned a great deal.  Over the last 5 years, we have reconnected to our deep roots of manufacturing footwear in the USA.  After being layed off in late 2008 and seeing Americans loosing jobs at an alarming rate, the reality hit hard that the U.S. and world economy was much worse than the media was portraying.  Even worse an overwhelming majority of American manufacturing businesses dating back to 20+ years were forced to shut their doors for good because o overseas competition.  A very small few remained.  We began to research the few that remained and an idea began to form which would take four years to come to realization.  The idea came to craft fine quality American-made men's workboots inspired by American Heritage.  Footwear that was designed, manufactured, sourced and machined 100% made in the USA.

Malvin + Joyce has struggled to launch the brand, but even with numerous delays we continued to remain unerringly committed to our American-made collection.  Never overlooking our committment to quality men's footwear.

Malvin + Joyce is now finally ready for the general public because of every last person who has worked with us to realize this dream and made this collection possible.

When we originally set out to source all the materials for Malvin + Joyce we vowed to only use the finest materials in the world. After waiting and then testing the materials we ordered from all over the world, we realized that the need to source in the US not only seemed to make the most sense, it was also deemed to be the most difficult and expensive at times.

As the economy grew more dire and many more of the USA supply chain manufacturers started to close up shop around the US it was our goal to do what little we could to help keep these manufacturers in business or at least remain more optimistic.

Our commitment to ONLY sourcing domestically from the leather we use down to sewing thread, we feel it is important to not only support other USA businesses, but to show other businesses that using an American supply chain is possible if you make an honest effort to find the suppliers they need.

It is our continued commitment to always use US companies in building our American brand and we hope you share our commitment when you consider buying our American-made products.

WHY DO YOU NEED FUNDING

Up until this point, we have completely self-funded the launch of our American-made brand.  We have succesffully designed and sourced Malvin + Joyce, finalizing the collection and manufacturing.  

We are now ready for our first-run production, which will cost $20,000, the bare bones required to begin production.  We are now asking you to join us and help the process of bringing footwear manufacturing and jobs back to the USA. 

The cost includes the cost to create molds, minimum order quantities, packaging, shipping and insurance.  We are hoping to raise at least $10,000 here BUT that's just the beginning.

Once we reach $20,000, any additional funding allows us to build our website, tell the story of the everyday Americans who inspired the Malvin + Joyce brand and to continue our mission of creating fine quality American-made & Inspired products ultimately putting Americans back to work.

THE IMPACT

The the craft of shoemaking is experiencing something of a renaissance. Over the last few years, as heritage brands have been rediscovered by a new generation of customers, especially young men, labels once seen as relics of American work wear now have an unexpected cool factor, stocked by stylish boutiques and obsessed about on fashion blogs.

That change has helped draw younger people into shoemaking and a new generation of young people are being trained to a job that had almost become extinct in the USA.  The fact we have a much younger shoemaking work force than we did 15 years ago is evidence there is more appeal to this work.

There is an obstacle right now for independent designers everywhere.  Independent designers must do everything themselves, from designing the footwear, producing the footwear and then selling the footwear.

We must rely on the fading cottage industry or do everything ourselves. Not only will Malvin + Joyce strengthen the community by creating jobs, but will continue the education of a dying art and help expand Chicago into a center of forward thinking in fashion and style.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Some people just can’t contribute financially and that's ok, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help.  If Malvin + Joyce Footwear inspires you, please tell a friend about this project.  Share links to our page, twitter and facebook!

We want to thank you for all of the support we are receiving during this campaign.  This dream would not become a reality with out the support of each and everyone of you.

story:
Our Story

The Occupy Wall Street movement is voicing the growing discontent of the 99% of Americans who are increasingly powerless as the 1% wields their financial power for their own gain. We are working to bring them these t-shirts graphics free in order to help get the word out.

The Impact

This simple project will help bring a much needed graphical voice to protesters who have lost their signage due to rain damage. Every penny of proceeds will go toward buying blank t-shirts, ink and sign-making materials.

What We Need & What You Get

We need $1,200 to purchase blank t-shirts, ink and other sign-making materials.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't help out financially, consider bringing blank t-shirts down to the protest site or at least spread the word on Facebook and Twitter!
