story:
Bammies = business + jammies 

We're changing the way women get dressed.

Introducing Collection 02 - "I FEEL"

Our Perks are the first-ever opportunity to own a piece of Bammies Collection 02!



Bammies is a core collection of comfortable yet chic style staples that minimizes your decision fatigue in the morning, allowing you to easily and aptly dress for the various appointments you have in your day -- from that breakfast meeting to the office to a networking cocktail to date night and beyond!

We've launched our Collection 02 - "I FEEL" exclusively on Indiegogo so YOU (and all your friends) can participate in the evolution of comfy-chic fashion, and help make it easier for women everywhere to get out the door each morning in less time and in more style.

Not only are we launching our Collection 02 with this Indiegogo campaign, but we are ALSO increasing our size offerings from XS up to 3X! 

And we could NOT be more excited. Because every body deserves a Bammies. 

The Bammies Benefits

  • Create a buildable wardrobe
  • Minimize your decision fatigue while getting dressed in the morning
  • Wear something better than yoga pants at work!
  • Elevate comfort without sacrificing style
  • Simplify your routine
  • Refine your personal style


The Perks

We have some fun ways you can contribute to our campaign that include the opportunity to shop our Collection 02 before anyone else and get personalized styling tips and a wardrobe analysis from us, the co-founders!
NOTE: Please include your preferred size with your Perk order! 
Collection 02 builds on the elevated comfort and basics of Collection 01 and adds some luxuriously comfortable fabrics in rich colors for Fall. 


The Rose Top - now available in Navy! The Rose Top is the modern take on a chic tee that's made of men's suit-shirt poplin in a boxy frame. Structure and form create an updated style that's a step up from casual. The Rose Top quickly became one of our top sellers from Collection 01 so we did it again for Collection 02 but this time in a drop-dead gorgeous, rich Navy. 



Our best-selling Logan Pant has returned in a new uber-comfy cotton twill in a gorgeous gray! Who doesn't love a high-waisted pant? Our Logan pair comes with a comfy elastic waist, and a wide leg that drapes in all the places you want—and none of the places you don't. A Collection 01 fave we brought it back in an updated color and fabric for fall



(Yes, we named this one after the Man Repeller.) Take your sweatshirt to work. We're elevating the traditional sweatshirt by reconstructing it in a structured shape with volume and a tapered elbow-length sleeve.  Here, in an amazing slate blue that will work with anything in your wardrobe. 



The "It" pant of the moment is getting a roomy update. The flat-pleat front on our Joan Cropped Trouser creates a sleek silhouette while allowing movement and giving you the space to you feel your most comfy self. 



This long-sleeved flowy top is going to be your go-to when you want to add a bright twist to your office garb. The front hits at the hip, while a longer back drapes elegantly with the added sultry surprise detail of a v-back that's still high enough to wear at the office. 



The Connell is back in black! Our stunner Connell Dress gets a highly requested makeover in black that works for every occasion. Wrap yourself in supremely soft fabric, kimono-inspired sleeves and an A-line skirt that fastens with buttons.



A onesie never looked so good. This statement-making jumpsuit features tuxedo-inspired lapels, a stay-put wrap front, and comfy-for-everyone elastic waist that can be worn low on the hip or at the waist. Flat pleats create flattering lines on the leg, which ends in an elegant taper that can be upgraded to sexy with just a click of a heel. 

The Bammies mission: 

1) Minimize morning decision fatigue for busy women, allowing them to easily dress for the various appointments they have in one day.

2) Help women use fashion to feel comfortable in their own skin. 


Guess what? They're into Bammies too...


Where the funds go...

Our funding from this campaign will go to producing the NEW Collection 02 that you see above, creating a NEW size run from 0 - 7 (our version of XS - 3X), and getting more and more women in Bammies so they can feel empowered to look and be the best versions of themselves every day!

60% of funds - fabrics & raw materials (elastics, buttons, lining & tags)

40% of funds - production (our seamstresses doing their thang)


What Makes Bammies Different?

There are a few brands out there developing comfort-based items, but we’ve found that most of them are really focused on pants. Yes, Bammies is highlighting the practical nature of fashion and putting comfort first. But we are providing you with a FULL RANGE of comfortable styles that work for various types of settings and needs.


Why Crowdfunding?

To us, Bammies is more than just a fashion line. It's a solution and an empowerment movement.

Bammies is a conversation between a couple of girlfriends just trying to be comfortable and look good doing it. And we love involving YOU, friends, in the conversation.

After all, the more involved you are, the better Bammies becomes. 

So, we want to involve as many women in our Bammies movement as possible. It is SO very important to us that all women feel amazing about who they are and how they look and this is one of the driving passions behind us launching this line. We want to make Bammies for all the ladies out there! 

As we are a start-up (read: two ladies doing their darndest to provide a positive experience for women through fashion), and originally launched on a pre-sale, we were limited in what we could offer in terms of sizing and quantity for our first Collection. 

We received such wonderful feedback from many women who wanted to see Bammies in additional sizes and we want to listen and deliver that as quickly as possible. In order to do that, we need to increase our production orders, which, of course, requires additional funding. 

We also received requests for different styles and colors, and are incorporating that feedback into our Collection 02. Bammies is only as good as the women who feel great in it! So involving you, our customers, in the development process is paramount to our success and is a cornerstone of our business. That's why we've offered perks that include you helping to decide what new styles we will develop for Collection 02. We want you to be a part of this conversation through clothing -- after all, fashion is simply another form of self-expression. 

We even have fun tags


How Bammies Became a Thing

Rosario Chozas, Co-Founder & Creative Director: Hi Indiegogo! Here's my story... After almost a decade of entrepreneurial endeavors in creative industries, I made a professional move into a more corporate setting, which dictated a different dress code. My coworkers and I would always talk about how I dressed, and how I felt really uncomfortable. I felt like I dressed differently than everyone around me, which made me feel weird and out of place. I tried to replicate the looks around me, but they felt so awkward. Eventually I said to myself, “Wait a minute, I'm a stylist. I know how to handle this.” I thought, "What are ways I could put together some looks where it would work for both me and my surroundings?" The way that I was able to resolve being true to myself and feeling appropriate was wearing things that were comfortable. Everyone would see me dressed in a way that was comfortable and then a joke started that I was wearing business jammies. And that's how it came about. I needed to be true to my looks and be comfortable... and make it look good for the office.


Who's behind Bammies?

ROSARIO CHOZAS /CO-FOUNDER & CREATIVE DIRECTOR (LEFT) 
As a heart-centered entrepreneur, Rosario Chozas has developed a decade-long career that spans her various passions of fashion, tech, and content production, all with a singular focus of empowering women.

After gaining invaluable experience in the advertising world as a wardrobe stylist working with clients such as Buenos Aires Fashion Week, Chozas co-launched Maison Aubele, a design institute that offered personal image, styling and fashion color theory courses to female entrepreneurs and professionals. Chozas developed and implemented the institute’s unique course curriculum that promoted positive self-perception through an intelligent wardrobe. 

Simultaneously, Chozas founded the White Professional Color Lab, a personal image color consultancy that serviced clients such as L’Oreal, FOX Latin America, IBM, Kraft Foods, The Style Institute (Peru), and fashion designer Benito Fernandez.

After a move to Miami, Chozas co-created and produced the Women, Innovation & Technology (WIT) summit at the renowned eMerge Americas tech conference. Through WIT and its community activations, Chozas shaped an evolving community that empowers and connects women in tech.

JULIA FORD-CARTHER /CO-FOUNDER & CEO (RIGHT)
Julia Ford-Carther is an EQ enthusiast, coach and founder of SLF Media, a user-engaged media network and digital media platform that delivers modern lifestyle content for Millennial women via entertaining and empowering channels. 

Prior to founding Bammies and SLF Media, with a B.A. in Communication from Stanford University, Julia developed a robust career in media covering lifestyle topics for publications such as Allure magazine, The Huffington Post, MindBodyGreen.com, and Ocean Drive magazine. She has served on various dating and media panels; and has been featured in EBONY and Aventura magazines, CBS Miami, Racked Miami, and others. 


Risks & Challenges

Having already produced and fulfilled our first round of Collection 01, we're confident in our ability to deliver a quality product that resonates with women and empowers a strong sense of self. We have set aside the requisite amount of time necessary for production and fulfillment for this next collection.

The biggest potential challenge comes down to sizing and making sure you get the size that makes you look and feel the best. Our sizes are generous (and comfy!) but run along the standard scale of S, M, L, etc. You can check out our size chart above for the right fit. If for any reason you are unsatisfied with the fit of your Bammies, we'll happily exchange the piece for a different size.

If we don't reach our full goal, don't worry -- you'll still get your Bammies. We just wouldn't be getting Bammies on as many fabulous bodies as we'd love to! Sad face. 


Got questions? We've got answers!

Feel free to email us at "info [at] bammies dot life" with any questions you have. We're excited to hear from you!

Size Chart


Other Ways You Can Help Spread the Bammies Movement

Even if you can't contribute, you can still help women look and feel amazing through Bammies!

  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to email, tweet, post, like, and share this campaign with ANYONE you think would enjoy it! Trust us, they will thank you. 

THANK YOU!

story:
Ever bought an item of performance outdoor wear and had to compromise? Mediocre fit? Styles uninspiring? Frustrating lack of great color combinations? We have.

FIREFIT is here to change that.

Our Vision

Don't compromise with an off-the-rack product when you can have a 100% custom made down jacket to your exact measurements, with superb technical performance and curated designer style.

My name is James, the founder of FIREFIT. I have bicycled from Alaska to Argentina, run across Australia from Perth to Sydney, and tackled climbing Mt Everest. It's an active lifestyle, you might say. Yet I saw compromise in the clothes I wore. Stylish products let me down when performance mattered, and away from the extremes, whether hiking or on the streets of London or Manhattan, performance items looked out of place. And fit was always a gamble.

So we are changing the way performance apparel is made.

No More Compromises.



Our Founder

I'm originally from London but now live in Los Angeles. Life has been an interesting journey so far. As well as my outdoor travels I hold degrees from Imperial College London and Dartmouth College, have BASE jumped from a 2,000ft waterfall, been kidnapped twice, written a book, and been a guest speaker at Stanford University. I'm passionate about making an impact and helping others harness the best of what is inside them. A deep feeling of confidence, THAT is the real power of what we create for customers at FIREFIT. The "New Shoes" feeling, on overdrive.


The Ultimate Custom Fit Down Jacket

We have blended British roots and Alpine influence with cutting-edge design and technology to achieve what has not been done before - bringing Savile Row, 5th Avenue and Rodeo Drive to the performance outdoor arena. Join the future!

We aim to make the ultimate custom fit down jacket.

  • 100% custom made and custom fitted
  • Superb performance and light weight from the very best materials
  • Curated designs and colors, or choose your own for that unique look!

We are offering 3 styles for both Women and Men, each with a set of curated color combinations. Or choose your own colors! (We’ll confirm your choices after purchase).

Full product specs:

  • 850 fill power hydrophobic white goose down
  • Water-repellent, ultra-light, strength-enhanced ripstop fabric
  • YKK weatherproof zippers
  • Even our thread is made in Germany and 4x stronger than standard
  • Inner pocket reverses into a stash bag
  • Elasticated waist cord
  • Designed and made in the USA

Free Virtual Fitting - How It Works

Just like the best tailors and dressmakers of London we provide a free fitting for every customer.

(1) We will send you a link to our website www.firefit.cc to enter your measurements needed for the garment. It takes just 15 minutes and each simple step has instructions. We also request 2 photos which we’ll use to determine your posture and the best garment fit; again it is very simple and instructions are provided.

(2) We will then make and send you a free FIT shirt based on those measurements. It's a shirt designed to help us assess the fit of the final jacket. All we need back are some additional photos so our experts can assess if any adjustments are needed. An example picture of a FIT shirt is shown at the bottom of this page.

(3) We will then get working on your final garment!

We aim to ship your finished item within 3-5 weeks of your order (based on prompt fitting feedback).


Choose Your Design - STEP 1: STYLE
Pick a style from the options below. These styles match the options in the 'Perks' section.
WOMEN - STYLE 1

WOMEN - STYLE 2

WOMEN - STYLE 3

MEN - STYLE 1

MEN - STYLE 2

MEN - STYLE 3


Choose Your Design - STEP 2: COLOR
For all of the above designs you can choose any of the color combinations shown in the GALLERY tab above. Or pick your own! We will ask for your choice after purchase.
When choosing colors, please note the following:
  • Style 1: Front, Back and Upper Arms Color ONE, Side Panel, Lower Arms and Liner Color TWO
  • Style 2: Front, Back and Arms Color ONE, Side Panel and Liner Color TWO
  • Style 3: Outer shell is all Color ONE, Liner is all Color TWO
Feeling creative? Here are your color choices!



The FIREFIT Promise

“It is not our goal to satisfy or please our customers. Our goal is to amaze them.”

As part of our vision to change how performance apparel is made, we are committed to provide the levels of service you deserve. Our commitment to you includes keeping you informed if anything changes with your order, such as the expected delivery date. We are production ready so every order will be fulfilled,

If you are not satisfied with your item we will make you another one from scratch completely free of charge, or give you a full refund.


Why are We Here?

We are launching on Indigogo to reach people like you who are willing to ‘take a chance’ on the future, and hopefully gain some momentum for our brand. Remember, even Gucci had to start somewhere! Funds will be used to develop our future product lines.

We are limiting supply to a total of 50 items at the price shown for this launch, so don't delay!


Other Ways You Can Help

Have some great ideas for a product? Have some inspired color combinations we are missing? Think this is a great product but not ready to purchase? No problem!

  • Join us on Facebook (Firefit) and Instagram (firefit_cc)
  • Tell people who you think might be interested. There are a number of tools to share right next to this text.
  • Send us a note on Facebook or email. Let us know what you think!

A huge thank you for your support!

(Women Style 2 - Charcoal Grey / Yellow)

(Women Style 2 - Robin Blue / Charcoal)

(Men Style 2 - Hunter / Lime)


(Men Style 3 - Moroccan Blue / Yellow)


FIT Shirt

Here is an example of our FIT shirt, used to confirm and adjust fit prior to making your final jacket.


And finally, a photo of our founder overlooking Mt Everest. We know the outdoors.
story_txt:
Ever bought an item of
performance outdoor wear and had to compromise? Mediocre fit? Styles uninspiring? Frustrating
lack of great color combinations? We have.FIREFIT is here to change that.Our Vision
Don't compromise with an off-the-rack product when you can
have a 100% custom made down jacket to your exact measurements, with superb technical
performance and curated designer style.My name is James, the founder of FIREFIT. I have bicycled from Alaska to Argentina, run
across Australia from Perth to Sydney, and tackled climbing Mt Everest. It's an active lifestyle, you might say. Yet I saw compromise in the clothes I
wore. Stylish products let me down when performance mattered, and away
from the extremes, whether hiking or on the streets of London or Manhattan, performance
items looked out of place. And fit was always a gamble. 
So we are changing the way performance apparel is made.No More Compromises. Our FounderI'm originally from London but now live in Los Angeles. Life has been an interesting journey so far. As well as my outdoor travels I hold degrees from Imperial College London and Dartmouth College, have BASE jumped from a 2,000ft waterfall, been kidnapped twice, written a book, and been a guest speaker at Stanford University. I'm passionate about making an impact and helping others harness the best of what is inside them. A deep feeling of confidence, THAT is the real power of what we create for customers at FIREFIT. The "New Shoes" feeling, on overdrive.The Ultimate Custom Fit Down Jacket
We have blended British roots and Alpine influence with
cutting-edge design and technology to achieve what has not been done before - bringing
Savile Row, 5th Avenue and Rodeo Drive to the performance outdoor
arena. Join the future!
We aim to make the ultimate custom fit down
jacket.


100% custom made and custom fitted


Superb performance and light weight from the very
best materials


Curated designs and colors, or choose your own
for that unique look!


We are offering 3 styles for both Women and
Men, each with a set of curated color combinations. Or choose
your own colors! (We’ll confirm your choices after purchase).
Full product specs:


850 fill power hydrophobic white goose down


Water-repellent, ultra-light, strength-enhanced ripstop
fabric


YKK weatherproof zippers


Even our thread is made in Germany and 4x
stronger than standard


Inner pocket reverses into a stash bag


Elasticated waist cord

Designed and made in the USA

Free Virtual Fitting - How It Works
Just like the best tailors and dressmakers of London we provide a free fitting for every customer.
(1) We will send you a link to our website www.firefit.cc to enter your measurements needed for the garment. It takes just 15 minutes and each simple step has instructions. We also request 2 photos which we’ll use to determine your posture and the best garment fit; again it is very simple and instructions are provided.
(2) We will then make and send you a free FIT shirt based on those measurements. It's a shirt designed to help us assess the fit of the final jacket. All we need back are some additional photos so our experts can assess if any adjustments are needed. An example picture of a FIT shirt is shown at the bottom of this page.
(3) We will then get working on your final garment!
We aim to ship your finished item within 3-5 weeks of your order (based on prompt fitting feedback).
Choose Your Design - STEP 1: STYLEPick a style from the options below. These styles match the options in the 'Perks' section.WOMEN - STYLE 1

WOMEN - STYLE 2

WOMEN - STYLE 3

MEN - STYLE 1


MEN - STYLE 2



MEN - STYLE 3




Choose Your Design - STEP 2: COLORFor all of the above designs you can choose any of the color combinations shown in the GALLERY tab above. Or pick your own! We will ask for your choice after purchase.When choosing colors, please note the following:


Style 1: Front, Back and Upper Arms Color ONE, Side Panel, Lower Arms and Liner Color TWO

Style 2: Front, Back and Arms Color ONE, Side Panel and Liner Color TWO

Style 3: Outer shell is all Color ONE, Liner is all Color TWO


Feeling creative? Here are your color choices!





The FIREFIT Promise

“It is not our goal to satisfy or please our customers. Our goal
is to amaze them.”
As part of our vision to change how performance apparel is made,
we are committed to provide the levels of service you deserve. Our commitment
to you includes keeping you informed if anything changes with your order, such
as the expected delivery date. We are production ready so every order will be fulfilled,
If you are not satisfied with your item we will make you another
one from scratch completely free of charge, or give you a full refund.Why are We Here?We are launching on Indigogo to reach people like
you who are willing to ‘take a chance’ on the future, and hopefully gain some
momentum for our brand. Remember, even Gucci had to start somewhere! Funds will
be used to develop our future product lines.We are limiting supply to a total of 50 items at the price shown for this launch, so don't delay!
Other Ways You Can
Help

Have some great ideas for a product? Have some inspired color
combinations we are missing? Think this is a great product but not ready to
purchase? No problem! 


Join us on Facebook (Firefit)
and Instagram (firefit_cc)


Tell people who you
think might be interested. There are a number of tools to share right next to
this text.


Send us a note on
Facebook or email. Let us know what you think!

A huge thank you for your support!

(Women Style 2 - Charcoal Grey / Yellow)


(Women Style 2 - Robin Blue / Charcoal)

(Men Style 2 - Hunter / Lime)





(Men Style 3 - Moroccan Blue / Yellow)


FIT Shirt
Here is an example of our FIT shirt, used to confirm and adjust fit prior to making your final jacket.


And finally, a photo of our founder overlooking Mt Everest. We know the outdoors.

story:
What the Heck is Going on Here?

My name is Krista Cagg. I am an independent/self-published author of the steampunk series: The William's Hunt. More recently, and perhaps most importantly, I am the caregiver for my mother who is suffering from cancer. All of this is a full time job and then some, but I decided to help augment income by getting back into a passion I discovered a dozen or so years ago, that of beading jewelry. Creating something has been and always will be an important part of my life, be it characters/worlds/adventures or some pretty little trinket that augments neck or wrist.

That's Nice, So What do You Want from and What's in it for Us?

Well, self-publishing is a lot of work with very little financial reward. Caring for my mother doesn't pay in any way other than giving back to her what she gave to me for decades. In order to make Shards of Bifrost work I need supplies. When we moved from Olympia, WA to Savannah, GA then to Milton, PA all of my beading supplies were eliminated. I've managed to replace the basics, but I need much, much more.

Because I've done this before I know what I need, what is liked and how to make them. I've even added to what I make, such as stitch markers for knitters. What I didn't have then that I have access to now are places like Etsy where I can set up shop. In addition to that, I attend conventions where I peddle my books. The jewelry will be a fabulous compliment to those, including my plans to create items that reflect the characters and events in my series.

The goal I've set will provide the supplies, cost of marketing online (website, Etsy shop, etc) as well as provide a base to work with for any unexpected financial need that may arise. (Just because I've done it doesn't mean I'm flawless.) I will be attending ConNooga in Chattanooga, TN the last weekend in February, and I intend to have a good representation of jewelry to sell along side my book, The Milan Job. From there I will travel to Savannah, GA for Gnomecon the following weekend. (And if you are attending either con stop by and say hello!)

In addition to the jewelry I offer as perks of this fundraiser, I've had some absolutely fantastic people donate items. Words cannot describe the gratitude I feel for the support they have shown me! Have a look at what's available in the Perks, and photographs of the items are in the gallery!

Yeah, and This Makes You Special How?

I'm a stubborn old mule who refuses to roll over and take it! I just need some help from time to time. This is one of those times! Things are tight for my husband and I since he's the only one bringing in a paycheck of any substance at the moment. Mom's health requires someone at home with her at all times. While this allows me time to write self-publishing doesn't bring in as much as is needed. Shards of Bifrost would add to that as a less risky endeavor. And beading is a nice change when the Writer's Block Goblin steals my brain.

Shards of Bifrost began in Olympia, WA in 2001. Then, I sold my jewelry at SCA (Society of Creative Anachronism) events as well as locally owned businesses. I learned the tricks of creating the jewelry, marketing, pricing and promotion. My market now has expanded thanks due in part to the internet, but also through connections made through conventions, communities and friends.

Now, I'm returning to something I know how to do, something I enjoy and believe others will too. I want to return to the smaller conventions with my books and my jewelry where I can meet even more people, expand my horizons and gain more exposure.

This Still Sounds Risky

It is. Any venture is, but I've been here before. I know what's ahead of me with beading, I know what I need to buy and I have a lot more resources available to me than I did before. This includes a support network of friends and family who all want to see me succeed. I'm not too proud to turn to them.

There are other beaded jewelry stores out there. I know I'll just be one of them, same way I'm just another bitty author in a sea of bigger and better fish. I'm putting the two together, playing one off the other and hoping that the whole will be better than its parts.

Okay, but I'm Broke and Still Want to Help

That's okay! Share this on Facebook, Twitter, G+ or anywhere! You'd be doing me a solid just by spreading the word. And if you can't do that? Let me know you believe in me, that you wish me the best. Words of support are sometimes better coin than anything else!

"Mara is a fantastic new stimulating device for couples, so discreet you can even wear it on the beach. And it's equipped with a bass activation mode, perfect for use in nightclubs and parties. 10/10! Only on Indiegogo!"  

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Our philosophy while designing Mara was simple: we just wanted to create a device for couples which can really satisfy both of us and which doesn't get boring after one use. We managed to realize and solve all problems and weaknesses that other vibrators for couples on the market have.                                                                                   -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Solo or with your partner involved - no matter where he or she is at that moment, next to you or on another continent. When worn by men, both partners’ stimulation is only possible when practicing "Seventy Nine" sex position (check out the picture at the end). It can also be used for prostate massage.                      

     Mara pleasuring both partners during intercourse.  .....................................................................................................................................
  3. Play with your partner via the Mara app or remote control from anywhere in the world. The Mara app has two user modes: visible and invisible. If you want to control the device with your phone in public places, you probably want to keep a low profile. In visible mode, you can see all the controls on the screen. The user interface is very simple with large buttons and all it takes is touch 'n' swipe. In invisible mode you get a black screen with all controls invisible. It's really easy to use after you have used visible mode a few times. Besides in bed, we and our volunteers just loved playing on the beach, while swimming and in public places like shops, restaurants, nightclubs and dinner parties. .....................................................................................................................................
  4. Music Activation. You can pair Mara with your iPod, phone or any other music player and it will replicate bass vibrations on your clitoris and vagina. It can also listen to the music and provide matching vibrations. In nightclubs, parties, on the beach or in your workplace. Mara vibrates and pulses to club music, concerts or to your lover’s voice. The mic is built into the wireless remote control and can be kept in a purse, in your hand or in someone else’s - adding to the extra excitement of not knowing what’s coming next. :)                                         .....................................................................................................................................
  5. Smart design remote control. Completely waterproof and small with all the buttons just in the right place. You can hold it in your hand or put it in your pocket. You don't have to reach into your pocket to control it. The Mara remote is designed in such a way that you can push the buttons from outside the pocket. We invested a great deal of funds and time into remote control development for Mara. Other manufacturers just don't pay enough attention to remotes, which in our opinion are one of the most important things for wearable couples vibrators. We did, and it works and looks perfect! We focused on building a simple and easy-to-use remote control for Mara.                    ....................................................................................................................................
  6. Additional external On/Off button placed on a part of the Mara clitoral zone. For usage and control without the remote control or phone app. You can turn Mara on/off through pants, a bikini or a skirt without taking them off. Push once and Mara turns on; push twice for Intelligent Vibration Mode; push three times in two seconds to power off. (3 times in 2 sec to avoid accidental shut down - you don't want that to happen :)  The button is virtually invisible to avoid any discomfort to your labia.                                                                                                     .................................................................................................................................... 
  7. Fully adjustable hands-free clitoral stimulator, which you can perfectly adjust for complete pleasure and full comfort. Maximum discretion and invisibility in all situations. The clitoral vibration drive is placed directly underneath the clitoral pads.     .....................................................................................................................................  
  8. G-spot stimulation in a vaginal insert. Vaginal vibration drives are placed to stimulate the G-spot directly. You can choose different vibration patterns separately for the G-spot and the clitoris. Additional vaginal inserts for Mara will be available after June 2015 and we will send one for free to US & Canada customers only.                                                                                                                             ..................................................................................................................................
  9. Intelligent. Mara has the ability to record and replay any pattern, allowing you to have a completely personalized experience every time you use it. Mara constantly tracks your vibrating choices and memorizes them during the session to produce perfect vibration patterns made just for you. There is a separate button for intelligent vibration on the Mara app, or just push the external button on Mara twice to activate it.             ....................................................................................................................................
  10. Superb on low speed settings. Thanks to the Haptic Drive we use, Mara delivers unprecedented sensations on slow movement modes. 72% of women prefer slower but more powerful movements on the clitoris. Mara is the very first vibrator that delivers that. If you are in the 28% of women who enjoy faster vibrations, Mara will easily deliver that too.                                                                                                                                                                                      ...............................................Technical info...........................................................      


  • The Haptic Drive that Mara uses  is the strongest and quietest ever made for this kind of device. The greatest advantage of this technology is its super powerful and long movements on low speed settings. Vibrations speeds of 5Hz - 18000HZ in 1% steps will reach and fulfill everyone's desires and exceed all expectations. Equipped with three independent Haptic Feedback drives, Mara is light years ahead of competition. Combined, they deliver a maximal vibration amplitude of 9.8G, which makes it the strongest vibrator ever made. Vaginal insert MVA 7.0G+1.4G and clitoral stimulator MVA 1.4G. Don't worry, you don't have to use all of that power.
    • Replicating human touch: It uses Haptic Feedback Technology which means that when you or someone else who controls Mara replicates real human touch you can immediately feel it in your bed (or in your panties). The Haptic Drive provides completely different vibrations than conventional motors used in old-fashioned vibrators. We took that advantage and programmed Mara with 10 different vibration wave forms you can choose remotely. You can also choose between tactile and circular vibration modes at any time, as well as between different speeds and powers for vaginal and clitoral stimulation separately. Or choose to switch one of them off.
      • 110% more power (Spinal Tap Scale: 11 )
      • 340% greater sensation range compared to common vibrators on market
      • 95% less noise               
      • The Direct Focused Vibrations featured in Mara’s design can be achieved only with new Haptic Drive Technology combined with two different kinds of silicone. Vibrations are directed and focused exactly to zones where they're needed. No numb body parts with Mara.                                                                                                                
      •  Mara is so powerful and long lasting, you can also use it for full body massage.       
  • Wireless charging. Mara comes with a very discreet plastic box for charging and storage. Lockable and child-safe. No one could tell what is inside. You charge Mara while it's locked inside.                                                                                                     .............................................................................................................................................. 
  •  Battery is a rechargeable Li-Ion with 2600 mAh capacity so it will last for 3-5 hours or dozen of sessions without recharging (depending on speeds). Fully charged in under an hour, with 75% capacity charged in 15 minutes. For complete discretion, we designed the box to look like an external HDD. In the package you get USB and 110/220v compatible cables for the Mara case. ............................................................................................................................................
  • Mara is completely silent: 23dB on the lowest speed setting to 34dB on the highest speed. Yes, that silent! That's because motors in Mara use electromagnetic resonance for movement, which is silent technology used in High-End medical devices.                                                                                                                                             ............................................................................................................................................. 
  • Full Magnetic Shielding. We can proudly say that Mara is the very first vibrator with a magnetic shield. You can put Mara close to credit cards or phones without damaging them. Also, it's much healthier for your body compared to vibrators without shielding.                                                                                                                           .............................................................................................................................................
  • Mara is made of super soft medical grade Class V Anti-Microbial silicone and a medical grade alloywhich is used for the internal parts to keep it ultra light weight, very strong and adjustable. 100% free of phthalate, nickel, lead, etc. We will always use only inert and body safe medical grade materials.     .............................................................................................................................................
  • Mara is strong in attitude and exquisite in versatility.                                                       Use it wisely – there’s no telling where it’ll take you.                                                 

    • Fully operational Mara prototypes in its production configuration have been tested for four months now by 52 volunteers, couples and individuals(age 21-68), with almost 100% positive feedback.


    A vibrator must be as enjoyable for any couple as it is for a single person. It must bring a whole new level of joy and pleasure. If it doesn't do that - it doesn't work well.

    Until 2011, we never thought that we would be developing adult sex devices. We bought different kinds of sex toys which we used just  once or twice before they became boring. We thought that we were just the kind of people who simply got bored with toys really fast. But the problem wasn't in us. We just couldn't find the perfect toy which could satisfy us in the right way. We made a device which outperforms all other products we tested and decided to offer it to the world. We are sure that Mara will be a huge success on the market, and that it will force other manufacturers to better serve their consumers. 

    • After thousands of dollars spent on adult toys which don't work very well, we always talked about making the perfect toy to give us perfect pleasure and which we could use for a long time without getting bored with it.
    • Talking to our friends, we realized that nobody was completely satisfied with their sex toys. We concluded that the only sex toy which doesn't get boring for a couple, and the only one which perfectly delivers two way satisfaction, is wearable vibrators. And none of them worked well. We listened to dozens of our friends' experiences and decided to finally go with the project.
    • Both of us are engineers with years of experience in high tech industrial design. That's why we had more than enough technical knowledge for the decision to design Mara. 
    • We were never a part of the sex toy industry. Some things are better seen from the outside. Adult toy industry designers are mostly boring engineers who lost touch with real world customers years ago, or never even had it in the first place. We just realized that the perfect toy for us wasn't on the market and when we saw how much new technology we could put into Mara, we definitely decided to make it forourselves and all  others who feel same way.  
    • Unfortunately, all of the technology that Mara has comes with a price. You can't expect to have a state-of-the-art, multi-functional, ultralight, supersafe, highquality device for small bucks. A real economical MSRP should be much more than $139, but we agreed to cut our profit percentages to a minimum, in order to make a great value device and gain good company promotion for the future. Indiegogo prices are slightly higher than the manufacturing price.

    • So far, we have been entirely self-funded. Your pledge will help us finance manufacturing costs and the first round of production. We need your help to order equipment to start serial production and further app polishing. We will be ready to order tooling by the end of January. Some of the tools are already ordered. High tech product development is incredibly expensive. Please understand that we are a small company and we have already invested almost all of our money in this project. That's how strongly we believe in Mara and our other high-end adult toys prototypes and ideas.
    • We expect the first units to be available in February and we will fulfill backer rewards with the first possible batch of products. Because it's not our first time designing and manufacturing a high tech product, and due the fact that we have already used our existing supply chain numerous times for our past business activities, we will surely avoid the delays and hurdles that often appear when entering production for the first time.
    • We have been developing adult sex toys for over two years now (as of November 2014) and, among four other prototypes, we chose Mara to be first device which we will offer the world. And we're sure we made the perfect choice.
    • Before creating the final design for Mara, with the full assistance of our gynecologist friend who helped us design Mara's anatomical shape to perfectly fit and hold without causing any discomfort, we made and humantested over 80 different designs using our 3D printers, handmade molds, injected silicone casting and our own CNC machines.
    • All people who back the Mara project will receive a special thank you note and a 30% discount on our next three soon-to-be-launched devices.
    • Our contributors can also become  beta testers in our future projects, three of them coming in 2015. Customers who are interested in writing detailed reviews and sending them back to us can get a test prototype of our devices in development. With 100% discretion guaranteed.
    • In mid 2015 we will establish Mara production regardless of campaign success, and every contributor will get their reward in time.
    • We have 3 more different adult toys prototypes in the human testing phase and four more currently in the prototype design phase. At least three of them are expected to enter the market in 2015. 
    • Fully adjustable additional vaginal inserts for Mara will be available after June 2015 and we will send one of them free to US & Canada customers. Mara vaginal inserts will be 100% compatible with at least two of our future devices.
    • We will also produce a cheaper light version of Mara called Mara Lite with a wireless remote control, but without Mara App control and Music Activation. 
    • The Mara App will be available on the App Store and on Google Play in April 2015.

story:
The Story of MORANO beachBAG

With beach season right around the corners…do you secretly dread a day at the beach knowing you have to lug so many things?  Do you wish there was an easier way to carry everything you need? Does a day at the beach hurt your back for days, after laying on stones and concrete?

If you answered “Yes” to any of these questions, you may want to keep reading...

Overview

Our popular culture reinforces the idea that a day at the beach can be a pain in the butt. We're out to change that fallacious idea one MORANO beachBAG at a time!

Help us establish an easy, all-in-one bag to serve beach goers everywhere. For 88 $ you can get your very own MORANO beachBAG and it can change your beach experience for the rest of your life. You may actually enjoy going to the beach with ease, leading you to go more often and enjoy all the mental and physical benefits of a day at the beach.

Empower us to make this vision a reality with a donation to this project today!

More about the Project

Packing for a day at the beach with the family can almost seem like packing for a week long vacation. Between towels, chairs, umbrellas, food, drinks and toys - it can be enough to fill the back of a mini-van.

“If you don’t have the right gear, you all will be miserable,” said Eileen Ogintz, a family travels expert and author of the “Summer Guide to Fun” at Takingthekids.com.

“The right gear can really make a difference” – this fact prompted us to dig deeper into a solution.  This is where we started to envision MORANO beachBAG and all the possible benefits:

  1.  SUN: When our skin is directly exposed to the sun, our bodies make vitamin D, a vital tool that helps with calcium absorption and building strong bones. Some of it comes from diet, but a good portion also comes from the sun. And according to the Mayo Clinic, as little as 10 minutes of sun exposure can provide us with our daily dose. According to the vitamin D council, "your body can produce 10,000 to 25,000 IU of vitamin D in just a little under the time it takes for your skin to turn pink."

  2. SAND: The soles of your feet have more sweat glands and nerve-endings per square centimeter than any other part of your body. And walking barefoot stimulates them much more than walking in shoes.  Not only are you stimulating nerve endings when you walk on the sand, but you're also strengthening the muscles in your feet, which don't get used nearly as much when you're wearing shoes. And according to Martin Zucker, author of Earthing: The Most Important Health Discovery Ever? You may be better connected to the earth when you ditch your shoes, reaping vital mood-boosting benefits. "Earthing," argues Zucker, reconnects our bodies to the ever-present energy of the earth, which modern lifestyles have increasingly diminished

  3. SEA: Seawater contains high levels of various minerals — including magnesium, potassium and iodine — which may help fight infection, offer therapeutic effects, and potentially help the body heal and detoxify.  Swimming is linked to decreased stress and increased sense of wellbeing; studies have shown swimming and water-based exercise help to decrease anxiety and depression.  Aside from its therapeutics effects, swimming provides excellent physical exercise, employing most of our major muscle groups, especially as the water provides gentle resistance.

We want to stop beach goers from worrying about people stealing, comfortable seating and the battle of the bags and start getting to the beach with EASE.  We have conquered all these issues with one sleek and sexy bag called the MORANO beachBAG. 

It hides your money, wallet, creams etc. and it provides easy, comfy seating, AND it rolls up with a nice strap letting it fit right under your arm.  No more trunk full of beach stuff, no more multiple trips, no more setting up and tearing down chairs, just bring your MORANO beachBAG and enjoy your day.  Remember when someone always had to “Man the bags” so nothing was stolen, well with the MORANO beachBAG everyone can join in on the fun together because MORANO beachBAG has a secret pouch for all your items…

Wait did we hear you say you want to go to the beach back-to-back days?? No problem, toss your MORANO beachBAG in the wash, yes, it is machine washable.

We feel these features make us incredibly qualified to succeed.  This paired with attention to detail and quality service will make us the leader in the industry.


About Us

MORANO beachBAG team is obsessed with creating a great helpful device that’s durable, affordable and convenient for your beach days. More times than not when companies design new products they contain preliminary flaws but our goal is to stay dedicated to quality because we know your day of fun is at stake!

We have engineered a unique bag that is second to none. Not only that, but it is more durable and is machine washable so do not have to worry about replacing it.

Help us make this product a reality and let’s get to the beach


How You Can Help

For us to bring the MORANO beachBAG to life, we need your support!

Your generous funding will help us get things started in order to realize our product. It will assist us with the cost of further development, manufacturing and production of the first prototype. More importantly you get the chance to be one of the first users of the MORANO beachBAG.

We will also be using the funding to expand the possibilities for the usage for consumers as well as enterprise solutions of the MORANO beachBAG technology, to further customize the first version of the MORANO beachBAG and create accessories.

The MORANO beachBAG needs pledging but above all it needs your attention and interest! If you love this product as much as we do then please take a moment to click on one of our social media buttons (Facebook, Twitter and our website at the bottom of the page). Help us spread the word and get things started!

How We'll Use the Funds

As per our calculations, we need about 7.521 USD  in order to break MORANO beachBAG onto the market. That will includes molds, materials, labor and related expenses for production.

Final Thank You and Links

We feel so grateful to everyone who has taken the time to read out campaign and for those who contributed what they could to make a difference and helping us spread the word.  We have spent the last few months working hard to bring our vision to life in this campaign and it was worth every minute thanks to all our generous supporters. 

Please know your efforts, even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed.  We will continue to keep you posted on what your donation helped us achieve.  You are part of our MORANO beachBAG family.

If you wish to contact us:

Website: http://moranobeachbag.com

Our Social Media Connections:

Twitter:  https://twitter.com/MORANOBeachBAG

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MORANObeachBAG

Contact Information

Name: Anita Morano

Phone Number: ++386 (0)41 224 322

E Mail: info@moranobeachbag.com

If you have thoughts or would like to discuss a collaboration or sponsorship, we would love to hear from you, please feel free to contact us at info@moranobeachbag.com

*Don't forget the shipping!*

Worldwide Shipping Rates (Pošta Slovenije)

  • International rates (PDF file)

Note:  We ship anywhere in the world. For our DELUXE packages, we are open to discuss your preferable shipping method. You are very welcome to contact us at anytime.

When we will start shipping?

While the actual delivery date may vary, our goal is to get the MORANO beachBAG into your hands by May 2015, the cooler bags by March 2015. Our team will keep everyone informed on our progress and be 100% transparent.

The Story of MORANO
beachBAG
With beach season right
around the corners…do you secretly dread a day at the beach knowing you have to
lug so many things?  Do you wish there was an easier way to
carry everything you need? Does a day at the beach hurt your back
for days, after laying on stones and concrete? 
If you answered “Yes” to
any of these questions, you may want to keep reading...
Overview
Our popular culture
reinforces the idea that a day at the beach can be a pain in the butt. We're
out to change that fallacious idea one MORANO beachBAG at a time! Help us
establish an easy, all-in-one bag to serve beach goers everywhere. For 88 $ you can get your very own
MORANO beachBAG and it can change your beach experience for the rest of your
life. You may actually enjoy going to the beach with ease, leading you to go
more often and enjoy all the mental and physical benefits of a day at the beach. Empower
us to make this vision a reality with a donation to this project today!
More about
the Project
Packing for a day at the
beach with the family can almost seem like packing for a week long vacation.
Between towels, chairs, umbrellas, food, drinks and toys - it can be enough to
fill the back of a mini-van. “If you don’t have the right gear, you all will be
miserable,” said Eileen Ogintz, a family travels expert and author of the
“Summer Guide to Fun” at Takingthekids.com. “The right gear can really make a
difference” – this fact prompted us to dig deeper into a solution.  This is where we started to envision MORANO beachBAG and
all the possible benefits:


 SUN: When
our skin is directly exposed to the sun, our bodies make vitamin D, a vital
tool that helps with calcium absorption and building strong bones. Some of it
comes from diet, but a good portion also comes from the sun. And according to
the Mayo Clinic, as little as 10 minutes of sun exposure can provide us with
our daily dose. According to the vitamin D council, "your body can produce
10,000 to 25,000 IU of vitamin D in just a little under the time it takes for
your skin to turn pink."

SAND: The
soles of your feet have more sweat glands and nerve-endings per square
centimeter than any other part of your body. And walking barefoot stimulates
them much more than walking in shoes. 
Not only are you stimulating nerve endings when you walk on the sand,
but you're also strengthening the muscles in your feet, which don't get used
nearly as much when you're wearing shoes. And according to Martin Zucker,
author of Earthing: The Most Important Health Discovery Ever? You may be better
connected to the earth when you ditch your shoes, reaping vital mood-boosting
benefits. "Earthing," argues Zucker, reconnects our bodies to the
ever-present energy of the earth, which modern lifestyles have increasingly
diminished


SEA: Seawater
contains high levels of various minerals — including magnesium, potassium and
iodine — which may help fight infection, offer therapeutic effects, and
potentially help the body heal and detoxify. 
Swimming is linked to decreased stress and increased sense of wellbeing;
studies have shown swimming and water-based exercise help to decrease anxiety
and depression.  Aside from its
therapeutics effects, swimming provides excellent physical exercise, employing
most of our major muscle groups, especially as the water provides gentle
resistance.

from worrying about people stealing, comfortable seating and the battle of the
bags and start getting to the beach with EASE. 
We have conquered all these issues with one sleek and sexy bag called
the MORANO beachBAG.  It hides your
money, wallet, creams etc. and it provides easy, comfy seating, AND it rolls up
with a nice strap letting it fit right under your arm.  No more trunk full of beach stuff, no more
multiple trips, no more setting up and tearing down chairs, just bring your
MORANO beachBAG and enjoy your day. 
Remember when someone always had to “Man the bags” so nothing was
stolen, well with the MORANO beachBAG everyone can join in on the fun together
because MORANO beachBAG has a secret pouch for all your items…Wait did we
hear you say you want to go to the beach back-to-back days?? No problem, toss
your MORANO beachBAG in the wash, yes, it is machine washable.
We
feel these features make us incredibly qualified to succeed.  This paired with attention to detail and
quality service will make us the leader in the industry.

MORANO beachBAG team is obsessed with creating a great helpful

story:
Our pants are...


1) Made from premium fabric. We only use the highest quality 3-Ply 100% cotton twill fabric. This is an extremely rare fabric. It's 280 grams and designed to have an amazing soft feel but withstand the toughest wear.

2) Backed by a 25 year guarantee. We're so confident that your Quarter Century Pants will be the most durable pants you've ever had that we are backing them up with a 25 year guarantee.

3) Made in America. The best quality comes when you make things in your own back yard. We only work with production facilities that pay proper attention to fabric, people and processes right here in Los Angeles, CA.

4) Sold wholesale. By offering your pants directly via Kickstarter we are able to cut out the retail channel and offer you a pair of pants that usually would retail for $200 at only $85.

Our journey started almost two years ago when we took a radically new approach of looking at denim. It's the passion for quality clothes that led us on a mission to design the perfect jeans. Now, we know that you might not be able to wear denim everyday so we are doing something similarly radical: a pair of pants that are so well made they will last a quarter century.

We know it sounds crazy but we are all about making the impossible possible. We honor great American craftsmanship and question conventional wisdom to make The Quarter Century Pant.

Help us make a better pair of pants and let's challenge the industry together to make longer lasting clothes. Join us!

In the United States, automotive design reached a turning point in 1924 when the American national automobile market began reaching saturation. To maintain unit sales, General Motors suggested annual model-year design changes to convince car owners that they needed to buy a new replacement each year. The smaller playerscould not maintain the pace and expense of yearly re-styling. The same now goes for the fashion industry only that they build in a code for the clothes to come apart:

Planned obsolescence or built-in obsolescence in industrial design is a policy of planning or designing a product with an artificially limited useful life, so it will become obsolete, that is, unfashionable or no longer functional after a certain period of time. The rationale behind the strategy is to generate long-term sales volume by reducing the time between repeat purchases (referred to as "shortening the replacement cycle"). ~ Wikipedia

What is 3-Ply twill? A plied yarn is one where multiple strands of yarn — already spun yarn — are put together and twisted in the opposite direction from that in which they were first twisted. A 2-ply yarn has two strands; a 3-Ply yarn has three.

Any time you ply your yarn, you’re making it stronger. This is because twisting adds strength; multiple directions of twist add even more strength. You’re also tucking some of the surface of the yarn inside, away from the elements and wear and tear. Plied yarns will always be stronger and sturdier than singles yarns.

But this is only one reason to ply your yarns. Plying can also even out unevenness. Plying regularizes yarn, and also changes how the yarn behaves, how it feels, and how finished fabrics made from it behave and feel. You will notice that our pants are incredibly soft and durable.

We are launching our Quarter Century Pants in four colors: khaki, forest green, stone grey and charcoal. We know picking the right color is hard so we are offering bundles of 2 and 3 pants for a discount.

All our trimmings are made of 100% military grade copper. This includes the double prong waist button, rivets and back pocket buttons:

Inspired by the classic 20th Century khaki, we set out to design a timeless and stylish everyday chino. The Quarter Century Pant redefines style by presenting itself in a simple and modern construction:

  • Sophisticated design (Modern Classic)
  • 3-Ply fabric (280 gram)
  • 100% cotton twill
  • Double reinforced crotch (No more crotch "blow out" )
  • Military grade antique copper buttons
  • Military grade antique copper rivets
  • Heavy duty zipper
  • Tucked belt loops
  • Double tacked on all stress points
  • Hidden coin pocket
  • Made in America

Our styles include a modern straight leg and a slim fit. Each in our signature Quarter Century fabric and fit. Sizes range from 30-38 with inseams 32, 34.

We are offering The Quarter Century Pant at wholesale. No retail markups. No distribution markups. By selling to you directly we can maintain the highest quality and construction while offering a fair price point:

For our early supporters, we are offering a Kickstarter wholesale price at $85 including the Quarter Century Pant and free shipping (US). Shipping to Canada is $12 and to the rest of the world $20 for a single pant. Click on the reward to see all details.

We've made these pants to last a lifetime and are guaranteeing they are of the highest quality possible, but if anything happens to them we'll repair them free of charge. Send them back to us and we'll fix them!

Shipping to Canada is $12 and to the rest of the world $20 for a single pant. story:
keep following us at 

www.totemeyewear.com

US & Israel shipping is free! International funders please add $12 to your order to cover mail costs.

 

 

Thanks for checking out Totem eyewear. We’ve received a ton of support getting this far and we’re really excited to finally share all of our hard work with everyone. 

Frustrated with being unable to find good sunglasses that were affordable and high quality I had to choose between cheap plastic sunglasses that don't really protect my eyes, or designer sunglasses that are really expensive.                                                                                                          we started thinking that there has to be a better way.                                                                   so last summer keren and I started talking about designing our on sunglasses we felt there are 3 things that needed to be address:

  • Good design
  • High quality
  • Price that everybody can afford

Since then, we spent a long time testing and fine tuning our sunglasses to come up with high quality polarized sunglasses collection that we know everyone will love. 

 

 

The Lens

Feature polycarbonate polarized film core with two uv filters that protects 100% of both UVA and UVB rays up to 400 nanometers and on top of that a scratch resistant coating that helps protect your lens and gives it durability.    

The Frame

Totem has a classic frame with a modern twist. it is special made out of memory polymer which is extremely durable and light weight material. The frame can be put under a lot of pressure and still get back to its original shape without bending or breaking.                                                                                                       

 

 

In order to turn this dream of ours into a reality, we need your support. Not only does this mean pledging for one of our awesome sunglasses, but sharing the story with a friend. 

We are going to do everything we can to spread the word in a variety of ways.  We hope through the use of social media and blogs we can drive enough outside traffic to our page which will result in us reaching our funding goal.  If you could do something as simple as tweeting about our page, or just liking our Facebook page, it can really go a long way. Simply click the Facebook and Twitter tabs at the top ^ of the page, right below the video.

 

 

Currently we are at the last step we have a working prototype and now we need your help  to reach as many people as we can while our campaign is underway and start our production.

 

The way this works if we hit our funding goal we will be able to satisfied the porches minimum and go straight to production.

so whether you pledge or share our story we really appreciate the time you guys took to watch our video.

 

 

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

1.Can I get more than one pair?                                                                 

Yes you can, once you contribute for your first pair you can contribute again and select a second perk. (International backers don't need to add shipping again)

 

2.How and when do I choose which color I want?

Once the funding campaign ends you will receive an e-mail survey to your e-mail address where you can choose which color(s) you would like and where you want them shipped.

story:
Dolce Aqua Swimwear

              Launch Campaign!

Dolce Aqua Swimwear needs YOUR help to get these suits into production and get my business into motion.

    

What We Need & What You Get!

Dolce Aqua need to raise $10,000.00 to start production of these sexy swimsuits.

You get 1 or more of our Amazing Perks and in return Dolce Aqua gets the  necessary funding to pay for production costs.

The more funding we generate the more styles and colors we will be able to produce.

The Indiegogo production plan is to produce a 

Dolce Aqua Mini Collection: 

7 swimsuit styles & 2 cover-ups

If we do not reach $10,000 we will have to cut back on the # of styles offered.

PERKS!!!

$130 PERKS          "OPPULANT GODDESS" COLLECTION

$130 PERKS         "INTO THE WILD" COLLECTION


$100 PERKS          "OPPULANT GODDESS" COLLECTION

$130 PERKS         "INTO THE WILD" COLLECTION



$75 PERKS                    "OPPULANT GODDESS" COLLECTION

All tops and bottom can be chosen separately within the same collection.

My Story:
My name is Kristy Smith and my passion for fashion and the love of the beach drove me to pursue my design career in Southern California 14 years ago.  The pursuit of my dream to become a leading designer in the fashion industry has fueled my drive to achieve this goal.  

Why should you believe in me?

I have a sexy and ultra chic style that derives from my impeccable taste for high fashion and intuitive designer instinct for cutting edge trends. My sense of personal style is always complimented and attracts people all ages.  

What sets me apart from other designers?

My creative mind is constantly exploding with new & innovative ideas for fashion and I am always on the search to design something more exciting than the last thing I saw.  My drive to be a forerunner in fashion empowers my creativity.

Why should you buy Dolce Aqua Swimwear over other swimwear?

On the forefront of fashion, Dolce Aqua Swimwear has a vision of cutting edge style, sexy silhouettes, perfect curve accentuating cuts, exquisite detailing, a stunning color palette, impeccable construction and a feeling of luxury that will attract every fashion savvy woman.

It is our mission to deliver “head turning fashion” season after season and to be the most sought after fashion forward swimwear brand in the market.  Our high standards of quality will deliver superior products with impeccable fits made from high quality imported Italian fabrics and exquisite trims.  Manufacturing Dolce Aqua Swimwear in Los Angeles allows us to closely monitor the quality of our products and deliver our products on time.

Why Dolce Aqua Swimwear is ready for success?

As an experienced designer in the industry I have built a team of top quality industry professionals who are ready to work together to make Dolce Aqua Swimwear run smoothly.  I stand behind our exceptional quality and consistency in work.

How did Dolce Aqua Swimwear begin?

Never fully satisfied with the contemporary swimwear out there I knew I could design a line that really stood out above the rest.

I sourced the best Italian fabrics, French laces, developed unique trims and hardware to create the most luxurious swimsuits.

The name, “Dolce Aqua,”  my translation “Sweet Water” derives from the Italian expression, Dolce Vita or Sweet life, life of luxury perfectly encompasses the vibe of my swimwear line.  


Why Indiegogo?

I am taking financial matters into my own hands after having joined several business ventures where my partners did follow through with their agreements to provide the necessary business funding to produce Dolce Aqua Swimwear. 

$10,000 Production Cost Break down:

1.  Fabric Cost: $4,297.00

Importing fabric from Italy includes shipping, duties, and custom fees.

2. Pre-Production cost: $3905.00

Pre-production costs include: production patterns, production fit samples, fit model fees, grading, marking, cutting, and trim send outs. 

3. Production cost: $1798.00

Production costs include garment trims (bra cups, elastics, hardware, etc) and sewing. 

Note: All costs are an estimate and will fluctuate based on the # of orders.

TOTAL DOLCE AQUA MINI COLLECTION COST:  $10,000.00

Although my immediate goal is $10,000 to fund this mini collection production. I hope to exceed this goal and to use the extra money funded to cover:  

The shipping costs of the swimsuits.

  1. The Indiegogo fees.
  2. The Amazon payment processing fees.
  3. Production of additional suits to sell on dolceaquaswimwear.com and to local retailers. 
  4. Funding for marketing, social media, PR, website upkeep, etc.
  5. The development of a new collection!

Your Impact:

Your contribution whether big or small will help fund the production of Dolce Aqua Swimwear.   Regardless of your contribution, sharing my campaign on social media will also validate your endorsement and confidence in Dolce Aqua Swimwear.  The more people behind my brand, the stronger the validation of Dolce Aqua 's future success will be.

FREE SWIMSUITS!!!

You can earn FREE Dolce Aqua Swimwear from our Referral contest!

How to participate in the Referral Contest:

It's simple!  Log in to Indiegogo if you have not already, or create an account by signing up here. Then look below our main video at the top of this page for buttons to share and copy your unique URL.   Start sharing!  Track your account referrals by logging in to Indiegogo.com. 

Need more information? We have created detailed instructions here. 

Referral contest rewards:

Other Ways You Can Help

Whether or not you can contribute to my campaign, 

Please help share my Campaign with your friends and family.    

You can Earn FREE swimsuits by sharing my campaign with your family & friends.

The more people that I can reach the greater success my campaign will have. 

Post away on FB, Instagram, twitter, email, etc!  whatever way you choose :)

Follow the Indiegogo instructions after making an account on Indiegogo.com.

You can log in at any time to track your referral points! SHARE! SHARE! SHARE!

           

Risks & Challenges

Challenges in the fashion industry are inevitable. I am armed with 14 years of experience working in the fashion industry, with my last 4 years working for a small swimwear company through which I have developed superb problem solving skills and exceptional industry connections .  By producing Dolce Aqua locally in Los Angeles I will oversee and ensure the excellent quality of my product.

My largest challenge will be getting Dolce Aqua out into the world and creating the social buzz.  I will be using all avenues of social media to create a buzz for Dolce Aqua: Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Flicker, and Tumbler.  I will target successful fashion bloggers and look for a sales team to take charge of getting Dolce Aqua sold to boutiques and stores across the US and internationally.  

QUESTIONS/ANSWERS:

Why are the suits scheduled to ship in Dec. and not now?

Production takes time, which includes importing the fabric, going though the whole production fitting process, etc.  Timing set backs in production must be accounted for.  Please be patient knowing your high quality suit is worth the wait and it will last you several seasons.

How will you get my sizes, color choice, and suit selections once I pledge?

Once the campaign ends, we will send out a survey to all of our backers.   You will have the opportunity to select the style, sizes and color choice of the exact suit you want.  All styles are mix and match TOPS & BOTTOMS within the reward level choice.  The more funding we receive the more color choices will be available. 

How do I know what size to choose?

Dolce Aqua Swimwear has a very accurate size chart for you to follow when deciding upon size.  I work with a highly skilled team production team made of experienced experts in the industry.  We stand by our quality and accuracy in products.

What happens if my suit does not fit?

You will be able to exchange your suit for another size or by following our exchange policy procedures.  .

Return/ Exchange Policy:

We want our customers to be 100% satisfied with their purchases.  Dolce Aqua will gladly accept any regularly priced, unwashed, unworn, and unused swimsuits or cover ups for an exchange.   The customer is responsible for ALL return/ exchange. shipping charges, international deliveries, and express orders.
story_txt:
Dolce Aqua Swimwear
              Launch Campaign!
Dolce Aqua Swimwear needs YOUR help to get these suits into production and get my business into motion.

    
What We Need & What You Get!

Dolce Aqua need to raise $10,000.00 to start production of these sexy swimsuits.
You get 1 or more of our Amazing Perks and in return Dolce Aqua gets the  necessary funding to pay for production costs.
The more funding we generate the more styles and colors we will be able to produce.
The Indiegogo production plan is to produce a 
Dolce Aqua Mini Collection: 
7 swimsuit styles & 2 cover-ups
If we do not reach $10,000 we will have to cut back on the # of styles offered.







PERKS!!!

$130 PERKS          "OPPULANT GODDESS" COLLECTION



$130 PERKS         "INTO THE WILD" COLLECTION






$100 PERKS          "OPPULANT GODDESS" COLLECTION


$130 PERKS         "INTO THE WILD" COLLECTION



$75 PERKS                    "OPPULANT GODDESS" COLLECTION



All tops and bottom can be chosen separately within the same collection.

My Story:My name is Kristy Smith and my passion for fashion and the love of the beach drove me to pursue my design career in Southern California 14 years ago.  The pursuit of my dream to become a leading designer in the fashion industry has fueled my drive to achieve this goal.  
Why should you believe in me?
I have a sexy and ultra chic style that derives from my impeccable taste for high fashion and intuitive designer instinct for cutting edge trends. My sense of personal style is always complimented and attracts people all ages.  


What sets me apart from other designers?
My creative mind is constantly exploding with new & innovative ideas for fashion and I am always on the search to design something more exciting than the last thing I saw.  My drive to be a forerunner in fashion empowers my creativity.
Why should you buy Dolce Aqua Swimwear over other swimwear?
On the forefront of fashion, Dolce Aqua Swimwear has a vision of cutting edge style, sexy silhouettes, perfect curve accentuating cuts, exquisite detailing, a stunning color palette, impeccable construction and a feeling of luxury that will attract every fashion savvy woman.
It is our mission to deliver “head turning fashion” season after season and to be the most sought after fashion forward swimwear brand in the market.  Our high standards of quality will deliver superior products with impeccable fits made from high quality imported Italian fabrics and exquisite trims.  Manufacturing Dolce Aqua Swimwear in Los Angeles allows us to closely monitor the quality of our products and deliver our products on time.



Why Dolce Aqua Swimwear is ready for success?
As an experienced designer in the industry I have built a team of top quality industry professionals who are ready to work together to make Dolce Aqua Swimwear run smoothly.  I stand behind our exceptional quality and consistency in work.

The shipping costs of the swimsuits.

The Indiegogo fees.
The Amazon payment processing fees.

Production of additional suits to sell on dolceaquaswimwear.com and to local retailers. 

Funding for marketing, social media, PR, website upkeep, etc.
The development of a new collection!
