story:
Iron Battlefield: ACCESSORIES

This is the upgrade campaign for IRON BATTLEFIELD. Here you will find additional stuff which were given away from the main campaign.

Esta es la campaña de ampliación de IRON BATTLEFIELD. Aquí encontrarás el material adicional que fue regalado en la campaña principal.

These accessories are MDF, plastic, and cardboard lasercutted pieces, and polyurethane resin cast. You can find more information about this in the main campaign.

Estos accesorios están realizados en DM, plástico y cartón cortado a láser, además de piezas obtenidas en resina de poliuretano. Podrás encontrar más información en la campaña principal.

As well as the IRON BATTLEFIELD campaign, we keep our goals policy: if the campaign gets a goal, backers will get additional stuff!! each perk explains its own rewards.

Al igual que en la campaña de IRON BATTLEFIELD, mantenemos nuestra política de regalos: Si la campaña alcanza una meta, ¡¡los contribuyentes conseguirán material adicional!! cada contribución (perk) explica sus propios regalos.

This campaign will be 33 days running. All the pieces are designed, and will be sent with your IRON BATTLEFIELD order (if you are a backer of this campaign). Although it is subjet to further delay, shipping will start in late February surely.

Esta campaña estará en funcionamiento 33 días. Todas las piezas están ya diseñadas, y serán enviadas con tu anterior pedido a IRON BATTLEFIELD (si fuiste contribuyente de esa campaña). Aunque está sujeto a posibles demoras, los envíos comenzarán seguramente a finales de Febrero.



You can find a lot of images at our Facebook albums (follow us!), and at the "gallery" section of this campaign.

Puedes encontrar un montón de imágenes en nuestros álbumes de Facebook (¡síguenos!), y en la sección "galería" de esta campaña.

Click images to go album / pincha la imagen para ir al álbum de Facebook













To understand the graphics belong, checkout this album /
Para entender el siguiente esquema, echa un vistazo a este álbum.




Important: please, if you are interested in several models, order them one by one, even with the same model. We know that it can be tedious, but it is very important so it can be processed correctly with our system. Thank you very much!!

Note: Definitive models can be slightly modified for a better performance, but always keeping the original concept.


Importante: por favor, si estás intersado en varios artículos, pídelos uno por uno, aunque sean el mismo. Se que puede resultar pesado, pero es fundamental para poder procesar el pedido correctamente. ¡¡Muchas gracias por entenderlo!!

Nota: Los modelos definitivos puede ser modificados ligeramente por cuestiones de optimización, pero mantendrán la apariencia principal.

Delivery will be paid just before items shipment with all the stuff of Iron Battlefield campaign (if you are a backer of this campaign), and after contacting you with the amount required. Thereby, backers and us will have more control about shipment. Also, this way help us in taxes and fees issues. If you have doubts about the shipping to your country, don´t hesitate to ask us.

Los gastos de envío serán pagados antes de mandar el material, y después de contactar con vosotros e indicaros el total requerido. De este modo, tanto los contribuyentes como nosotros tendremos más control sobre el envío. Además, este modo nos ayuda en cuestiones de impuestos y comisiones.

Thank you for support us!!

¡¡Gracias por apoyarnos!!

Important: please, if you are interested in several models, order them one by one, even with the same model. We know that it can be tedious, but it is very important so it can be processed correctly with our system. Thank you very much!!
Note: Definitive models can be slightly modified for a better performance, but always keeping the original concept.

Thereby, backers and us will have more control about shipment. Also, this way help us in taxes and fees issues. If you have doubts about the shipping to your country, don´t hesitate to ask us.
Los gastos de envío serán pagados antes de mandar el material, y después de contactar con vosotros e indicaros el total requerido.
De este modo, tanto los contribuyentes como nosotros tendremos más control sobre el envío. Además, este modo nos ayuda en cuestiones de impuestos y comisiones.

Thank you for support us!!
¡¡Gracias por apoyarnos!!

story:
Hey, I'm Geraldo. In the Summer of 2010 Nerdy Frames was launched from my apartment in NYC.  Like all Entrepreneurs, I struggle with getting the word out. I dedicate over 70hrs a week to create kick ass products. I want to make sure everyone gets a well made item produce by someone who loves what they're doing. My ultimate goal with Nerdy Frames is to make it into a fashionably & affordable brand where all ages can enjoy handmade glasses. 

Nerdy Frames believe in a Loop cycle of production where no waste is produce and any debris or waste is produce into other products. These days we need to be more environmentally conscious.

After a year and half of trial and error I have produce designs that will look good and can be produced effectively.   

Wooden Sunglasses Info ----------------------------------------------------------

What does a Nerdy Frames Sunglass look like you ask ? Why is it different?

- All frames are designed and handcrafted in New York City. We go thru a rigorous inspection process to make sure you get a quality frame.

- Nerdy Frames temples feature a stylish tapered design and fits comfortably around your head.

- We source mostly North American Wood such as Oak and Walnut. We also use an all Natural Beeswax coating that we created in order to stain our frames.

 

Wood Option----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

We're offering a Walnut / Oak Combo, all Walnut or all Oak


Your Personal Touch -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

We will engrave a name, our logo, our motto or a motto of your own.


Your Lens Choice ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Our supporters get to choose between Brown or Dark Grey lenses. Lenses are UV-A and UV-B treated. 


Perk Options -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You can either get a choice of a T-Shirt and/or Wooden Sunglasses (Only 199 Personalized Wooden Sunglasses, 45 Grab Bag Special frames, 25 Four Frame Offer)

Frame Choices

Pouch - Our sunglasses come with a Handmade Cotton or Wool pouch made from a Houndstooth fabric.


What you get and what we need from you -------------------------------------------------

You get handmade wooden sunglasses from us with our natural Beeswax finish and  what we need is your support. We hope to bring to you a well made fashionable product that is easy on our environment.


Customer Service ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Regarding warranty, the 199 personalized frames offered here will be made by me ( Geraldo) and will be serviced by yours truly. The Grab Bag Special and Four Frame offer will be made by yours truly as well. ( I have limited the amount of frames offered since I'm only one person.) Depending on the severity of damage a service charge may be applied.

Attention International Supporters -----------------------------------------------------------

We haven't forgotten about you guys. I will cover the shipping cost to you.

After Donating ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

After donating, please contact: imanerd@nerdyframes.com with your lens choice and engraving choices. We will inform you what wood options are available.

We want to hear your feedback and/or comments.

Feel free to visit us at http://www.nerdyframes.com

Email: customerservice@nerdyframes.com

Twitter : @nerdyframes

Facebook Fan Page: http://www.facebook.com/NerdyFrames

Instagram: @nerdyframes

We're all about our fans and supporters and will always be available to answer any questions you may have. Thanks!

story:
Limited Edition DRYWORLD Swag Release

The #D has just come out with some of the freshest threads on the planet.

So fresh...we are only releasing 100 pieces to the public.

*$6 from each hat, $10 from each hoodie, and $20 from each jersey purchase will be split evenly and given to the following causes: Gainline Africa, Jinnie Pratt, and Vancouver Island Thunder Rugby* 

**If we sell out, each cause will gain $566! Thats $1,700 donated to Sport!**

The Perks

We are releasing 100 of our fresh and fly zip hoodies with the velvet D chest and the Velvet DREAM. DEFY. DELIVER. back. **This hoodie comes in XS to XXL, please indicate the size you want in the message box when you order


We are also releasing 100 of our pro-fit D Street hats. This hat is so fresh you better keep your eyes on it cause it'll walk on ya. **This hat comes in two sizes, S-M and L-XL, please indicate the size you want in the message box when you order.


*If we sell out of each perk feel safe knowing you'll be one of the few to don the Velvet D and/or the Street D Hat, while supporting athletes doin what they love.*

As an added bonus we are releasing 5 of our custom rugby jerseys seen here **This jersey comes in S-XL, only one of each, please indicate the size you want in the message box when you order

BONUS:


Thank you to those of you who have stepped up to rock the D.  The DRYWORLD grows brick by brick and you have just contributed to three worthy causes.

There is strength in numbers, the bigger the DRYWORLD gets the more we can impact the lives of athletes and give back to communities.

As a celebration of this notion we would like to introduce our latest...so fresh its still in concept form. **This T-Shirt comes in XS to XXL, please indicate the size you want in the message box when you order

PowerThruThePeople...Please sign and pass the word on http://www.thepetitionsite.com/450/590/739/brin...

The Impact

Not only will you be one of the few who don the D in these fresh threads but you will be helping athletes in need in Sport. Have a look below to see where your money will go.

  • Inspirational! Jinnie Pratt - Rugby USA Collegiate All American http://www.dreamfuel.me/athletes/38/campaigns/28

  • Unbelievable! http://gainlineafrica.org/


  • Just Awesome! - First Aboriginal Rugby Team - Vancouver Island Thunder https://www.facebook.com/VancouverIslandThunderRugby?fref=photo


We love sport and we love supporting those who love sport. Its why we do what we do. In the last 12 months we have sponsored Gainline Africa, Perry Street Prep Rugby, Fight for the Cause, and many more. Help us keep spreading the gospel of sport.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't want any swag but you want to help these athletes:

  • Send in a contribution of any amount and direct it to 1, 2 or all 3 of the above recipients.
  • Get the word out and make some noise about this campaign!
  • Remember, use the Indiegogo share tools!

Supporting sport, one D at a time.

Welcome to the DRYWORLD

This hat is so fresh you better keep your eyes on it cause it'll walk on ya. **This hat comes in two sizes, S-M and L-XL, please indicate the size you want in the message box when you order.*If we sell out of each perk feel safe knowing you'll be one of the few to don the Velvet D and/or the Street D Hat, while supporting athletes doin what they love.*As an added bonus we are releasing 5 of our custom rugby jerseys seen here **This jersey comes in S-XL, only one of each, please indicate the size you want in the message box when you orderBONUS:Thank you to those of you who have stepped up to rock the D.  The DRYWORLD grows brick by brick and you have just contributed to three worthy causes.There is strength in numbers, the bigger the DRYWORLD gets the more we can impact the lives of athletes and give back to communities.As a celebration of this notion we would like to introduce our latest...so fresh its still in concept form. **This T-Shirt comes in XS to XXL, please indicate the size you want in the message box when you orderPowerThruThePeople...Please sign and pass the word on http://www.thepetitionsite.com/450/590/739/brin...The ImpactNot only will you be one of the few who don the D in these fresh threads but you will be helping athletes in need in Sport. Have a look below to see where your money will go.
Inspirational! Jinnie Pratt - Rugby USA Collegiate All American http://www.dreamfuel.me/athletes/38/campaigns/28


Unbelievable! http://gainlineafrica.org/






Just Awesome! - First Aboriginal Rugby Team - Vancouver Island Thunder https://www.facebook.com/VancouverIslandThunderRugby?fref=photo





We love sport and we love supporting those who love sport. Its why we do what we do. In the last 12 months we have sponsored Gainline Africa, Perry Street Prep Rugby, Fight for the Cause, and many more. Help us keep spreading the gospel of sport.Other Ways You Can HelpIf you don't want any swag but you want to help these athletes:
Send in a contribution of any amount and direct it to 1, 2 or all 3 of the above recipients.
Get the word out and make some noise about this campaign!
Remember, use the Indiegogo share tools!
Supporting sport, one D at a time.Welcome to the DRYWORLD

story:
Heaux Confessionals© is uncut: a marriage of the raw, decadent and unconventional.

This pulp friction literary barrage will leave no one unscathed. Come along on this literary joyride of the Berlin that is just beneath the surface and has always been so expertly hidden. Until now...

Enter this world as I claw my way through the city of the moment: Berlin. The unfathomable, imagined. A place of no rules, and no boundaries. A city where there is no sexual divide. Metrosexual, bisexual, yes. Gay or straight?

Not a chance.

In a city where every language is spoken, there is only one that transcends them all. Everyone speaks heaux…


 How fab is your heauxcabulary?   

Whatever the setting, there is always a story to tell. From the erotic to the exotic, to the raw and heartfelt, every aspect of life is covered with a touch of cynicism and caustic wit. Every heaux has a story to tell. This is mine. Join me on a wild and raucous ride, if you dare.
 
From the drama onstage and off, with the backdrop of a city like no other – Berlin, the characters take you on a never-ending, spiraling adventure. A city in the midst of change filled with artists ready to change it. This is the second wave of neo-Berlin currently gritting it out on the toughest streets in central Europe. This is the place where dreams come true, or burn by the wayside. These are the stories of those select few doing the damn thing, and paying their dues on the way. There is never an easy way out. And in Berlin, even the ones that break through get a little dirty.  
 
It’s Fame with an edge.
It’s Survivor, because only the strong manage to get through the drama of it all. There will be casualties.
It’s Rent for the new millennium.
It’s Sex & The City, on a real budget. 
 Welcome to Heaux Confessionals©.  Sho(r)t stories featuring tales of trickery, lust connections, love profusions and the daily grind that can be most unkind.


 Enter New Berlin.


 Enter Heaux Confessionals©. 


Think Running with Scissors meets Confederacy of Dunces.


For previously published books, check out my chapter in the 2009 anthology from Soft Skull Press: Hos, Hookers, Call-Girls and Rent Boys©, reviewed in the New York Times...

story:
Short Summary

The Speakr brand smartwatch has the functionality of a computer remote. The main function of our watches is to sync with you Android/iPhone via bluetooth. When it is synced with your smartphone, it will allow your push notifications (ie text, incoming call, email, twitter message, Facebook, Linkedin etc) to be available on the smartwatch. Using the touchscreen display on the smartwatch, you can retrieve your messages, accept or decline a call, answer a call, make a call, screen calls with the caller ID. The Speakr smartwatch is the perfect smartphone companion. 

What We Need & What You Get

To be able to release this product by January 2014, we need funding not only to go into production, but to continue to develop new software and designs so that our watches have more options available. We need funding for outsourcing so that we can remain at competitive pricing to keep our smart watches under $200 USD. To any one who is able to pledge $25 will get a 20% discount on the product when it releases. For those who can give $100 will get the design based on our prototype that will retail for $150. For those who pledge $150 will get a complimentary MK530 "Articulate Style" series Speakr smartwatch for your support. This design will retail for $200. Your contributions will help to pay for storefront location, software/app developers, travel expenses to factory, mass production, video and print advertising, reviews and more designs.

The Impact

We know that the market for smartwatches is huge and growing. It is projected to become a billion dollar industry. As it stands right now, the smart watches that are out prices start at an average $300. In most cases the watch costs more than the smartphone. We don't want our smartwatches to cost more than then the phone, after all, the smartwatch is accessory so it should be affordable. So to keep the cost of manufacturing down so that the retail price can stay low, we intend to outsource. We will remove any features and functions that are not neccessary or needed to keep the costs low.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you want to give but cannot, its okay. Help promote this product, get the word out. Anything helps and will be greatly appreciated.

story:
so i have been wanting this rebecca minkoff bag for awhile now. most of you that know me { i assume you know me if you’re reading this } know that i am way into fashion. i stare and drool all day at louboutins & balenciaga bags. net-a-porter is my crack. shopbop gives me the kinds of butterflies in my stomach that you might also get walking down the aisle towards you future husband. i have to physically detour my daily walks 3-4 blocks out of the way to avoid the saks windows. burberry leather jackets & proenza schouler call out my name & beg me to enter the beautiful doors. blair eadie from atlantic pacific’s blog is my idol. if i could attack her and steal her clothes and live in her closet i would {just kidding blair.. kind of} —- this is my life. and it is all about to come crashing down when my labels are going to start changing to pampers and maclaren.

SO i decided i need one final goodbye for now fashion, until i can afford you again, moment. i would like to purchase a rebecca minkoff iconic bag, the Cupid. it is love at first sight. if i can get everyone i know to contribute just $5 i think that it can be mine for my birthday Also i have 989 facebook friends. if everyone contributes just $1 i can buy 9 of these bags and auction off the other 8 for charity... just saying.

is this crazy? quite possibly it is, but like my dad always says “the worst they can say is no”

story:
Short Summary

Rave Smart was founded in late 2014 by me (Stacy Gomez) and my wife (Samantha Gomez), in response to seeing ravers young and old alike practicing unsafe drug use. These unsafe practices are putting the scene, and more importantly people’s lives in danger. We are designed to provide harm reduction information and affordable adulterant screening kits to the local rave and nightlife scene. 

We at Rave Smart do not condone or condemn drug use and believe that drug use is inherently dangerous; however we know that some people will still choose to use drugs and we want to spread knowledge, factual information, and harm reduction practices to help reduce these risks as much as possible.

Help us reach out in our community, reduce unsafe behavior, maintain a fun and safe environment, educate each other, and maybe even save some lives!


What We Need & What You Get

Rave Smart has been in operation since November of 2014 and so far we have spent well over $1,500 out of our own pockets to get drug safety and harm reduction information out to the people who need it most. We are running out of funds and we need your help! We are setting a goal of $3,000. With this money we will be able to have more fliers and harm reduction pamphlets made and printed, get our website built and operational, and most importantly we will get more drug reagent kits made and out to the people who need them! With this money we will be able to get our message of safe and responsible drug use out to more people and that means more peoples lives will be saved because of your donations!

The Impact

Rave Smart is here to save lives! We are accomplishing this by getting factual drug safety and harm reduction information to the masses. Right now we are confined to the northern Nevada area because of funding but we are trying are hardest to expand and get our message out as far as we can!

Risks & Challenges

As stated earlier we are running out of funds available to get our message out. If this campaign is successful it will allow us to continue spreading knowledge and saving lives. 

Other Ways You Can Help

This is something that is very important to us and to the community. Every dollar helps us hit our goal and that also means every donation is potentially saving a life! If you can not afford to donate that is fine  but please consider sharing our campaign on social media and help get the word out! Thanks for your time! We love you all, Rave Smart!

story:
Ear plugs are essential for Electronic hearing protection. They protect your hearing, yes, but they can be a hassle. Sometimes you need to hear and they block too much, so you have to take them out. They're small and easily lost. They get deformed easily, they are hardly ever comfortable, and they seem to fall out more than they stay in your ear.

At ProSounds, we are dedicated to providing the very best hearing protection. We deliver all of the benefits of hearing protection, but none of the problems.The X-Pro ear plugs are simplicity itself. Designed to fit comfortably in any ear, you'll hardly even notice you're wearing anything.

After the X-Pro is comfortably settled in your ear, you can activate the hearing protection with the push of a button. The closed valve will now protect your hearing by giving you 30dB of noise reduction with the foam tips (24 dB noise reduction with silicon tips). 

When you need to hear again, instead of completely removing the ear plugs, simply press the button again to open the acoustic valve (patent pending), allowing sound to pass through naturally.  X-Pro Ear Plugs are washable and reusable to help you avoid the hassle and extra expense of constantly having to replace disposable earplugs.

Risks and challenges

The X-Pro product is one of several products developed for the new ProSounds product line. The prototypes are finished and working very well. We are literally using the additional funding to help finalize packaging, merchandising displays and execute on go-to market strategies. There is no risk on this product for delivering it according to the timelines stated.
